Boss2D 3.6.2
  • platform
boss_platform_qt5.hpp
1#pragma once
2#include <platform/boss_platform.hpp>
3#include <platform/boss_platform_impl.hpp>

5#undef size_t
6#undef ssize_t

11 #include <format/boss_bmp.hpp>

14 #include <QElapsedTimer>
15 #include <QFile>
16 #include <QFileInfo>
17 #include <QDir>
18 #include <QThread>

20 #include <QEvent>
21 #include <QSettings>
22 #include <QCoreApplication>
23 #include <QStandardPaths>
24 #include <QDateTime>

26 #include <QSize>
27 #include <QRect>

49 #include <QOpenGLFunctions>
50 #include <QOpenGLShaderProgram>
51 #include <QOpenGLFramebufferObject>
52
53 // QPixmap을 GLuint타입 Texture로 바꾸기 위한 기능이 필요하여 include
54 // auto CurContext = QGLContext::fromOpenGLContext(ctx);
55 // GLuint CurTexture = CurContext->bindTexture(pixmap);
56 #include <QGLWidget>
57 #endif

60 #include <QHostInfo>
61 #include <QTcpSocket>
62 #include <QUdpSocket>
63 #include <QTcpServer>
64 #include <QNetworkInterface>
65 #include <QWebSocket>
66 #include <QWebSocketServer>

119 #endif

121 #define USER_FRAMECOUNT (60)
122
123 class MainData;
124 extern MainData* g_data;
125 extern QMainWindow* g_window;
126 extern QWidget* g_view;
127 extern bool g_event_blocked;
128 extern sint32 g_argc;
129 extern char** g_argv;
130
131 class SizePolicy
132 {
133 public:
134 SizePolicy();
135 ~SizePolicy();
136 public:
137 sint32 m_minwidth;
138 sint32 m_minheight;
139 sint32 m_maxwidth;
140 sint32 m_maxheight;
141 };
142
143 class FTFontClass
144 {
145 public:
146 FTFontClass()
147 {
148 mHeight = 0;
149 }
150 ~FTFontClass()
151 {
152 }
153 FTFontClass(const FTFontClass& rhs)
154 {
155 operator=(rhs);
156 }
157 FTFontClass& operator=(const FTFontClass& rhs)
158 {
159 mNickName = ToReference(rhs.mNickName);
160 mHeight = ToReference(rhs.mHeight);
161 return *this;
162 }
163 public:
164 String mNickName;
165 sint32 mHeight;
166 };
167
168 class CanvasClass
169 {
170 public:
171 CanvasClass();
172 CanvasClass(QPaintDevice* device);
173 ~CanvasClass();
174 public:
175 void Bind(QPaintDevice* device);
176 void Unbind();
177 private:
178 void BindCore(QPaintDevice* device);
179 void UnbindCore();
180 public:
181 // Getter
182 static inline CanvasClass* get() {return ST();}
183 inline QPainter& painter() {return mPainter;}
184 inline bool is_font_ft() const {return mUseFontFT;}
185 inline chars font_ft_nickname() const {return mFontFT.mNickName;}
186 inline sint32 font_ft_height() const {return mFontFT.mHeight;}
187 inline float zoom() const {return mPainter.transform().m11();}
188 inline const QRect& scissor() const {return mScissor;}
189 inline const QColor& color() const {return mColor;}
190 // Setter
191 inline void SetFont(chars name, sint32 size)
192 {mUseFontFT = false; mPainter.setFont(QFont(name, size));}
193 inline void SetFontFT(chars nickname, sint32 height)
194 {mUseFontFT = true; mFontFT.mNickName = nickname; mFontFT.mHeight = height;}
195 inline void SetMask(QPainter::CompositionMode mask)
196 {mPainter.setCompositionMode(mask);}
197 inline void SetScissor(sint32 l, sint32 t, sint32 r, sint32 b)
198 {
199 mScissor = QRect(l, t, r - l, b - t);
200 mPainter.setClipRect(mScissor);
201 }
202 inline void SetColor(uint08 r, uint08 g, uint08 b, uint08 a)
203 {mColor.setRgb(r, g, b, a);}
204 private:
205 static inline CanvasClass*& ST() {static CanvasClass* _ = nullptr; return _;}
206 private:
207 const bool mIsTypeSurface;
208 bool mIsSurfaceBinded;
209 CanvasClass* mSavedCanvas;
210 float mSavedZoom;
211 bool mUseFontFT;
212 FTFontClass mFontFT;
213 QFont mSavedFont;
214 QPainter::CompositionMode mSavedMask;
215 QPainter mPainter;
216 QRect mScissor;
217 QColor mColor;
218 };
219
220 class ViewAPI : public QObject
221 {
222 Q_OBJECT
223
224 public:
225 enum ParentType {PT_Null, PT_GenericView, PT_GenericViewGL, PT_MainViewGL, PT_MainViewMDI};
226 enum WidgetRequest {WR_Null, WR_NeedExit = -1, WR_NeedHide = -2};
227
228 public:
229 ViewAPI(ParentType type, buffer buf, View* manager, View::UpdaterCB cb, QWidget* data, QWidget* device)
230 {
231 m_parent_type = type;
232 m_parent_buf = buf;
233 m_parent_ptr = nullptr;
234 m_view_manager = manager;
235 m_next_manager = nullptr;
236 m_view_cb = cb;
237 m_view_data = data;
238 m_paint_device = device;
239 if(manager)
240 manager->SetCallback(m_view_cb, m_view_data);
241
242 m_width = 0;
243 m_height = 0;
244 m_request = WR_Null;
245 m_paintcount = 0;
246 m_longpress_x = 0;
247 m_longpress_y = 0;
248
249 connect(&m_tick_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::tick_timeout);
250 connect(&m_update_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::update_timeout);
251 connect(&m_tooltip_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::tooltip_timeout);
252 connect(&m_longpress_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &ViewAPI::longpress_timeout);
253 }
254
255 ViewAPI(const ViewAPI& rhs) = delete;
256 ViewAPI& operator=(const ViewAPI& rhs) = delete;
257
258 ~ViewAPI()
259 {
260 m_tick_timer.stop();
261 m_update_timer.stop();
262 m_tooltip_timer.stop();
263 m_longpress_timer.stop();
264
265 if(getParent()) sendDestroy();
266 Buffer::Free(m_parent_buf);
267 delete m_view_manager;
268 delete m_next_manager;
269 }
270
271 public:
272 inline ParentType getParentType() const
273 {
274 return m_parent_type;
275 }
276
277 inline void* getParent() const
278 {
279 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", (m_parent_buf != nullptr) != (m_parent_ptr != nullptr));
280 return (void*) (((ublock) m_parent_buf) | ((ublock) m_parent_ptr));
281 }
282
283 inline void renewParent(void* ptr)
284 {
285 m_parent_buf = nullptr;
286 m_parent_ptr = ptr;
287
288 if(getParent())
289 sendCreate();
290 }
291
292 inline bool parentIsPtr() const
293 {
294 return (m_parent_ptr != nullptr);
295 }
296
297 inline bool hasViewManager() const
298 {
299 return (m_view_manager != nullptr);
300 }
301
302 void setViewAndCreateAndSize(h_view view)
303 {
304 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
305 g_view = getWidget();
306 m_view_manager->SetView(view);
307
308 sendCreate();
309 sendSizeWhenValid();
310 }
311
312 h_view changeViewManagerAndDestroy(View* manager)
313 {
314 sendDestroy();
315 h_view OldViewHandle;
316 if(m_view_manager)
317 {
318 OldViewHandle = m_view_manager->SetView(h_view::null());
319 delete m_view_manager;
320 }
321
322 m_view_manager = manager;
323 m_view_manager->SetCallback(m_view_cb, m_view_data);
324 return OldViewHandle;
325 }
326
327 inline void setNextViewManager(View* manager)
328 {
329 delete m_next_manager;
330 m_next_manager = manager;
331 update(1);
332 }
333
334 inline void changeViewData(QWidget* data)
335 {
336 m_view_data = data;
337 if(m_view_manager)
338 m_view_manager->SetCallback(m_view_cb, m_view_data);
339 }
340
341 inline ViewClass* getClass() const
342 {
343 return (ViewClass*) m_view_manager->GetClass();
344 }
345
346 inline QWidget* getWidget() const
347 {
348 if(m_view_manager)
349 {
350 if(m_view_data)
351 return m_view_data;
352 if(m_view_manager->IsNative())
353 return (QWidget*) m_view_manager->GetClass();
354 }
355 return (QWidget*) getParent();
356 }
357
358 inline QWidget* getWidgetForPaint() const
359 {
360 if(m_paint_device)
361 return m_paint_device;
362 return getWidget();
363 }
364
365 inline void render(sint32 width, sint32 height)
366 {
367 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
368 g_view = getWidget();
369 m_view_manager->OnRender(width, height, 0, 0, width, height);
370
371 if(m_next_manager)
372 {
373 h_view OldViewHandle = changeViewManagerAndDestroy(m_next_manager);
374 setViewAndCreateAndSize(OldViewHandle);
375 m_next_manager = nullptr;
376 }
377 }
378
379 inline void touch(TouchType type, sint32 id, sint32 x, sint32 y)
380 {
381 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
382 g_view = getWidget();
383 m_view_manager->OnTouch(type, id, x, y);
384 }
385
386 inline void key(sint32 code, chars text, bool pressed)
387 {
388 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
389 g_view = getWidget();
390 m_view_manager->OnKey(code, text, pressed);
391 }
392
393 inline void sendCreate()
394 {
395 if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
396 {
397 g_view = getWidget();
398 m_view_manager->OnCreate();
399 m_tick_timer.start(1000 / USER_FRAMECOUNT);
400 }
401 }
402
403 inline bool canQuit()
404 {
405 if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
406 {
407 g_view = getWidget();
408 return m_view_manager->OnCanQuit();
409 }
410 return true;
411 }
412
413 inline void sendDestroy()
414 {
415 if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
416 {
417 m_tick_timer.stop();
418 g_view = getWidget();
419 m_view_manager->OnDestroy();
420 }
421 }
422
423 inline void sendActivate(bool actived)
424 {
425 if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
426 {
427 g_view = getWidget();
428 m_view_manager->OnActivate(actived);
429 }
430 }
431
432 inline void sendSizeWhenValid()
433 {
434 if(0 < m_width && 0 < m_height)
435 if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
436 {
437 g_view = getWidget();
438 m_view_manager->OnSize(m_width, m_height);
439 }
440 }
441
442 inline void sendTick() const
443 {
444 if(m_view_manager != nullptr)
445 {
446 g_view = getWidget();
447 m_view_manager->OnTick();
448 }
449 }
450
451 inline void sendNotify(NotifyType type, chars topic, id_share in, id_cloned_share* out) const
452 {
453 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
454 g_view = getWidget();
455 m_view_manager->SendNotify(type, topic, in, out, false);
456 }
457
458 inline void sendDirectNotify(NotifyType type, chars topic, id_share in) const
459 {
460 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", m_view_manager);
461 g_view = getWidget();
462 m_view_manager->SendNotify(type, topic, in, nullptr, true);
463 }
464
465 public:
466 void resize(sint32 width, sint32 height)
467 {
468 m_width = width;
469 m_height = height;
470 sendSizeWhenValid();
471 }
472
473 void paint()
474 {
475 // for assert dialog's recursive call
476 if(CanvasClass::get()) return;
477 CanvasClass Canvas(getWidgetForPaint());
478 render(m_width, m_height);
479 }
480
481 void nextPaint()
482 {
483 if(0 < m_paintcount)
484 m_paintcount--;
485 }
486
487 void dirtyAndUpdate()
488 {
489 m_view_manager->DirtyAllSurfaces();
490 update(1);
491 }
492
493 void update(sint32 count)
494 {
495 if(count == WR_NeedExit)
496 m_request = WR_NeedExit;
497 else if(count == WR_NeedHide)
498 m_request = WR_NeedHide;
499 else if(m_paintcount < count)
500 {
501 if(m_paintcount == 0)
502 m_update_timer.start(1000 / USER_FRAMECOUNT);
503 m_paintcount = count;
504 }
505 }
506
507 void onActivateEvent(bool actived)
508 {
509 sendActivate(actived);
510 }
511
512 bool closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event)
513 {
514 if(canQuit())
515 {
516 event->accept();
517 return true;
518 }
519 event->ignore();
520 return false;
521 }
522
523 void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
524 {
525 if(g_event_blocked)
526 {
527 event->ignore();
528 return;
529 }
530
531 if(event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
532 {
533 touch(TT_Press, 0, event->x(), event->y());
534 m_longpress_timer.start(3000);
535 m_longpress_x = event->x();
536 m_longpress_y = event->y();
537 }
538 else if(event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
539 touch(TT_ExtendPress, 0, event->x(), event->y());
540 else if(event->button() == Qt::MidButton)
541 touch(TT_WheelPress, 0, event->x(), event->y());
542
543 m_tooltip_timer.stop();
544 }
545
546 void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
547 {
548 if(g_event_blocked)
549 {
550 event->ignore();
551 return;
552 }
553
554 if(event->buttons() == Qt::NoButton)
555 {
556 touch(TT_Moving, 0, event->x(), event->y());
557 m_tooltip_timer.start(300);
558 Platform::Popup::HideToolTip();
559 }
560 else
561 {
562 if(event->buttons() & Qt::LeftButton)
563 touch(TT_Dragging, 0, event->x(), event->y());
564 if(event->buttons() & Qt::RightButton)
565 touch(TT_ExtendDragging, 0, event->x(), event->y());
566 if(event->buttons() & Qt::MidButton)
567 touch(TT_WheelDragging, 0, event->x(), event->y());
568 }
569
570 if(5 < Math::Distance(m_longpress_x, m_longpress_y, event->x(), event->y()))
571 m_longpress_timer.stop();
572 }
573
574 void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event)
575 {
576 if(g_event_blocked)
577 {
578 event->ignore();
579 return;
580 }
581
582 if(event->button() == Qt::LeftButton)
583 touch(TT_Release, 0, event->x(), event->y());
584 else if(event->button() == Qt::RightButton)
585 touch(TT_ExtendRelease, 0, event->x(), event->y());
586 else if(event->button() == Qt::MidButton)
587 touch(TT_WheelRelease, 0, event->x(), event->y());
588
589 m_longpress_timer.stop();
590 }
591
592 void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event)
593 {
594 if(g_event_blocked)
595 {
596 event->ignore();
597 return;
598 }
599
600 float WheelValue = event->angleDelta().y() / 120.0f;
601 while (0 < WheelValue)
602 {
603 WheelValue = Math::MaxF(0, WheelValue - 1);
604 touch(TT_WheelUp, 0, event->position().x(), event->position().y());
605 }
606 while (WheelValue < 0)
607 {
608 WheelValue = Math::MinF(WheelValue + 1, 0);
609 touch(TT_WheelDown, 0, event->position().x(), event->position().y());
610 }
611 }
612
613 void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event)
614 {
615 if(g_event_blocked)
616 {
617 event->ignore();
618 return;
619 }
620 if(!event->isAutoRepeat())
621 key(event->nativeVirtualKey(), event->text().toUtf8().constData(), true);
622 }
623
624 void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent* event)
625 {
626 if(g_event_blocked)
627 {
628 event->ignore();
629 return;
630 }
631 if(!event->isAutoRepeat())
632 key(event->nativeVirtualKey(), event->text().toUtf8().constData(), false);
633 }
634
635 private:
636 void tick_timeout()
637 {
638 if(g_event_blocked)
639 return;
640
641 if(m_request == WR_Null)
642 sendTick();
643 else
644 {
645 if(m_request == WR_NeedExit)
646 getWidget()->close();
647 else if(m_request == WR_NeedHide)
648 getWidget()->hide();
649 m_request = WR_Null;
650 }
651 }
652
653 void update_timeout()
654 {
655 if(g_event_blocked)
656 return;
657 if(m_paintcount == 0)
658 m_update_timer.stop();
659 getWidgetForPaint()->update();
660 }
661
662 void tooltip_timeout()
663 {
664 if(g_event_blocked)
665 return;
666 m_tooltip_timer.stop();
667 point64 CursorPos;
668 if(Platform::Utility::GetCursorPosInWindow(CursorPos))
669 touch(TT_ToolTip, 0, CursorPos.x, CursorPos.y);
670 }
671
672 void longpress_timeout()
673 {
674 if(g_event_blocked)
675 return;
676 m_longpress_timer.stop();
677 touch(TT_LongPress, 0, m_longpress_x, m_longpress_y);
678 }
679
680 private:
681 ParentType m_parent_type;
682 buffer m_parent_buf;
683 void* m_parent_ptr;
684 View* m_view_manager;
685 View* m_next_manager;
686 View::UpdaterCB m_view_cb;
687 QWidget* m_view_data;
688 QWidget* m_paint_device;
689
690 private:
691 sint32 m_width;
692 sint32 m_height;
693 WidgetRequest m_request;
694 sint32 m_paintcount;
695 QTimer m_tick_timer;
696 QTimer m_update_timer;
697 QTimer m_tooltip_timer;
698 QTimer m_longpress_timer;
699 sint32 m_longpress_x;
700 sint32 m_longpress_y;
701 };
702
703 class GenericView : public QFrame
704 {
705 Q_OBJECT
706
707 public:
708 GenericView(QWidget* parent = nullptr) : QFrame(parent)
709 {
710 m_api = nullptr;
711
712 setMouseTracking(true);
713 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
714 setAutoFillBackground(false);
715 }
716
717 GenericView(View* manager, QString name, sint32 width, sint32 height, SizePolicy* policy)
718 {
719 BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
720 buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
721 BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_GenericView, (buffer) this, manager, updater, this, nullptr);
722 m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
723
724 m_name = name;
725 m_firstwidth = width;
726 m_firstheight = height;
727 m_closing = false;
728 setMinimumSize(policy->m_minwidth, policy->m_minheight);
729 setMaximumSize(policy->m_maxwidth, policy->m_maxheight);
730
731 setMouseTracking(true);
732 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
733 setAutoFillBackground(false);
734 }
735
736 GenericView(h_view view)
737 {
738 takeView(view);
739
740 setMouseTracking(true);
741 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
742 setAutoFillBackground(false);
743 }
744
745 virtual ~GenericView()
746 {
747 if(m_api && m_api->parentIsPtr())
748 Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
749 m_window.set_buf(nullptr);
750 }
751
752 GenericView(const GenericView* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
753 GenericView& operator=(const GenericView& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
754
755 protected:
756 void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
757 {
758 m_api->resize(event->size().width(), event->size().height());
759 }
760
761 void paintEvent(QPaintEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
762 {
763 if(m_api->hasViewManager())
764 m_api->paint();
765 else QFrame::paintEvent(event);
766 m_api->nextPaint();
767 }
768
769 protected:
770 void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
771 {
772 if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
773 {
774 m_closing = true;
775 m_window.set_buf(nullptr);
776 setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
777 }
778 }
779 void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
780 void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
781 void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
782 void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
783 void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
784 void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
785 void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
786 static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
787 {((GenericView*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
788
789 protected:
790 void takeView(h_view view)
791 {
792 GenericView* OldGenericView = cast(view);
793 m_api = OldGenericView->m_api;
794 OldGenericView->m_api = nullptr;
795
796 m_name = OldGenericView->m_name;
797 m_firstwidth = OldGenericView->m_firstwidth;
798 m_firstheight = OldGenericView->m_firstheight;
799 m_closing = false;
800 setMinimumSize(OldGenericView->minimumWidth(), OldGenericView->minimumHeight());
801 setMaximumSize(OldGenericView->maximumWidth(), OldGenericView->maximumHeight());
802 Buffer::Free((buffer) OldGenericView);
803
804 m_api->renewParent(this);
805 m_api->changeViewData(this);
806 view.clear_buf();
807 view.set_ptr(m_api); // 삭제책임은 GenericView에 이관하였기에
808 }
809
810 public:
811 inline const QString getName() const
812 {
813 return m_name;
814 }
815
816 inline const QSize getFirstSize() const
817 {
818 return QSize(m_firstwidth, m_firstheight);
819 }
820
821 inline bool closing() const
822 {
823 return m_closing;
824 }
825
826 inline void attachWindow(h_window window)
827 {
828 m_closing = false;
829 m_window = window;
830 }
831
832 public:
833 static GenericView* cast(h_view view)
834 {
835 ViewAPI* CurViewAPI = (ViewAPI*) view.get();
836 BOSS_ASSERT("타입정보가 일치하지 않습니다", CurViewAPI->getParentType() == ViewAPI::PT_GenericView);
837 return (GenericView*) CurViewAPI->getParent();
838 }
839
840 public:
841 static bool CloseAllWindows()
842 {
843 QList<QWindow*> processedWindows;
844 while(auto w = QApplication::activeModalWidget())
845 {
846 if(QWindow* window = w->windowHandle())
847 {
848 if(!window->close()) return false;
849 processedWindows.append(window);
850 }
851 }
852 for(auto w : QApplication::topLevelWidgets())
853 {
854 if(w->windowType() == Qt::Desktop)
855 continue;
856 if(QWindow* window = w->windowHandle())
857 {
858 if(!window->close()) return false;
859 processedWindows.append(window);
860 }
861 }
862 return true;
863 }
864
865 public:
866 ViewAPI* m_api;
867
868 private:
869 QString m_name;
870 sint32 m_firstwidth;
871 sint32 m_firstheight;
872 bool m_closing;
873 h_window m_window;
874 };
875
876 class GenericViewGL : public QOpenGLWidget, protected QOpenGLFunctions
877 {
878 Q_OBJECT
879
880 public:
881 GenericViewGL(QWidget* parent = nullptr) : QOpenGLWidget(parent)
882 {
883 m_api = nullptr;
884
885 m_fbo_update = true;
886 m_fbo = 0;
887 m_fbo_render = 0;
888 m_fbo_width = 0;
889 m_fbo_height = 0;
890
891 setMouseTracking(true);
892 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
893 setAutoFillBackground(false);
894 }
895
896 GenericViewGL(View* manager, QString name, sint32 width, sint32 height, SizePolicy* policy)
897 {
898 BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
899 buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
900 BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_GenericViewGL, (buffer) this, manager, updater, this, nullptr);
901 m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
902
903 m_fbo_update = true;
904 m_fbo = 0;
905 m_fbo_render = 0;
906 m_fbo_width = 0;
907 m_fbo_height = 0;
908
909 m_name = name;
910 m_firstwidth = width;
911 m_firstheight = height;
912 m_closing = false;
913 setMinimumSize(policy->m_minwidth, policy->m_minheight);
914 setMaximumSize(policy->m_maxwidth, policy->m_maxheight);
915
916 setMouseTracking(true);
917 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
918 setAutoFillBackground(false);
919 }
920
921 GenericViewGL(h_view view)
922 {
923 takeView(view);
924
925 setMouseTracking(true);
926 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
927 setAutoFillBackground(false);
928 }
929
930 virtual ~GenericViewGL()
931 {
932 if(m_api && m_api->parentIsPtr())
933 Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
934 m_window.set_buf(nullptr);
935
936 if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
937 {
938 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
939 f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
940 f->glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
941 }
942 }
943
944 GenericViewGL(const GenericViewGL* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
945 GenericViewGL& operator=(const GenericViewGL& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
946
947 protected:
948 void initializeGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
949 {
950 initializeOpenGLFunctions();
951 }
952
953 void resizeGL(int width, int height) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
954 {
955 m_fbo_update = true;
956 m_fbo_width = geometry().width();
957 m_fbo_height = geometry().height();
958 m_api->resize(m_fbo_width, m_fbo_height);
959 }
960
961 void paintGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
962 {
963 if(m_api->hasViewManager())
964 {
965 if(m_fbo_update)
966 {
967 m_fbo_update = false;
968 if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
969 {
970 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
971 if(m_fbo) f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
972 if(m_fbo_render) f->glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
973
974 f->glGenRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
975 f->glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, m_fbo_render);
976 f->glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_RGBA8, m_fbo_width, m_fbo_height);
977 f->glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, 0);
978
979 GLuint prevFbo = 0;
980 f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
981 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
982 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, m_fbo);
983 f->glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_RENDERBUFFER, m_fbo_render);
984 GLenum status = f->glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER);
985 BOSS_ASSERT("프레임버퍼의 생성에 실패하였습니다", status == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE);
986 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
987 }
988 }
989 m_api->paint();
990 }
991 else QOpenGLWidget::paintGL();
992 m_api->nextPaint();
993 }
994
995 protected:
996 void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
997 {
998 if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
999 {
1000 m_closing = true;
1001 m_window.set_buf(nullptr);
1002 setAttribute(Qt::WA_DeleteOnClose);
1003 }
1004 }
1005 void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1006 void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1007 void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
1008 void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
1009 void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
1010 void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
1011 void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
1012 static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
1013 {((GenericViewGL*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
1014
1015 protected:
1016 void takeView(h_view view)
1017 {
1018 GenericViewGL* OldGenericViewGL = cast(view);
1019 m_api = OldGenericViewGL->m_api;
1020 OldGenericViewGL->m_api = nullptr;
1021
1022 m_fbo_update = OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo_update;
1023 m_fbo = OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo;
1024 m_fbo_render = OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo_render;
1025 m_fbo_width = OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo_width;
1026 m_fbo_height = OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo_height;
1027 OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo = 0;
1028 OldGenericViewGL->m_fbo_render = 0;
1029
1030 m_name = OldGenericViewGL->m_name;
1031 m_firstwidth = OldGenericViewGL->m_firstwidth;
1032 m_firstheight = OldGenericViewGL->m_firstheight;
1033 m_closing = false;
1034 setMinimumSize(OldGenericViewGL->minimumWidth(), OldGenericViewGL->minimumHeight());
1035 setMaximumSize(OldGenericViewGL->maximumWidth(), OldGenericViewGL->maximumHeight());
1036 Buffer::Free((buffer) OldGenericViewGL);
1037
1038 m_api->renewParent(this);
1039 m_api->changeViewData(this);
1040 view.clear_buf();
1041 view.set_ptr(m_api); // 삭제책임은 GenericViewGL에 이관하였기에
1042 }
1043
1044 public:
1045 inline const QString getName() const
1046 {
1047 return m_name;
1048 }
1049
1050 inline const QSize getFirstSize() const
1051 {
1052 return QSize(m_firstwidth, m_firstheight);
1053 }
1054
1055 inline bool closing() const
1056 {
1057 return m_closing;
1058 }
1059
1060 inline void attachWindow(h_window window)
1061 {
1062 m_closing = false;
1063 m_window = window;
1064 }
1065
1066 public:
1067 static GenericViewGL* cast(h_view view)
1068 {
1069 ViewAPI* CurViewAPI = (ViewAPI*) view.get();
1070 BOSS_ASSERT("타입정보가 일치하지 않습니다", CurViewAPI->getParentType() == ViewAPI::PT_GenericViewGL);
1071 return (GenericViewGL*) CurViewAPI->getParent();
1072 }
1073
1074 public:
1075 static bool CloseAllWindows()
1076 {
1077 QList<QWindow*> processedWindows;
1078 while(auto w = QApplication::activeModalWidget())
1079 {
1080 if(QWindow* window = w->windowHandle())
1081 {
1082 if(!window->close()) return false;
1083 processedWindows.append(window);
1084 }
1085 }
1086 for(auto w : QApplication::topLevelWidgets())
1087 {
1088 if(w->windowType() == Qt::Desktop)
1089 continue;
1090 if(QWindow* window = w->windowHandle())
1091 {
1092 if(!window->close()) return false;
1093 processedWindows.append(window);
1094 }
1095 }
1096 return true;
1097 }
1098
1099 public:
1100 ViewAPI* m_api;
1101
1102 private:
1103 bool m_fbo_update;
1104 GLuint m_fbo;
1105 GLuint m_fbo_render;
1106 sint32 m_fbo_width;
1107 sint32 m_fbo_height;
1108
1109 private:
1110 QString m_name;
1111 sint32 m_firstwidth;
1112 sint32 m_firstheight;
1113 bool m_closing;
1114 h_window m_window;
1115 };
1116
1117 class MainViewGL : public QOpenGLWidget, protected QOpenGLFunctions
1118 {
1119 Q_OBJECT
1120
1121 public:
1122 MainViewGL(QWidget* parent) : QOpenGLWidget(parent)
1123 {
1124 BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
1125 buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
1126 BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_MainViewGL, (buffer) this, nullptr, updater, this, nullptr);
1127 m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
1128
1129 m_fbo_update = true;
1130 m_fbo = 0;
1131 m_fbo_render = 0;
1132 m_fbo_width = 0;
1133 m_fbo_height = 0;
1134
1135 // setAttribute(Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen); 이 항목이 있으면 update()가 안먹힘
1136 setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
1137 setAttribute(Qt::WA_AcceptTouchEvents);
1138 setMouseTracking(true);
1139 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
1140 setAutoFillBackground(false);
1141 }
1142
1143 virtual ~MainViewGL()
1144 {
1145 if(m_api->parentIsPtr())
1146 Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
1147 if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
1148 {
1149 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
1150 f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
1151 f->glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
1152 }
1153 }
1154
1155 MainViewGL(const MainViewGL* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
1156 MainViewGL& operator=(const MainViewGL& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
1157
1158 public:
1159 void onActivateEvent(bool actived)
1160 {
1161 m_api->onActivateEvent(actived);
1162 }
1163 void onCloseEvent(QCloseEvent* event)
1164 {
1165 if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
1166 GenericView::CloseAllWindows();
1167 }
1168
1169 protected:
1170 void initializeGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1171 {
1172 initializeOpenGLFunctions();
1173 }
1174
1175 void resizeGL(int width, int height) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1176 {
1177 m_fbo_update = true;
1178 m_fbo_width = geometry().width();
1179 m_fbo_height = geometry().height();
1180 m_api->resize(m_fbo_width, m_fbo_height);
1181 }
1182
1183 void paintGL() Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1184 {
1185 if(m_api->hasViewManager())
1186 {
1187 if(m_fbo_update)
1188 {
1189 m_fbo_update = false;
1190 if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
1191 {
1192 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
1193 if(m_fbo) f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
1194 if(m_fbo_render) f->glDeleteRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
1195
1196 f->glGenRenderbuffers(1, &m_fbo_render);
1197 f->glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, m_fbo_render);
1198 f->glRenderbufferStorage(GL_RENDERBUFFER, GL_RGBA8, m_fbo_width, m_fbo_height);
1199 f->glBindRenderbuffer(GL_RENDERBUFFER, 0);
1200
1201 GLuint prevFbo = 0;
1202 f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &m_fbo);
1203 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
1204 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, m_fbo);
1205 f->glFramebufferRenderbuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_RENDERBUFFER, m_fbo_render);
1206 GLenum status = f->glCheckFramebufferStatus(GL_FRAMEBUFFER);
1207 BOSS_ASSERT("프레임버퍼의 생성에 실패하였습니다", status == GL_FRAMEBUFFER_COMPLETE);
1208 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
1209 }
1210 }
1211 m_api->paint();
1212 }
1213 else QOpenGLWidget::paintGL();
1214 m_api->nextPaint();
1215 }
1216
1217 protected:
1218 void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->closeEvent(event);}
1219 void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1220 void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1221 void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
1222 void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
1223 void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
1224 void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
1225 void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
1226 static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
1227 {((MainViewGL*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
1228
1229 public:
1230 ViewAPI* m_api;
1231
1232 private:
1233 bool m_fbo_update;
1234 GLuint m_fbo;
1235 GLuint m_fbo_render;
1236 sint32 m_fbo_width;
1237 sint32 m_fbo_height;
1238 };
1239
1240 class MainViewMDI : public QMdiArea
1241 {
1242 Q_OBJECT
1243
1244 public:
1245 MainViewMDI(QWidget* parent) : QMdiArea(parent)
1246 {
1247 BOSS_DECLARE_BUFFERED_CLASS(BufferedViewAPI, ViewAPI, PT_Null, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr, nullptr);
1248 buffer NewAPI = Buffer::AllocNoConstructorOnce<BufferedViewAPI>(BOSS_DBG 1);
1249 BOSS_CONSTRUCTOR(NewAPI, 0, ViewAPI, ViewAPI::PT_MainViewMDI, (buffer) this, nullptr, updater, this, viewport());
1250 m_api = (ViewAPI*) NewAPI;
1251
1252 m_width = 0;
1253 m_height = 0;
1254
1255 setAttribute(Qt::WA_PaintOnScreen);
1256 setAttribute(Qt::WA_NoSystemBackground);
1257 setAttribute(Qt::WA_AcceptTouchEvents);
1258 setMouseTracking(true);
1259 setFocusPolicy(Qt::ClickFocus);
1260 setAutoFillBackground(false);
1261 }
1262
1263 virtual ~MainViewMDI()
1264 {
1265 if(m_api->parentIsPtr())
1266 Buffer::Free((buffer) m_api);
1267 }
1268
1269 MainViewMDI(const MainViewMDI* rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
1270 MainViewMDI& operator=(const MainViewMDI& rhs) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
1271
1272 public:
1273 void onActivateEvent(bool actived)
1274 {
1275 m_api->onActivateEvent(actived);
1276 }
1277 void onCloseEvent(QCloseEvent* event)
1278 {
1279 if(m_api->closeEvent(event))
1280 GenericView::CloseAllWindows();
1281 }
1282
1283 protected:
1284 void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1285 {
1286 m_width = event->size().width();
1287 m_height = event->size().height();
1288 m_api->resize(m_width, m_height);
1289 }
1290
1291 void paintEvent(QPaintEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1292 {
1293 if(m_api->hasViewManager())
1294 m_api->paint();
1295 else QMdiArea::paintEvent(event);
1296 m_api->nextPaint();
1297 }
1298
1299 protected:
1300 void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->closeEvent(event);}
1301 void mousePressEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1302 void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mousePressEvent(event);}
1303 void mouseMoveEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseMoveEvent(event);}
1304 void mouseReleaseEvent(QMouseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->mouseReleaseEvent(event);}
1305 void wheelEvent(QWheelEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->wheelEvent(event);}
1306 void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyPressEvent(event);}
1307 void keyReleaseEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE {m_api->keyReleaseEvent(event);}
1308 static void updater(void* data, sint32 count)
1309 {((MainViewMDI*) data)->m_api->update(count);}
1310
1311 public:
1312 ViewAPI* m_api;
1313
1314 private:
1315 sint32 m_width;
1316 sint32 m_height;
1317 };
1318
1319 class WidgetBox
1320 {
1321 public:
1322 WidgetBox()
1323 {
1324 m_view = nullptr;
1325 m_widget = nullptr;
1326 }
1327 ~WidgetBox()
1328 {
1329 if(m_view && !m_view->closing())
1330 delete m_view;
1331 }
1332
1333 void setWidget(GenericView* view, QWidget* widget)
1334 {
1335 m_view = view;
1336 m_widget = widget;
1337 }
1338
1339 private:
1340 GenericView* m_view;
1341 QWidget* m_widget;
1342 };
1343
1344 class TrayIcon : public QSystemTrayIcon
1345 {
1346 Q_OBJECT
1347
1348 public:
1349 TrayIcon(QWidget* menu)
1350 {
1351 m_ref_menu = menu;
1352 Qt::WindowFlags TypeCollector = Qt::Dialog;
1353 TypeCollector |= Qt::FramelessWindowHint;
1354 TypeCollector |= Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint;
1355 m_ref_menu->setWindowFlags(TypeCollector);
1356 m_ref_menu->installEventFilter(this);
1357 connect(this, SIGNAL(activated(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason)),
1358 this, SLOT(iconActivated(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason)));
1359 }
1360 ~TrayIcon()
1361 {
1362 }
1363
1364 private slots:
1365 void iconActivated(QSystemTrayIcon::ActivationReason reason)
1366 {
1367 switch(reason)
1368 {
1369 case QSystemTrayIcon::Context: // R버튼 클릭
1370 case QSystemTrayIcon::Trigger: // L버튼 클릭
1371 case QSystemTrayIcon::MiddleClick: // 휠버튼 클릭
1372 {
1373 const QPoint ClickPos = QCursor::pos();
1374 const QSize MenuSize = m_ref_menu->size();
1375 const QRect GeometryRect = QApplication::desktop()->screenGeometry(ClickPos);
1376 const float PosX = (GeometryRect.right() < ClickPos.x() + MenuSize.width())?
1377 ClickPos.x() - MenuSize.width() : ClickPos.x();
1378 const float PosY = (GeometryRect.bottom() < ClickPos.y() + MenuSize.height())?
1379 ClickPos.y() - MenuSize.height() : ClickPos.y();
1380 m_ref_menu->move(PosX, PosY);
1381 m_ref_menu->show();
1382 m_ref_menu->activateWindow(); // setFocus()는 작동하지 않는다!
1383 m_ref_menu->raise(); // 부모기준 첫번째 자식으로 올림
1384 }
1385 break;
1386 case QSystemTrayIcon::DoubleClick: // L버튼 더블클릭된 순간
1387 break;
1388 default:
1389 break;
1390 }
1391 }
1392
1393 private:
1394 bool eventFilter(QObject* watched, QEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1395 {
1396 if(watched == m_ref_menu && event->type() == QEvent::FocusOut)
1397 {
1398 m_ref_menu->hide();
1399 return true;
1400 }
1401 return QObject::eventFilter(watched, event);
1402 }
1403
1404 private:
1405 QWidget* m_ref_menu;
1406 };
1407
1408 class TrayBox
1409 {
1410 public:
1411 TrayBox()
1412 {
1413 m_tray = nullptr;
1414 }
1415 ~TrayBox()
1416 {
1417 delete m_tray;
1418 }
1419
1420 void setWidget(GenericView* view, QIcon* icon)
1421 {
1422 QWidget* OldWidget = view->m_api->getWidget();
1423 OldWidget->resize(view->getFirstSize());
1424 m_tray = new TrayIcon(OldWidget);
1425 if(icon) m_tray->setIcon(*icon);
1426 m_tray->show();
1427 }
1428
1429 void setWidgetGL(GenericViewGL* view, QIcon* icon)
1430 {
1431 QWidget* OldWidget = view->m_api->getWidget();
1432 OldWidget->resize(view->getFirstSize());
1433 m_tray = new TrayIcon(OldWidget);
1434 if(icon) m_tray->setIcon(*icon);
1435 m_tray->show();
1436 }
1437
1438 private:
1439 TrayIcon* m_tray;
1440 };
1441
1442 class MainData
1443 {
1444 public:
1445 enum class WindowType {Normal, Minimize, Maximize};
1446 WindowType m_lastWindowType;
1447 rect128 m_lastWindowNormalRect;
1448
1449 public:
1450 MainData(QMainWindow* parent) :
1451 m_lastWindowType(WindowType::Normal), m_lastWindowNormalRect({0, 0, 0, 0})
1452 {
1453 m_parent = parent;
1454 m_viewGL = nullptr;
1455 m_viewMDI = nullptr;
1456 }
1457 ~MainData() {}
1458
1459 public:
1460 void onActivateEvent(bool actived)
1461 {
1462 if(m_viewGL)
1463 m_viewGL->onActivateEvent(actived);
1464 else if(m_viewMDI)
1465 m_viewMDI->onActivateEvent(actived);
1466 }
1467
1468 void onCloseEvent(QCloseEvent* event)
1469 {
1470 Platform::Popup::CloseAllTracker();
1471 if(m_viewGL)
1472 m_viewGL->onCloseEvent(event);
1473 else if(m_viewMDI)
1474 {
1475 m_viewMDI->closeAllSubWindows();
1476 if(m_viewMDI->currentSubWindow())
1477 event->ignore();
1478 else event->accept();
1479 }
1480 }
1481
1482 public:
1483 void initForGL(bool frameless, bool topmost)
1484 {
1485 m_viewGL = new MainViewGL(m_parent);
1486 m_viewGL->m_api->renewParent(m_viewGL);
1487 // Qt5.9.1부터는 m_parent->setCentralWidget(m_viewGL)식의 접합은
1488 // 윈도우즈OS에서 다중 모니터상황에서 레이아웃의 정렬불량 문제가 발생
1489 QWidget* MainWidget = new QWidget();
1490 QHBoxLayout* MainLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
1491 MainLayout->setMargin(0);
1492 MainLayout->addWidget(m_viewGL);
1493 MainWidget->setLayout(MainLayout);
1494 m_parent->setCentralWidget(MainWidget);
1495
1496 Qt::WindowFlags TypeCollector = Qt::Widget;
1497 if(frameless)
1498 {
1499 #if BOSS_MAC_OSX
1500 TypeCollector |= Qt::CustomizeWindowHint | Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint | Qt::WindowCloseButtonHint;
1501 #elif BOSS_WINDOWS | BOSS_LINUX
1502 TypeCollector |= Qt::FramelessWindowHint;
1503 #endif
1504 // Frameless에서의 그림자기능 연구중!
1505 //MainWidget->setAttribute(Qt::WA_TranslucentBackground);
1506 //MainWidget->layout()->setMargin(9);
1507 //QGraphicsDropShadowEffect* NewEffect = new QGraphicsDropShadowEffect();
1508 //NewEffect->setBlurRadius(9);
1509 //NewEffect->setOffset(4);
1510 //MainWidget->setGraphicsEffect(NewEffect);
1511 }
1512 if(topmost)
1513 TypeCollector |= Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint;
1514 if(TypeCollector != Qt::Widget)
1515 m_parent->setWindowFlags(TypeCollector);
1516 }
1517
1518 void initForMDI(bool frameless, bool topmost)
1519 {
1520 m_viewMDI = new MainViewMDI(m_parent);
1521 m_viewMDI->m_api->renewParent(m_viewMDI);
1522 m_parent->setCentralWidget(m_viewMDI);
1523
1524 Qt::WindowFlags TypeCollector = Qt::Widget;
1525 if(frameless)
1526 {
1527 #if BOSS_MAC_OSX
1528 TypeCollector |= Qt::CustomizeWindowHint | Qt::WindowMinimizeButtonHint | Qt::WindowCloseButtonHint;
1529 #elif BOSS_WINDOWS | BOSS_LINUX
1530 TypeCollector |= Qt::FramelessWindowHint;
1531 #endif
1532 }
1533 if(topmost)
1534 TypeCollector |= Qt::WindowStaysOnTopHint;
1535 if(TypeCollector != Qt::Widget)
1536 m_parent->setWindowFlags(TypeCollector);
1537 }
1538
1539 ViewAPI* getMainAPI()
1540 {
1541 BOSS_ASSERT("GL/MDI의 초기화가 되어있지 않습니다", m_viewGL || m_viewMDI);
1542 if(m_viewGL) return m_viewGL->m_api;
1543 return m_viewMDI->m_api;
1544 }
1545
1546 QOpenGLWidget* getGLWidget()
1547 {
1548 return m_viewGL;
1549 }
1550
1551 QWidget* bindWidget(GenericView* view)
1552 {
1553 BOSS_ASSERT("GL/MDI의 초기화가 되어있지 않습니다", m_viewGL || m_viewMDI);
1554 if(m_viewGL) return view->m_api->getWidget();
1555 return m_viewMDI->addSubWindow(view->m_api->getWidget());
1556 }
1557
1558 public:
1559 QMenu* getMenu(chars name)
1560 {
1561 QMenu** Result = m_menuMap.Access(name);
1562 if(!Result)
1563 {
1564 m_menuMap(name) = g_window->menuBar()->addMenu(QString::fromUtf8(name, -1));
1565 Result = m_menuMap.Access(name);
1566 }
1567 return *Result;
1568 }
1569
1570 QToolBar* getToolbar(chars name)
1571 {
1572 QToolBar** Result = m_toolbarMap.Access(name);
1573 if(!Result)
1574 {
1575 m_toolbarMap(name) = g_window->addToolBar(QString::fromUtf8(name, -1));
1576 Result = m_toolbarMap.Access(name);
1577 }
1578 return *Result;
1579 }
1580
1581 private:
1582 QMainWindow* m_parent;
1583 MainViewGL* m_viewGL;
1584 MainViewMDI* m_viewMDI;
1585 Map<QMenu*> m_menuMap;
1586 Map<QToolBar*> m_toolbarMap;
1587 };
1588
1589 class MainWindow : public QMainWindow
1590 {
1591 Q_OBJECT
1592
1593 public:
1594 MainWindow() : m_window_pos({0, 0}), m_window_pos_old({0, 0}), m_window_size({0, 0}), m_window_size_old({0, 0})
1595 {
1596 setUnifiedTitleAndToolBarOnMac(true);
1597 g_data = new MainData(this);
1598 connect(&m_msec_timer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &MainWindow::msec_timeout);
1599 m_msec_timer.start(1);
1600 m_msec_old = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
1601 m_inited_platform = false;
1602 m_first_visible = true;
1603 }
1604
1605 ~MainWindow()
1606 {
1607 m_msec_timer.stop();
1608 delete g_data;
1609 g_data = nullptr;
1610 }
1611
1612 public:
1613 void SetInitedPlatform() {m_inited_platform = true;}
1614 bool initedPlatform() const {return m_inited_platform;}
1615 void SetFirstVisible(bool visible) {m_first_visible = visible;}
1616 bool firstVisible() const {return m_first_visible;}
1617
1618 protected:
1619 void moveEvent(QMoveEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1620 {
1621 m_window_pos_old = m_window_pos;
1622 auto CurPos = event->pos();
1623 m_window_pos.x = CurPos.x();
1624 m_window_pos.y = CurPos.y();
1625 }
1626
1627 void resizeEvent(QResizeEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1628 {
1629 m_window_size_old = m_window_size;
1630 auto CurSize = event->size();
1631 m_window_size.w = CurSize.width();
1632 m_window_size.h = CurSize.height();
1633 QWidget::resizeEvent(event);
1634 }
1635
1636 void changeEvent(QEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1637 {
1638 auto EventType = event->type();
1639 if(EventType == QEvent::WindowStateChange)
1640 {
1641 switch(windowState())
1642 {
1643 case Qt::WindowNoState:
1644 if(g_data->m_lastWindowType != MainData::WindowType::Normal)
1645 {
1646 g_data->m_lastWindowType = MainData::WindowType::Normal;
1647 auto& CurRect = geometry();
1648 const auto NewRect = QRect(g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l, g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t,
1649 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.r - g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l,
1650 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.b - g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t);
1651 if(CurRect != NewRect)
1652 setGeometry(NewRect);
1653 }
1654 break;
1655 case Qt::WindowMinimized:
1656 if(g_data->m_lastWindowType == MainData::WindowType::Normal)
1657 {
1658 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l = m_window_pos.x;
1659 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t = m_window_pos.y;
1660 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.r = m_window_pos.x + m_window_size.w;
1661 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.b = m_window_pos.y + m_window_size.h;
1662 }
1663 g_data->m_lastWindowType = MainData::WindowType::Minimize;
1664 break;
1665 case Qt::WindowMaximized:
1666 case Qt::WindowFullScreen:
1667 if(g_data->m_lastWindowType == MainData::WindowType::Normal)
1668 {
1669 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.l = m_window_pos_old.x;
1670 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.t = m_window_pos_old.y;
1671 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.r = m_window_pos_old.x + m_window_size_old.w;
1672 g_data->m_lastWindowNormalRect.b = m_window_pos_old.y + m_window_size_old.h;
1673 }
1674 g_data->m_lastWindowType = MainData::WindowType::Maximize;
1675 break;
1676 }
1677 }
1678 else if(EventType == QEvent::ActivationChange)
1679 g_data->onActivateEvent(isActiveWindow());
1680 QWidget::changeEvent(event);
1681 }
1682
1683 void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1684 {
1685 g_data->onCloseEvent(event);
1686 }
1687
1688 private slots:
1689 void OnSlot()
1690 {
1691 }
1692
1693 private:
1694 void msec_timeout()
1695 {
1696 if(g_event_blocked)
1697 return;
1698
1699 PlatformImpl::Core::FlushProcedure();
1700 PlatformImpl::Core::LockProcedure();
1701
1702 const uint64 NewMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
1703 for(sint32 i = 0, iend = PlatformImpl::Core::GetProcedureCount(); i < iend; ++i)
1704 {
1705 if(auto CurProcedureCB = PlatformImpl::Core::GetProcedureCB(i, m_msec_old, NewMsec))
1706 CurProcedureCB(PlatformImpl::Core::GetProcedureData(i));
1707 }
1708 m_msec_old = NewMsec;
1709
1710 PlatformImpl::Core::UnlockProcedure();
1711 }
1712
1713 private:
1714 point64 m_window_pos;
1715 point64 m_window_pos_old;
1716 size64 m_window_size;
1717 size64 m_window_size_old;
1718 QTimer m_msec_timer;
1719 uint64 m_msec_old;
1720 bool m_inited_platform;
1721 bool m_first_visible;
1722 };
1723
1724 class StackMessage
1725 {
1726 public:
1727 static StackMessage& Me()
1728 {static StackMessage _; return _;}
1729
1730 public:
1731 void Push()
1732 {
1733 m_strings.AtAdding();
1734 }
1735
1736 void Pop()
1737 {
1738 BOSS_ASSERT("StackMessage의 Pop이 초과됩니다", 0 < m_strings.Count());
1739 m_strings.SubtractionOne();
1740 }
1741
1742 sint32 Count()
1743 {
1744 return m_strings.Count();
1745 }
1746
1747 String Get(String str)
1748 {
1749 BOSS_ASSERT("StackMessage의 Push가 부족합니다", 0 < m_strings.Count());
1750 m_strings.At(-1) = str;
1751 String Result;
1752 for(sint32 i = 0, iend = m_strings.Count(); i < iend; ++i)
1753 {
1754 if(0 < i) Result += " → ";
1755 Result += m_strings[i];
1756 }
1757 return Result;
1758 }
1759
1760 private:
1761 StackMessage()
1762 {
1763 }
1764 ~StackMessage()
1765 {
1766 }
1767
1768 Strings m_strings;
1769 };
1770
1771 class Tracker
1772 {
1773 typedef void (*ExitCB)(void*);
1774
1775 public:
1776 Tracker(QWidget* parent, ExitCB exit, void* data)
1777 {
1778 m_parent = parent;
1779 m_exit = exit;
1780 m_data = data;
1781 m_next = nullptr;
1782 if(m_parent)
1783 Top().Insert(this);
1784 }
1785
1786 ~Tracker()
1787 {
1788 if(m_parent)
1789 Top().Remove(this);
1790 }
1791
1792 public:
1793 void Lock()
1794 {
1795 m_loop.exec();
1796 }
1797
1798 void Unlock()
1799 {
1800 m_loop.quit();
1801 }
1802
1803 static void CloseAll(QWidget* parent)
1804 {
1805 Tracker* CurNode = Top().m_next;
1806 while(CurNode)
1807 {
1808 Tracker* NextNode = CurNode->m_next;
1809 if(CurNode->m_parent == parent)
1810 {
1811 Top().Remove(CurNode);
1812 CurNode->m_exit(CurNode->m_data);
1813 }
1814 CurNode = NextNode;
1815 }
1816 }
1817
1818 static bool HasAnyone(QWidget* parent)
1819 {
1820 Tracker* CurNode = Top().m_next;
1821 while(CurNode)
1822 {
1823 Tracker* NextNode = CurNode->m_next;
1824 if(CurNode->m_parent == parent)
1825 return true;
1826 CurNode = NextNode;
1827 }
1828 return false;
1829 }
1830
1831 private:
1832 void Insert(Tracker* rhs)
1833 {
1834 rhs->m_next = m_next;
1835 m_next = rhs;
1836 }
1837
1838 void Remove(Tracker* rhs)
1839 {
1840 Tracker* CurNode = this;
1841 while(CurNode)
1842 {
1843 if(CurNode->m_next == rhs)
1844 {
1845 CurNode->m_next = CurNode->m_next->m_next;
1846 break;
1847 }
1848 CurNode = CurNode->m_next;
1849 }
1850 }
1851
1852 static Tracker& Top()
1853 {static Tracker _(nullptr, nullptr, nullptr); return _;}
1854
1855 private:
1856 QWidget* m_parent;
1857 QEventLoop m_loop;
1858 ExitCB m_exit;
1859 void* m_data;
1860 Tracker* m_next;
1861 };
1862
1863 class EditTracker : public QLineEdit
1864 {
1865 Q_OBJECT
1866
1867 public:
1868 enum TrackerClosingType {TCT_Null, TCT_Enter, TCT_Escape, TCT_FocusOut, TCT_ForcedExit};
1869
1870 public:
1871 EditTracker(UIEditType type, const QString& contents, QWidget* parent)
1872 : QLineEdit(contents, nullptr), m_tracker(parent, OnExit, this)
1873 {
1874 if(parent)
1875 m_parentpos = parent->mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0));
1876 else m_parentpos = QPoint(0, 0);
1877
1878 m_closing = TCT_Null;
1879 #if BOSS_WINDOWS
1880 setWindowFlags(Qt::ToolTip | Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
1881 #else
1882 setWindowFlags(Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
1883 #endif
1884 setFrame(false);
1885 selectAll();
1886
1887 switch(type)
1888 {
1889 case UIET_Int: setValidator(new QIntValidator(this)); break;
1890 case UIET_Float: setValidator(new QDoubleValidator(this)); break;
1891 default: break;
1892 }
1893
1894 QPalette Palette = palette();
1895 Palette.setColor(QPalette::Base, QColor(255, 255, 255));
1896 Palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, QColor(0, 0, 0));
1897 setPalette(Palette);
1898 }
1899
1900 ~EditTracker() override
1901 {
1902 }
1903
1904 TrackerClosingType Popup(sint32 x, sint32 y, sint32 w, sint32 h)
1905 {
1906 move(m_parentpos.x() + x, m_parentpos.y() + y);
1907 resize(w, h);
1908 show();
1909 activateWindow();
1910 setFocus();
1911 m_tracker.Lock();
1912 return m_closing;
1913 }
1914
1915 protected:
1916 static void OnExit(void* data)
1917 {
1918 EditTracker* This = (EditTracker*) data;
1919 if(This->m_closing == TCT_Null)
1920 This->m_closing = TCT_ForcedExit;
1921 This->close();
1922 This->m_tracker.Unlock();
1923 }
1924
1925 private:
1926 void focusOutEvent(QFocusEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1927 {
1928 if(m_closing == TCT_Null)
1929 m_closing = TCT_FocusOut;
1930 close();
1931 m_tracker.Unlock();
1932 }
1933
1934 void keyPressEvent(QKeyEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
1935 {
1936 if(event->nativeVirtualKey() == 13) // Enter
1937 {
1938 if(m_closing == TCT_Null)
1939 m_closing = TCT_Enter;
1940 close();
1941 m_tracker.Unlock();
1942 }
1943 else if(event->nativeVirtualKey() == 27) // Esc
1944 {
1945 if(m_closing == TCT_Null)
1946 m_closing = TCT_Escape;
1947 close();
1948 m_tracker.Unlock();
1949 }
1950 else QLineEdit::keyPressEvent(event);
1951 }
1952
1953 private:
1954 Tracker m_tracker;
1955 TrackerClosingType m_closing;
1956 QPoint m_parentpos;
1957 };
1958
1959 class ListTracker : public QListWidget
1960 {
1961 Q_OBJECT
1962
1963 public:
1964 ListTracker(const Strings& strings, QWidget* parent)
1965 : QListWidget(nullptr), m_tracker(parent, OnExit, this)
1966 {
1967 for(sint32 i = 0, iend = strings.Count(); i < iend; ++i)
1968 {
1969 QListWidgetItem* NewItem = new QListWidgetItem(QString::fromUtf8(strings[i], -1), this);
1970 NewItem->setTextAlignment(Qt::AlignCenter);
1971 addItem(NewItem);
1972 }
1973
1974 if(parent)
1975 m_parentpos = parent->mapToGlobal(QPoint(0, 0));
1976 else m_parentpos = QPoint(0, 0);
1977
1978 m_select = -1;
1979 #if BOSS_WINDOWS
1980 setWindowFlags(Qt::ToolTip | Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
1981 #else
1982 setWindowFlags(Qt::FramelessWindowHint);
1983 #endif
1984
1985 connect(this, SIGNAL(itemPressed(QListWidgetItem*)), SLOT(onItemPressed(QListWidgetItem*)));
1986 }
1987
1988 ~ListTracker()
1989 {
1990 }
1991
1992 sint32 Popup(sint32 x, sint32 y, sint32 w, sint32 h)
1993 {
1994 move(m_parentpos.x() + x, m_parentpos.y() + y);
1995 resize(w, h);
1996 show();
1997 activateWindow();
1998 setFocus();
1999 m_tracker.Lock();
2000 return m_select;
2001 }
2002
2003 protected:
2004 static void OnExit(void* data)
2005 {
2006 ListTracker* This = (ListTracker*) data;
2007 This->m_select = -1;
2008 This->close();
2009 This->m_tracker.Unlock();
2010 }
2011
2012 private:
2013 void focusOutEvent(QFocusEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
2014 {
2015 close();
2016 m_tracker.Unlock();
2017 }
2018
2019 private slots:
2020 void onItemPressed(QListWidgetItem* item)
2021 {
2022 m_select = row(item);
2023 close();
2024 m_tracker.Unlock();
2025 }
2026
2027 private:
2028 Tracker m_tracker;
2029 sint32 m_select;
2030 QPoint m_parentpos;
2031 };
2032
2033 class OpenGLClass
2034 {
2035 private:
2036 OpenGLClass()
2037 {
2038 mVShader[0] = mVShader[1] = 0;
2039 mFShader[0] = mFShader[1] = 0;
2040 mProgram[0] = mProgram[1] = 0;
2041 if(QOpenGLContext::currentContext()->isOpenGLES())
2042 InitShaderGLES30();
2043 else InitShaderGL();
2044 const uint08 SampleBGRA[4] = {255, 255, 255, 255};
2045 mFillTexture = Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(false, false, 1, 1, SampleBGRA);
2046 }
2047 ~OpenGLClass()
2048 {
2049 Platform::Graphics::RemoveTexture(mFillTexture);
2050 TermShader();
2051 }
2052
2053 public:
2054 static OpenGLClass& ST()
2055 {static OpenGLClass _; return _;}
2056
2057 public:
2058 void FillRect(uint32 fbo, const BOSS::Rect& rect, const BOSS::Color& color)
2059 {
2060 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2061 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2062 const float DeviceRatio = Platform::Utility::GetPixelRatio();
2063
2064 GLuint prevFbo = 0;
2065 if(fbo != 0)
2066 {
2067 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
2068 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
2069 TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2070 }
2071
2072 GLint ViewPortValues[4] = {0};
2073 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, ViewPortValues);
2074 const GLint Width = ViewPortValues[2];
2075 const GLint Height = ViewPortValues[3];
2076 BOSS::Rect NewRect;
2077 NewRect.l = 2 * rect.l / Width - 1;
2078 NewRect.t = 1 - 2 * rect.t / Height;
2079 NewRect.r = 2 * rect.r / Width - 1;
2080 NewRect.b = 1 - 2 * rect.b / Height;
2081
2082 f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
2083 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(mFillTexture));
2084 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2085 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2086 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
2087 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
2088
2089 f->glUseProgram(mProgram[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2090 f->glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2091 f->glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2092 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2093 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2094 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(TexCoordsID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2095 f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2096 f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2097 f->glVertexAttribPointer(TexCoordsID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].texcoords[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2098 f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[0], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2099
2100 f->glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2101 f->glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2102 f->glEnable(GL_BLEND); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2103 f->glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2104 f->glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2105 const float Zoom = CanvasClass::get()->zoom() * DeviceRatio;
2106 const QRect& CurScissor = CanvasClass::get()->scissor();
2107 const int ScreenHeight = CanvasClass::get()->painter().window().height() / Zoom;
2108 f->glScissor(CurScissor.x() * Zoom,
2109 (ScreenHeight - (CurScissor.y() + CurScissor.height())) * Zoom,
2110 CurScissor.width() * Zoom,
2111 CurScissor.height() * Zoom);
2112
2113 mAttrib[0].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
2114 mAttrib[0].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
2115 mAttrib[0].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2116 mAttrib[0].texcoords[0] = 0;
2117 mAttrib[0].texcoords[1] = 0;
2118 mAttrib[1].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
2119 mAttrib[1].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
2120 mAttrib[1].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2121 mAttrib[1].texcoords[0] = 1;
2122 mAttrib[1].texcoords[1] = 0;
2123 mAttrib[2].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
2124 mAttrib[2].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
2125 mAttrib[2].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2126 mAttrib[2].texcoords[0] = 0;
2127 mAttrib[2].texcoords[1] = 1;
2128 mAttrib[3].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
2129 mAttrib[3].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
2130 mAttrib[3].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2131 mAttrib[3].texcoords[0] = 1;
2132 mAttrib[3].texcoords[1] = 1;
2133 f->glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2134
2135 if(fbo != 0)
2136 {
2137 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
2138 TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2139 }
2140 }
2141 void DrawPixmap(uint32 fbo, float x, float y, const BOSS::Point (&ps)[3],
2142 const QPixmap& pixmap, const BOSS::Point (&ips)[3], const BOSS::Color (&colors)[3])
2143 {
2144 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2145 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2146 const float DeviceRatio = (fbo == 0)? Platform::Utility::GetPixelRatio() : 1;
2147
2148 GLuint prevFbo = 0;
2149 if(fbo != 0)
2150 {
2151 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
2152 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
2153 TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2154 }
2155
2156 GLint ViewPortValues[4] = {0};
2157 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, ViewPortValues);
2158 #if BOSS_ANDROID
2159 const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2] / 4;
2160 const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3] / 4;
2161 #else
2162 const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2] / DeviceRatio;
2163 const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3] / DeviceRatio;
2164 #endif
2165
2166 auto CurContext = QGLContext::fromOpenGLContext(ctx);
2167 GLuint CurTexture = CurContext->bindTexture(pixmap);
2168 f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
2169 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, CurTexture);
2170 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2171 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2172 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2173 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2174
2175 f->glUseProgram(mProgram[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2176 f->glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2177 f->glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2178 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2179 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2180 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(TexCoordsID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2181 f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2182 f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2183 f->glVertexAttribPointer(TexCoordsID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].texcoords[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2184 f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[0], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2185
2186 f->glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2187 f->glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2188 f->glEnable(GL_BLEND); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2189 f->glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2190 f->glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2191 const float Zoom = CanvasClass::get()->zoom() * DeviceRatio;
2192 const QRect& CurScissor = CanvasClass::get()->scissor();
2193 const int ScreenHeight = CanvasClass::get()->painter().window().height() / Zoom;
2194 f->glScissor(CurScissor.x() * Zoom,
2195 (ScreenHeight - (CurScissor.y() + CurScissor.height())) * Zoom,
2196 CurScissor.width() * Zoom,
2197 CurScissor.height() * Zoom);
2198
2199 const bool NeedReverse = true;
2200 for(int i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
2201 {
2202 mAttrib[i].vertices[0] = 2 * (x + ps[i].x) * Zoom / DstWidth - 1;
2203 mAttrib[i].vertices[1] = 1 - 2 * (y + ps[i].y) * Zoom / DstHeight;
2204 mAttrib[i].color32 = colors[i].ToABGR();
2205 mAttrib[i].texcoords[0] = ips[i].x;
2206 mAttrib[i].texcoords[1] = (NeedReverse)? 1 - ips[i].y : ips[i].y;
2207 }
2208 f->glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 3); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2209
2210 if(fbo != 0)
2211 {
2212 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
2213 TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2214 }
2215 }
2216 void DrawTexture(uint32 fbo, const BOSS::Rect& rect, id_texture_read tex, const BOSS::Rect& texrect, const BOSS::Color& color, orientationtype ori, bool antialiasing)
2217 {
2218 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2219 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2220 const float DeviceRatio = Platform::Utility::GetPixelRatio();
2221
2222 GLuint prevFbo = 0;
2223 if(fbo != 0)
2224 {
2225 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
2226 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
2227 TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2228 }
2229
2230 GLint ViewPortValues[4] = {0};
2231 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_VIEWPORT, ViewPortValues);
2232 #if BOSS_ANDROID
2233 const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2] / 4;
2234 const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3] / 4;
2235 #else
2236 const GLint DstWidth = ViewPortValues[2] / DeviceRatio;
2237 const GLint DstHeight = ViewPortValues[3] / DeviceRatio;
2238 #endif
2239 BOSS::Rect NewRect;
2240 NewRect.l = 2 * rect.l / DstWidth - 1;
2241 NewRect.t = 1 - 2 * rect.t / DstHeight;
2242 NewRect.r = 2 * rect.r / DstWidth - 1;
2243 NewRect.b = 1 - 2 * rect.b / DstHeight;
2244
2245 const bool IsNV21 = (mProgram[1] && Platform::Graphics::IsTextureNV21(tex));
2246 if(IsNV21)
2247 {
2248 f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
2249 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(tex, 0));
2250 f->glUniform1i(mTextureY, 0);
2251 f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE1);
2252 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(tex, 1));
2253 f->glUniform1i(mTextureUV, 1);
2254 }
2255 else
2256 {
2257 f->glActiveTexture(GL_TEXTURE0);
2258 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(tex));
2259 }
2260 if(antialiasing)
2261 {
2262 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2263 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2264 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2265 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2266 }
2267 else
2268 {
2269 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2270 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2271 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
2272 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
2273 }
2274
2275 const sint32 SelectedProgram = (IsNV21)? 1 : 0;
2276 f->glUseProgram(mProgram[SelectedProgram]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2277 f->glBindBuffer(GL_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2278 f->glBindBuffer(GL_ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, 0); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2279 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2280 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2281 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(TexCoordsID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2282 f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2283 f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2284 f->glVertexAttribPointer(TexCoordsID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].texcoords[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2285 f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[SelectedProgram], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2286
2287 f->glDisable(GL_CULL_FACE); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2288 f->glDisable(GL_DEPTH_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2289 f->glEnable(GL_BLEND); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2290 f->glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_ALPHA, GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2291 f->glEnable(GL_SCISSOR_TEST); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2292 const float Zoom = CanvasClass::get()->zoom() * DeviceRatio;
2293 const QRect& CurScissor = CanvasClass::get()->scissor();
2294 const int ScreenHeight = CanvasClass::get()->painter().window().height() / Zoom;
2295 f->glScissor(CurScissor.x() * Zoom,
2296 (ScreenHeight - (CurScissor.y() + CurScissor.height())) * Zoom,
2297 CurScissor.width() * Zoom,
2298 CurScissor.height() * Zoom);
2299
2300 mAttrib[0].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
2301 mAttrib[0].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
2302 mAttrib[0].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2303 mAttrib[1].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
2304 mAttrib[1].vertices[1] = NewRect.t;
2305 mAttrib[1].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2306 mAttrib[2].vertices[0] = NewRect.l;
2307 mAttrib[2].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
2308 mAttrib[2].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2309 mAttrib[3].vertices[0] = NewRect.r;
2310 mAttrib[3].vertices[1] = NewRect.b;
2311 mAttrib[3].color32 = color.ToABGR();
2312
2313 sint32 UV[4] = {2, 3, 1, 0};
2314 switch(ori)
2315 {
2316 case orientationtype_normal0: UV[0] = 2; UV[1] = 3; UV[2] = 1; UV[3] = 0; break;
2317 case orientationtype_normal90: UV[0] = 0; UV[1] = 2; UV[2] = 3; UV[3] = 1; break;
2318 case orientationtype_normal180: UV[0] = 1; UV[1] = 0; UV[2] = 2; UV[3] = 3; break;
2319 case orientationtype_normal270: UV[0] = 3; UV[1] = 1; UV[2] = 0; UV[3] = 2; break;
2320 case orientationtype_fliped0: UV[0] = 3; UV[1] = 2; UV[2] = 0; UV[3] = 1; break;
2321 case orientationtype_fliped90: UV[0] = 2; UV[1] = 0; UV[2] = 1; UV[3] = 3; break;
2322 case orientationtype_fliped180: UV[0] = 0; UV[1] = 1; UV[2] = 3; UV[3] = 2; break;
2323 case orientationtype_fliped270: UV[0] = 1; UV[1] = 3; UV[2] = 2; UV[3] = 0; break;
2324 }
2325
2326 const GLint SrcWidth = Platform::Graphics::GetTextureWidth(tex);
2327 const GLint SrcHeight = Platform::Graphics::GetTextureHeight(tex);
2328 mAttrib[UV[0]].texcoords[0] = texrect.l / SrcWidth; // 좌측상단
2329 mAttrib[UV[0]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.b) / SrcHeight;
2330 mAttrib[UV[1]].texcoords[0] = texrect.r / SrcWidth; // 우측상단
2331 mAttrib[UV[1]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.b) / SrcHeight;
2332 mAttrib[UV[2]].texcoords[0] = texrect.r / SrcWidth; // 우측하단
2333 mAttrib[UV[2]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.t) / SrcHeight;
2334 mAttrib[UV[3]].texcoords[0] = texrect.l / SrcWidth; // 좌측하단
2335 mAttrib[UV[3]].texcoords[1] = (SrcHeight - texrect.t) / SrcHeight;
2336 f->glDrawArrays(GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP, 0, 4); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2337
2338 if(fbo != 0)
2339 {
2340 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
2341 TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2342 }
2343 }
2344
2345 private:
2346 void InitShader(chars vsource_rgb, chars fsource_rgb, chars vsource_nv21 = nullptr, chars fsource_nv21 = nullptr)
2347 {
2348 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2349 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2350
2351 chars VSources[2] = {vsource_rgb, vsource_nv21};
2352 chars FSources[2] = {fsource_rgb, fsource_nv21};
2353 for(sint32 i = 0, iend = (vsource_nv21 && fsource_nv21)? 2 : 1; i < iend; ++i)
2354 {
2355 mVShader[i] = f->glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2356 f->glShaderSource(mVShader[i], 1, &VSources[i], NULL); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2357 f->glCompileShader(mVShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mVShader[i]);
2358
2359 mFShader[i] = f->glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2360 f->glShaderSource(mFShader[i], 1, &FSources[i], NULL); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2361 f->glCompileShader(mFShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mFShader[i]);
2362
2363 mProgram[i] = f->glCreateProgram(); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2364 f->glAttachShader(mProgram[i], mVShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mVShader[i]);
2365 f->glAttachShader(mProgram[i], mFShader[i]); TestShader(BOSS_DBG mFShader[i]);
2366
2367 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(VerticeID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2368 f->glEnableVertexAttribArray(ColorID); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2369 f->glBindAttribLocation(mProgram[i], VerticeID, "a_position"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2370 f->glBindAttribLocation(mProgram[i], ColorID, "a_color"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2371 f->glVertexAttribPointer(VerticeID, 2, GL_FLOAT, GL_FALSE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].vertices[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2372 f->glVertexAttribPointer(ColorID, 4, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, GL_TRUE, sizeof(Attrib), &mAttrib[0].colors[0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2373
2374 f->glLinkProgram(mProgram[i]); TestProgram(BOSS_DBG mProgram[i]);
2375 f->glValidateProgram(mProgram[i]); TestProgram(BOSS_DBG mProgram[i]);
2376
2377 LoadIdentity();
2378 f->glUseProgram(mProgram[i]); TestProgram(BOSS_DBG mProgram[i]);
2379 mMatrix[i] = f->glGetUniformLocation(mProgram[i], "u_matrix"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2380 f->glUniformMatrix4fv(mMatrix[i], 1, GL_FALSE, (const GLfloat*) &mM[0][0]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2381 if(i == 1)
2382 {
2383 mTextureY = f->glGetUniformLocation(mProgram[i], "u_texture_y"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2384 mTextureUV = f->glGetUniformLocation(mProgram[i], "u_texture_uv"); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0);
2385 }
2386 }
2387 }
2388 void InitShaderGLES30()
2389 {
2390 InitShader(
2392 // RGB
2394 String::Format(
2395 "#version 300 es\n"
2396 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_position;\n"
2397 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec4 a_color;\n"
2398 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_texcoord;\n"
2399 "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
2400 "out mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
2401 "out mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
2402 "\n"
2403 "void main()\n"
2404 "{\n"
2405 " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
2406 " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
2407 " v_texCoord = a_texcoord;\n"
2408 "}", VerticeID, ColorID, TexCoordsID),
2409 "#version 300 es\n"
2410 "layout (location = 0) out highp vec4 oColour;\n"
2411 "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
2412 "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture;\n"
2413 "in mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
2414 "in mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
2415 "\n"
2416 "void main()\n"
2417 "{\n"
2418 " oColour = v_fragmentColor * texture(u_texture, v_texCoord);\n"
2419 "}",
2421 // NV21
2423 String::Format(
2424 "#version 300 es\n"
2425 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_position;\n"
2426 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec4 a_color;\n"
2427 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_texcoord;\n"
2428 "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
2429 "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_y;\n"
2430 "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_uv;\n"
2431 "out mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
2432 "out mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
2433 "\n"
2434 "void main()\n"
2435 "{\n"
2436 " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
2437 " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
2438 " v_texCoord = a_texcoord;\n"
2439 "}", VerticeID, ColorID, TexCoordsID),
2440 "#version 300 es\n"
2441 "layout (location = 0) out highp vec4 oColour;\n"
2442 "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
2443 "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_y;\n"
2444 "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture_uv;\n"
2445 "in mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
2446 "in mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
2447 "\n"
2448 "void main()\n"
2449 "{\n"
2450 " highp float y = texture(u_texture_y, v_texCoord).r;\n"
2451 " highp float u = texture(u_texture_uv, v_texCoord).a - 0.5;\n"
2452 " highp float v = texture(u_texture_uv, v_texCoord).r - 0.5;\n"
2453 " highp float r = y + 1.403 * v;\n"
2454 " highp float g = y - 0.344 * u - 0.714 * v;\n"
2455 " highp float b = y + 1.770 * u;\n"
2456 " oColour = v_fragmentColor * vec4(r, g, b, 1.0);\n"
2457 "}");
2458 }
2459 void InitShaderGL()
2460 {
2461 InitShader(
2462 String::Format(
2463 "#version 330 core\n"
2464 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_position;\n"
2465 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec4 a_color;\n"
2466 "layout (location = %d) in highp vec2 a_texcoord;\n"
2467 "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
2468 "out mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
2469 "out mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
2470 "\n"
2471 "void main()\n"
2472 "{\n"
2473 " gl_Position = u_matrix * vec4(a_position.x, a_position.y, 0.0, 1.0);\n"
2474 " v_fragmentColor = a_color;\n"
2475 " v_texCoord = a_texcoord;\n"
2476 "}", VerticeID, ColorID, TexCoordsID),
2477 "#version 330 core\n"
2478 "layout (location = 0) out highp vec4 oColour;\n"
2479 "uniform highp mat4 u_matrix;\n"
2480 "uniform highp sampler2D u_texture;\n"
2481 "in mediump vec4 v_fragmentColor;\n"
2482 "in mediump vec2 v_texCoord;\n"
2483 "\n"
2484 "void main()\n"
2485 "{\n"
2486 " oColour = v_fragmentColor * texture2D(u_texture, v_texCoord);\n"
2487 //" float Pi2 = 6.28318530718;\n"
2488 //" float Direction = 16.0;\n"
2489 //" float Quality = 3.0;\n"
2490 //" vec2 Radius = vec2(8.0);\n"
2491 //" vec4 Sum = texture2D(u_texture, v_texCoord);\n"
2492 //" for(float d = 0.0; d < Pi2; d += Pi2 / Direction)\n"
2493 //" {\n"
2494 //" for(float i = 1.0 / Quality; i <= 1.0; i += 1.0 / Quality)\n"
2495 //" {\n"
2496 //" Sum += texture2D(u_texture, v_texCoord + vec2(cos(d), sin(d)) * Radius * i);\n"
2497 //" }\n"
2498 //" }\n"
2499 //" oColour = v_fragmentColor * (Sum / (Quality * Direction - 15.0));\n"
2500 "}");
2501 }
2502 void TermShader()
2503 {
2504 if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
2505 {
2506 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2507 for(sint32 i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
2508 {
2509 if(mProgram[i]) {f->glDeleteProgram(mProgram[i]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0); mProgram[i] = 0;}
2510 if(mVShader[i]) {f->glDeleteShader(mVShader[i]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0); mVShader[i] = 0;}
2511 if(mFShader[i]) {f->glDeleteShader(mFShader[i]); TestGL(BOSS_DBG 0); mFShader[i] = 0;}
2512 }
2513 }
2514 }
2515
2516 public:
2517 static void TestGL(BOSS_DBG_PRM sint32 nouse)
2518 {
2519 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2520 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2521 if(auto errorCode = f->glGetError())
2522 BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestGL(error:%d) is failed", errorCode), false);
2523 }
2524 static void TestShader(BOSS_DBG_PRM GLuint shader)
2525 {
2526 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2527 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2528
2529 GLint status;
2530 f->glGetShaderiv(shader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &status);
2531 if(status == GL_FALSE)
2532 {
2533 GLchar log[4096];
2534 GLsizei s;
2535 f->glGetShaderInfoLog(shader, 4096, &s, log);
2536 BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestShader(%s) is failed", log), false);
2537 }
2538 else if(auto errorCode = f->glGetError())
2539 BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestShader(error:%d) is failed", errorCode), false);
2540 }
2541 static void TestProgram(BOSS_DBG_PRM GLuint program)
2542 {
2543 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2544 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2545
2546 GLint linked;
2547 f->glGetProgramiv(program, GL_LINK_STATUS, &linked);
2548 if(!linked)
2549 {
2550 int i32InfoLogLength, i32CharsWritten;
2551 f->glGetProgramiv(program, GL_INFO_LOG_LENGTH, &i32InfoLogLength);
2552 char* pszInfoLog = new char[i32InfoLogLength];
2553 f->glGetProgramInfoLog(program, i32InfoLogLength, &i32CharsWritten, pszInfoLog);
2554 BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestProgram(%s) is failed", pszInfoLog), false);
2555 delete [] pszInfoLog;
2556 }
2557 else if(auto errorCode = f->glGetError())
2558 BOSS_ASSERT_PRM(String::Format("TestProgram(error:%d) is failed", errorCode), false);
2559 }
2560
2561 private:
2562 void LoadIdentity()
2563 {
2564 mM[0][0] = 1; mM[0][1] = 0; mM[0][2] = 0; mM[0][3] = 0;
2565 mM[1][0] = 0; mM[1][1] = 1; mM[1][2] = 0; mM[1][3] = 0;
2566 mM[2][0] = 0; mM[2][1] = 0; mM[2][2] = 1; mM[2][3] = 0;
2567 mM[3][0] = 0; mM[3][1] = 0; mM[3][2] = 0; mM[3][3] = 1;
2568 }
2569 void Multiply(
2570 const float m00, const float m01, const float m02, const float m03,
2571 const float m10, const float m11, const float m12, const float m13,
2572 const float m20, const float m21, const float m22, const float m23,
2573 const float m30, const float m31, const float m32, const float m33)
2574 {
2575 GLfloat m[4][4];
2576 Memory::Copy(&m[0][0], &mM[0][0], sizeof(GLfloat) * 16);
2577 mM[0][0] = m[0][0] * m00 + m[0][1] * m10 + m[0][2] * m20 + m[0][3] * m30;
2578 mM[0][1] = m[0][0] * m01 + m[0][1] * m11 + m[0][2] * m21 + m[0][3] * m31;
2579 mM[0][2] = m[0][0] * m02 + m[0][1] * m12 + m[0][2] * m22 + m[0][3] * m32;
2580 mM[0][3] = m[0][0] * m03 + m[0][1] * m13 + m[0][2] * m23 + m[0][3] * m33;
2581 mM[1][0] = m[1][0] * m00 + m[1][1] * m10 + m[1][2] * m20 + m[1][3] * m30;
2582 mM[1][1] = m[1][0] * m01 + m[1][1] * m11 + m[1][2] * m21 + m[1][3] * m31;
2583 mM[1][2] = m[1][0] * m02 + m[1][1] * m12 + m[1][2] * m22 + m[1][3] * m32;
2584 mM[1][3] = m[1][0] * m03 + m[1][1] * m13 + m[1][2] * m23 + m[1][3] * m33;
2585 mM[2][0] = m[2][0] * m00 + m[2][1] * m10 + m[2][2] * m20 + m[2][3] * m30;
2586 mM[2][1] = m[2][0] * m01 + m[2][1] * m11 + m[2][2] * m21 + m[2][3] * m31;
2587 mM[2][2] = m[2][0] * m02 + m[2][1] * m12 + m[2][2] * m22 + m[2][3] * m32;
2588 mM[2][3] = m[2][0] * m03 + m[2][1] * m13 + m[2][2] * m23 + m[2][3] * m33;
2589 mM[3][0] = m[3][0] * m00 + m[3][1] * m10 + m[3][2] * m20 + m[3][3] * m30;
2590 mM[3][1] = m[3][0] * m01 + m[3][1] * m11 + m[3][2] * m21 + m[3][3] * m31;
2591 mM[3][2] = m[3][0] * m02 + m[3][1] * m12 + m[3][2] * m22 + m[3][3] * m32;
2592 mM[3][3] = m[3][0] * m03 + m[3][1] * m13 + m[3][2] * m23 + m[3][3] * m33;
2593 }
2594
2595 private:
2596 GLuint mVShader[2];
2597 GLuint mFShader[2];
2598 GLuint mProgram[2];
2599 id_texture mFillTexture;
2600
2601 private:
2602 enum {VerticeID = 0, ColorID = 1, TexCoordsID = 2};
2603 struct Attrib
2604 {
2605 GLfloat vertices[2];
2606 union
2607 {
2608 GLubyte colors[4];
2609 GLuint color32;
2610 };
2611 GLfloat texcoords[2];
2612 };
2613 Attrib mAttrib[4];
2614 GLint mMatrix[2];
2615 GLfloat mM[4][4];
2616 GLint mTextureY;
2617 GLint mTextureUV;
2618 };
2619
2620 class TextureClass
2621 {
2622 BOSS_DECLARE_NONCOPYABLE_CLASS(TextureClass)
2623
2624 public:
2625 TextureClass()
2626 {
2627 mRefCount = 1;
2628 mNV21 = false;
2629 mWidth = 0;
2630 mHeight = 0;
2631 mTexture[0] = mTexture[1] = 0;
2632 }
2633 ~TextureClass()
2634 {
2635 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", mRefCount == 0);
2636 Remove();
2637 }
2638
2639 public:
2640 void Init(bool nv21, bool bitmapcache, sint32 width, sint32 height, const void* bits)
2641 {
2642 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2643 BOSS_ASSERT("OpenGL의 Context접근에 실패하였습니다", ctx);
2644 if(ctx)
2645 {
2646 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2647 mNV21 = nv21;
2648 mWidth = width;
2649 mHeight = height;
2650 if(nv21)
2651 {
2652 const sint32 Level[2] = {GL_LUMINANCE, GL_LUMINANCE_ALPHA};
2653 const sint32 Widths[2] = {mWidth, mWidth / 2};
2654 const sint32 Heights[2] = {mHeight, mHeight / 2};
2655 const void* Bits[2] = {bits, (bits)? &((bytes) bits)[mWidth * mHeight] : nullptr};
2656 const sint32 BitsSizes[2] = {1 * Widths[0] * Heights[0], 2 * Widths[1] * Heights[1]};
2657 f->glGenTextures(2, mTexture);
2658 for(sint32 i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
2659 {
2660 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[i]);
2661 f->glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, 1);
2662 f->glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D,
2663 0, Level[i], Widths[i], Heights[i],
2664 0, Level[i], GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, Bits[i]);
2665 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2666 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2667 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2668 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2669 if(bitmapcache && Bits[i]) // CreateBitmap()을 위해 저장해 둠
2670 Memory::Copy(mBits[i].AtDumping(0, BitsSizes[i]), Bits[i], BitsSizes[i]);
2671 }
2672 }
2673 else
2674 {
2675 const sint32 BitsSize = 4 * mWidth * mHeight;
2676 f->glGenTextures(1, mTexture);
2677 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[0]);
2678 f->glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D,
2679 0, GL_RGBA8, mWidth, mHeight,
2680 0, GL_BGRA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, bits);
2681 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2682 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2683 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2684 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2685 if(bitmapcache && bits) // CreateBitmap()을 위해 저장해 둠
2686 Memory::Copy(mBits[0].AtDumping(0, BitsSize), bits, BitsSize);
2687 }
2688 }
2689 }
2690 void Remove()
2691 {
2692 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2693 if(ctx)
2694 {
2695 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2696 for(sint32 i = 0; i < 2; ++i)
2697 {
2698 if(mTexture[i])
2699 {
2700 f->glDeleteTextures(1, &mTexture[i]);
2701 mTexture[i] = 0;
2702 }
2703 }
2704 }
2705 }
2706 id_bitmap CreateBitmapByGL() const
2707 {
2708 id_bitmap NewBitmap = nullptr;
2709 if(mNV21)
2710 BOSS_ASSERT("NV21방식은 CreateBitmapByGL를 지원하지 않습니다", false);
2711 else
2712 {
2713 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
