2714 if(ctx)
2715 {
2716 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2717 GLuint fbo = 0, prevFbo = 0;
2718 f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
2719 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
2720 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
2721 NewBitmap = Bmp::Create(4, mWidth, mHeight);
2722 f->glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[0], 0);
2723 f->glReadPixels(0, 0, mWidth, mHeight, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, Bmp::GetBits(NewBitmap));
2724 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
2725 f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
2726 Bmp::SwapRedBlue(NewBitmap);
2727 }
2728 else BOSS_ASSERT("OpenGL의 Context접근에 실패하였습니다", ctx);
2729 }
2730 return NewBitmap;
2731 }
2732 id_bitmap CreateBitmapByCopy() const
2733 {
2734 id_bitmap NewBitmap = nullptr;
2735 if(mNV21)
2736 {
2737 const sint32 Widths[2] = {mWidth, mWidth / 2};
2738 const sint32 Heights[2] = {mHeight, mHeight / 2};
2739 const sint32 BitsSizes[2] = {1 * Widths[0] * Heights[0], 2 * Widths[1] * Heights[1]};
2740 if(mBits[0].Count() == BitsSizes[0] && mBits[1].Count() == BitsSizes[1])
2741 NewBitmap = Bmp::CloneFromNV21(&mBits[0][0], (uv16s) &mBits[1][0], mWidth, mHeight);
2742 else BOSS_ASSERT("미리 저장된 mBits가 없어서 CreateBitmapByCopy에 실패하였습니다", false);
2743 }
2744 else
2745 {
2746 const sint32 BitsSize = 4 * mWidth * mHeight;
2747 if(mBits[0].Count() == BitsSize)
2748 {
2749 NewBitmap = Bmp::Create(4, mWidth, mHeight);
2750 Memory::Copy(Bmp::GetBits(NewBitmap), &mBits[0][0], BitsSize);
2751 }
2752 else BOSS_ASSERT("미리 저장된 mBits가 없어서 CreateBitmapByCopy에 실패하였습니다", false);
2753 }
2754 return NewBitmap;
2755 }
2756 void CopyFromBitmap(sint32 x, sint32 y, sint32 width, sint32 height, const Bmp::bitmappixel* bits)
2757 {
2758 BOSS_ASSERT("복사영역이 텍스쳐영역을 벗어납니다", 0 <= x && 0 <= y && x + width <= mWidth && y + height <= mHeight);
2759
2760 QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext();
2761 BOSS_ASSERT("OpenGL의 Context접근에 실패하였습니다", ctx);
2762 if(ctx)
2763 {
2764 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
2765 if(mNV21)
2766 BOSS_ASSERT("개발이 필요합니다!", false);
2767 else
2768 {
2769 f->glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, mTexture[0]);
2770 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2771 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE);
2772 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2773 f->glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_LINEAR);
2774 f->glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0,
2775 x, y, width, height, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, bits);
2776 }
2777 }
2778 }
2779
2780 public:
2781 inline TextureClass* clone() {++mRefCount; return this;}
2782 inline bool release() {return (--mRefCount == 0);}
2783 inline bool nv21() const {return mNV21;}
2784 inline sint32 width() const {return mWidth;}
2785 inline sint32 height() const {return mHeight;}
2786 inline uint32 id(sint32 i) const {return mTexture[i];}
2787
2788 public:
2789 void ResetDirectly(uint32 texture, sint32 width, sint32 height)
2790 {
2791 mRefCount = 1;
2792 mNV21 = false;
2793 mWidth = width;
2794 mHeight = height;
2795 mTexture[0] = texture;
2796 }
2797 void ClearDirectly()
2798 {
2799 mRefCount = 0;
2800 mTexture[0] = 0;
2801 }
2802
2803 private:
2804 sint32 mRefCount;
2805 bool mNV21;
2806 sint32 mWidth;
2807 sint32 mHeight;
2808 uint32 mTexture[2];
2809 uint08s mBits[2];
2810 };
2811
2812 class SurfaceClass
2813 {
2814 public:
2815 SurfaceClass() : mFBO(0, 0, QOpenGLFramebufferObjectFormat()), mDevice(0, 0)
2816 {
2817 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", false);
2818 mSavedSurface = nullptr;
2819 mIsValidLastImage = false;
2820 }
2821 SurfaceClass(sint32 width, sint32 height, QOpenGLFramebufferObjectFormat* format)
2822 : mFBO(width, height, *format), mDevice(width, height)
2823 {
2824 BOSS_ASSERT("FBO생성에 실패하였습니다", mFBO.isValid());
2825 mSavedSurface = nullptr;
2826 mIsValidLastImage = false;
2827 }
2828 ~SurfaceClass()
2829 {
2830 mFBO.release();
2831 mLastTexture.ClearDirectly();
2832 }
2833
2834 public:
2835 SurfaceClass(const SurfaceClass& rhs) : mFBO(0, 0, QOpenGLFramebufferObjectFormat()), mDevice(0, 0)
2836 {
2837 operator=(rhs);
2838 }
2839 SurfaceClass& operator=(const SurfaceClass& rhs)
2840 {
2841 BOSS_ASSERT("잘못된 시나리오입니다", false);
2842 return *this;
2843 }
2844
2845 public:
2846 inline uint32 fbo() const {return mFBO.handle();}
2847 inline id_texture_read texture() const
2848 {
2849 mLastTexture.ResetDirectly(mFBO.texture(), mFBO.width(), mFBO.height());
2850 return (id_texture_read) &mLastTexture;
2851 }
2852 inline sint32 width() const {return mFBO.width();}
2853 inline sint32 height() const {return mFBO.height();}
2854 inline QPainter* painter() {return &mCanvas.painter();}
2855
2856 public:
2857 void BindGraphics()
2858 {
2859 BOSS_ASSERT("mSavedSurface는 nullptr이어야 합니다", !mSavedSurface);
2860 mSavedSurface = ST();
2861 mCanvas.Bind(&mDevice);
2862 mFBO.bind();
2863 ST() = this;
2864 }
2865 void UnbindGraphics()
2866 {
2867 BOSS_ASSERT("SurfaceClass는 스택식으로 해제해야 합니다", ST() == this);
2868 mIsValidLastImage = false;
2869 mCanvas.Unbind();
2870 if(ST() = mSavedSurface)
2871 {
2872 mSavedSurface->mFBO.bind();
2873 mSavedSurface = nullptr;
2874 }
2875 }
2876 const QImage& GetLastImage() const
2877 {
2878 if(!mIsValidLastImage)
2879 {
2880 mIsValidLastImage = true;
2881 mLastImage = mFBO.toImage();
2882 }
2883 return mLastImage;
2884 }
2885
2886 public:
2887 static void LockForGL()
2888 {
2889 BOSS_ASSERT("STGL()는 nullptr이어야 합니다", !STGL());
2890 STGL() = ST();
2891 ST() = nullptr;
2892 }
2893 static void UnlockForGL()
2894 {
2895 BOSS_ASSERT("ST()는 nullptr이어야 합니다", !ST());
2896 if(ST() = STGL())
2897 {
2898 STGL()->mFBO.bind();
2899 STGL() = nullptr;
2900 }
2901 }
2902
2903 private:
2904 static inline SurfaceClass*& ST() {static SurfaceClass* _ = nullptr; return _;}
2905 static inline SurfaceClass*& STGL() {static SurfaceClass* _ = nullptr; return _;}
2906
2907 private:
2908 SurfaceClass* mSavedSurface;
2909 QOpenGLFramebufferObject mFBO;
2910 QOpenGLPaintDevice mDevice;
2911 CanvasClass mCanvas;
2912
2913 private:
2914 mutable bool mIsValidLastImage;
2915 mutable QImage mLastImage;
2916 mutable TextureClass mLastTexture;
2917 };
2918
2919 class ThreadClass : public QThread
2920 {
2921 Q_OBJECT
2922
2923 public:
2924 static void Begin(ThreadCB cb, payload data, prioritytype priority)
2925 {
2926 auto pThread = new ThreadClass(cb, nullptr, data, priority);
2927
2928 connect(pThread, &ThreadClass::started,pThread, &ThreadClass::runslot);
2929 QObject::connect(pThread, &ThreadClass::finished, pThread, &QObject::deleteLater);
2930 pThread->moveToThread(pThread);
2931 pThread->start();
2932 }
2933 static void* BeginEx(ThreadExCB cb, payload data, prioritytype priority)
2934 {
2935 return new ThreadClass(nullptr, cb, data, priority);
2936 }
2937
2938 private:
2939 ThreadClass(ThreadCB cb1, ThreadExCB cb2, payload data, prioritytype priority)
2940 {
2941 BOSS_ASSERT("cb1와 cb2가 모두 nullptr일 순 없습니다", cb1 || cb2);
2942 m_cb1 = cb1;
2943 m_cb2 = cb2;
2944 m_data = data;
2945 connect(this, SIGNAL(finished()), SLOT(OnFinished()));
2946 switch(priority)
2947 {
2948 case prioritytype_lowest: start(QThread::Priority::LowestPriority); break;
2949 case prioritytype_low: start(QThread::Priority::LowPriority); break;
2950 case prioritytype_normal: start(QThread::Priority::NormalPriority); break;
2951 case prioritytype_high: start(QThread::Priority::HighPriority); break;
2952 case prioritytype_highest: start(QThread::Priority::HighestPriority); break;
2953 }
2954 }
2955 virtual ~ThreadClass() {}
2956
2957 private slots:
2958 void runslot()
2959 {
2960 if (m_cb1) this->m_cb1(m_data);
2961 else if (m_cb2) this->m_cb2(m_data);
2962 }
2963
2964 void OnFinished()
2965 {
2966 delete this;
2967 }
2968
2969 private:
2970 ThreadCB m_cb1;
2971 ThreadExCB m_cb2;
2972 payload m_data;
2973 };
2974
2975 class ClockClass
2976 {
2977 public:
2978 ClockClass()
2979 {
2980 m_prev = GetHead();
2981 m_next = m_prev->m_next;
2982 m_prev->m_next = this;
2983 m_next->m_prev = this;
2984 if(!GetTimer().isValid())
2985 {
2986 GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(QDateTime::currentMSecsSinceEpoch())) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
2987 GetTimer().start();
2988 }
2989 m_laptime = GetTimer().nsecsElapsed();
2990 }
2991 ClockClass(const ClockClass& rhs)
2992 {
2993 m_prev = GetHead();
2994 m_next = m_prev->m_next;
2995 m_prev->m_next = this;
2996 m_next->m_prev = this;
2997 operator=(rhs);
2998 }
2999 ~ClockClass()
3000 {
3001 m_prev->m_next = m_next;
3002 m_next->m_prev = m_prev;
3003 }
3004
3005 public:
3006 void SetClock(sint32 year, sint32 month, sint32 day, sint32 hour, sint32 min, sint32 sec, sint64 nsec)
3007 {
3008 QDateTime NewTime = QDateTime::fromString(
3009 (chars) String::Format("%04d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d",
3010 year, month, day, hour, min, sec), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
3011 const sint64 NewClockMSec = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(NewTime.toMSecsSinceEpoch())) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
3012 m_laptime = (NewClockMSec - GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay()) * 1000000 + nsec;
3013 }
3014 void SetClock(uint64 windowtime_msec)
3015 {
3016 const uint64 NewWindowMSec = WindowToEpoch(windowtime_msec);
3017 const sint64 NewClockMSec = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(NewWindowMSec)) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
3018 m_laptime = (NewClockMSec - GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay()) * 1000000;
3019 }
3020
3021 public:
3022 inline ClockClass& operator=(const ClockClass& rhs)
3023 {m_laptime = rhs.m_laptime; return *this;}
3024
3025 public:
3026 inline sint64 GetLap() const {return m_laptime;}
3027 inline void AddLap(sint64 nsec) {m_laptime += nsec;}
3028 inline sint64 GetTotalSec() const
3029 {return GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() / 1000 + m_laptime / 1000000000;}
3030 inline sint64 GetNSecInSec() const
3031 {return ((GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() % 1000) * 1000000 + 1000000000 + (m_laptime % 1000000000)) % 1000000000;}
3032
3033 public:
3034 static void SetBaseTime(chars timestring)
3035 {
3036 QDateTime CurrentTime = QDateTime::fromString(timestring, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
3037 GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() = ((sint64) EpochToJulian(CurrentTime.toMSecsSinceEpoch())) + GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc();
3038
3039 const sint64 ChangedNSec = GetTimer().restart() * 1000000;
3040 ClockClass* CurNode = GetHead();
3041 while((CurNode = CurNode->m_next) != GetHead())
3042 CurNode->m_laptime -= ChangedNSec;
3043 }
3044 static sint64 GetLocalTimeMSecFromUtc() {static sint64 _ = (sint64) (QDateTime::currentDateTime().utcOffset() * 1000); return _;}
3045
3046 private:
3047 static ClockClass* GetHead() {static ClockClass _(0); return &_;}
3048 static QElapsedTimer& GetTimer() {static QElapsedTimer _; return _;}
3049 static sint64& GetTotalMSecFromJulianDay() {static sint64 _ = 0; return _;}
3050
3051 private:
3052 ClockClass(int) // Head전용
3053 {
3054 m_prev = this;
3055 m_next = this;
3056 }
3057
3058 private:
3059 ClockClass* m_prev;
3060 ClockClass* m_next;
3061 sint64 m_laptime;
3062 };
3063
3064 #ifdef QT_HAVE_MULTIMEDIA
3065 class SoundClass
3066 {
3067 public:
3068 SoundClass(chars filename, bool loop)
3069 {
3070 m_volume = 0;
3071 m_player = new QMediaPlayer();
3072 m_playlist = nullptr;
3073 m_output = nullptr;
3074 m_outputdevice = nullptr;
3075 m_outputmutex = nullptr;
3076
3077 if(loop)
3078 {
3079 m_playlist = new QMediaPlaylist();
3080 m_playlist->addMedia(QUrl::fromLocalFile(filename));
3081 m_playlist->setPlaybackMode(QMediaPlaylist::Loop);
3082 m_player->setPlaylist(m_playlist);
3083 }
3084 else m_player->setMedia(QUrl::fromLocalFile(filename));
3085 m_player->setVolume(100);
3086 }
3087 SoundClass(sint32 channel, sint32 sample_rate, sint32 sample_size)
3088 {
3089 QAudioFormat AudioFormat;
3090 AudioFormat.setCodec("audio/pcm");
3091 AudioFormat.setChannelCount(channel);
3092 AudioFormat.setSampleRate(sample_rate);
3093 AudioFormat.setSampleSize(sample_size);
3094 AudioFormat.setSampleType(QAudioFormat::SignedInt);
3095 AudioFormat.setByteOrder(QAudioFormat::LittleEndian);
3096
3097 m_volume = 0;
3098 m_player = nullptr;
3099 m_playlist = nullptr;
3100 m_output = new QAudioOutput(AudioFormat);
3101 m_output->setBufferSize(sample_rate);
3102 m_output->setVolume(100);
3103 m_outputdevice = nullptr;
3104 m_outputmutex = Mutex::Open();
3105 }
3106 ~SoundClass()
3107 {
3108 Stop();
3109 delete m_player;
3110 delete m_playlist;
3111 delete m_output;
3112 Mutex::Close(m_outputmutex);
3113 }
3114
3115 public:
3116 void Play(float volume_rate)
3117 {
3118 m_volume = Math::Max(0, 256 * volume_rate);
3119 branch;
3120 jump(m_player)
3121 {
3122 m_player->setVolume(100 * volume_rate);
3123 m_player->play();
3124 }
3125 jump(m_output)
3126 {
3127 if(!m_outputdevice)
3128 {
3129 Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
3130 m_outputdevice = m_output->start();
3131 Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
3132 }
3133 }
3134 }
3135 void Stop()
3136 {
3137 branch;
3138 jump(m_player) m_player->stop();
3139 jump(m_output)
3140 {
3141 if(m_outputdevice)
3142 {
3143 Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
3144 m_output->stop();
3145 m_outputdevice = nullptr;
3146 Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
3147 }
3148 }
3149 }
3150 bool NowPlaying()
3151 {
3152 branch;
3153 jump(m_player)
3154 {
3155 if(m_player->state() == QMediaPlayer::PlayingState)
3156 return true;
3157 }
3158 jump(m_output)
3159 {
3160 if(m_outputdevice && m_output->state() == QAudio::ActiveState)
3161 return true;
3162 }
3163 return false;
3164 }
3165 sint32 AddStreamForPlay(bytes raw, sint32 size, sint32 timeout)
3166 {
3167 Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
3168 sint32 WrittenBytes = -1;
3169 if(m_outputdevice)
3170 WrittenBytes = m_outputdevice->write((chars) raw, size);
3171 Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
3172
3173 if(WrittenBytes == -1)
3174 return -1;
3175 else if(WrittenBytes < size)
3176 {
3177 uint64 BeginMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
3178 while(Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec() < BeginMsec + timeout)
3179 {
3180 Platform::Utility::Sleep(1, false, false);
3181 raw += WrittenBytes;
3182 size -= WrittenBytes;
3183
3184 Mutex::Lock(m_outputmutex);
3185 WrittenBytes = -1;
3186 if(m_outputdevice)
3187 WrittenBytes = m_outputdevice->write((chars) raw, size);
3188 Mutex::Unlock(m_outputmutex);
3189
3190 if(WrittenBytes == -1)
3191 return -1;
3192 if(WrittenBytes == size)
3193 return m_volume;
3194 }
3195 return -1; // Timeout
3196 }
3197 return m_volume;
3198 }
3199
3200 private:
3201 sint32 m_volume;
3202 QMediaPlayer* m_player;
3203 QMediaPlaylist* m_playlist;
3204 QAudioOutput* m_output;
3205 QIODevice* m_outputdevice;
3206 id_mutex m_outputmutex;
3207 };
3208 #endif
3209
3210 class PeerData : public QObjectUserData
3211 {
3212 public:
3213 const sint32 ID;
3214 sint32 PacketNeeds;
3215
3216 public:
3217 PeerData() : ID(MakeID()) {PacketNeeds = 0;}
3218 virtual ~PeerData() {}
3219
3220 public:
3221 static uint ClassID()
3222 {static uint _ = QObject::registerUserData(); return _;}
3223 static int MakeID() {static int _ = -1; return ++_;}
3224 };
3225
3226 class PeerPacket
3227 {
3228 public:
3229 const packettype Type;
3230 const sint32 PeerID;
3231 buffer Buffer;
3232
3233 public:
3234 PeerPacket(packettype type, sint32 peerid, sint32 buffersize)
3235 : Type(type), PeerID(peerid) {Buffer = Buffer::Alloc(BOSS_DBG buffersize);}
3236 ~PeerPacket() {Buffer::Free(Buffer);}
3237 public:
3238 void DestroyMe() {delete this;}
3239 };
3240
3241 class ServerClass : public QObject
3242 {
3243 Q_OBJECT
3244
3245 protected:
3246 Queue<PeerPacket*> mPacketQueue;
3247 PeerPacket* mFocusedPacket;
3248
3249 public:
3250 ServerClass()
3251 {
3252 mFocusedPacket = new PeerPacket(packettype_null, -1, 0);
3253 }
3254 virtual ~ServerClass()
3255 {
3256 for(PeerPacket* UnusedPacket = nullptr; UnusedPacket = mPacketQueue.Dequeue();)
3257 UnusedPacket->DestroyMe();
3258 delete mFocusedPacket;
3259 }
3260
3261 public:
3262 bool TryPacket()
3263 {
3264 PeerPacket* PopPacket = mPacketQueue.Dequeue();
3265 if(!PopPacket) return false;
3266 delete mFocusedPacket;
3267 mFocusedPacket = PopPacket;
3268 return true;
3269 }
3270
3271 PeerPacket* GetFocusedPacket()
3272 {
3273 return mFocusedPacket;
3274 }
3275
3276 public:
3277 virtual bool Listen(uint16 port) = 0;
3278 virtual bool SendPacket(int peerid, const void* buffer, sint32 buffersize, bool utf8) = 0;
3279 virtual bool KickPeer(int peerid) = 0;
3280 virtual bool GetPeerAddress(int peerid, ip4address* ip4, ip6address* ip6, uint16* port) = 0;
3281 };
3282
3283 class TCPServerClass : public ServerClass
3284 {
3285 Q_OBJECT
3286
3287 private:
3288 QTcpServer* mServer;
3289 bool mUsingSizeField;
3290 Map<QTcpSocket*> mPeers;
3291
3292 public:
3293 TCPServerClass(bool sizefield = false)
3294 {
3295 mServer = new QTcpServer(this);
3296 mUsingSizeField = sizefield;
3297 connect(mServer, SIGNAL(newConnection()), this, SLOT(acceptPeer()));
3298 }
3299
3300 ~TCPServerClass() override
3301 {
3302 mServer->close();
3303 }
3304
3305 TCPServerClass& operator=(const TCPServerClass&)
3306 {
3307 BOSS_ASSERT("호출불가", false);
3308 return *this;
3309 }
3310
3311 private slots:
3312 void acceptPeer()
3313 {
3314 QTcpSocket* Peer = mServer->nextPendingConnection();
3315 PeerData* NewData = new PeerData();
3316 mPeers[NewData->ID] = Peer;
3317 Peer->setUserData(PeerData::ClassID(), NewData);
3318 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_entrance, NewData->ID, 0));
3319
3320 if(!mUsingSizeField) connect(Peer, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(readyPeer()));
3321 else connect(Peer, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(readyPeerWithSizeField()));
3322 connect(Peer, SIGNAL(disconnected()), this, SLOT(disconnected()));
3323 Platform::BroadcastNotify("entrance", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3324 }
3325
3326 void readyPeer()
3327 {
3328 QTcpSocket* Peer = (QTcpSocket*) sender();
3329 PeerData* Data = (PeerData*) Peer->userData(PeerData::ClassID());
3330 const sint64 PacketSize = Peer->bytesAvailable();
3331
3332 if(0 < PacketSize)
3333 {
3334 PeerPacket* NewPacket = new PeerPacket(packettype_message, Data->ID, PacketSize);
3335 Peer->read((char*) NewPacket->Buffer, PacketSize);
3336 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(NewPacket);
3337 }
3338 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3339 }
3340
3341 void readyPeerWithSizeField()
3342 {
3343 QTcpSocket* Peer = (QTcpSocket*) sender();
3344 PeerData* Data = (PeerData*) Peer->userData(PeerData::ClassID());
3345 sint64 PacketSize = Peer->bytesAvailable();
3346
3347 while(0 < PacketSize)
3348 {
3349 if(Data->PacketNeeds == 0)
3350 {
3351 if(4 <= PacketSize)
3352 {
3353 PacketSize -= 4;
3354 int GetPacketSize = 0;
3355 Peer->read((char*) &GetPacketSize, 4);
3356 Data->PacketNeeds = GetPacketSize;
3357 }
3358 else break;
3359 }
3360 if(0 < Data->PacketNeeds)
3361 {
3362 if(Data->PacketNeeds <= PacketSize)
3363 {
3364 PacketSize -= Data->PacketNeeds;
3365 PeerPacket* NewPacket = new PeerPacket(packettype_message, Data->ID, Data->PacketNeeds);
3366 Peer->read((char*) NewPacket->Buffer, Data->PacketNeeds);
3367 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(NewPacket);
3368 Data->PacketNeeds = 0;
3369 }
3370 else break;
3371 }
3372 }
3373 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3374 }
3375
3376 void disconnected()
3377 {
3378 QTcpSocket* Peer = (QTcpSocket*) sender();
3379 PeerData* Data = (PeerData*) Peer->userData(PeerData::ClassID());
3380
3381 mPeers.Remove(Data->ID);
3382 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_leaved, Data->ID, 0));
3383 Platform::BroadcastNotify("leaved", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
3384 }
3385
3386 private:
3387 bool Listen(uint16 port) override
3388 {
3389 if(mServer->isListening()) return true;
3390 return mServer->listen(QHostAddress::Any, port);
3391 }
3392
3393 bool SendPacket(int peerid, const void* buffer, sint32 buffersize, bool utf8) override
3394 {
3395 if(QTcpSocket** Peer = mPeers.Access(peerid))
3396 {
3397 if((*Peer)->write((chars) buffer, buffersize) == buffersize)
3398 return true;
3399
3400 mPeers.Remove(peerid);
3401 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_leaved, peerid, 0));
3402 Platform::BroadcastNotify("leaved", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
3403 }
3404 return false;
3405 }
3406
3407 bool KickPeer(int peerid) override
3408 {
3409 if(QTcpSocket** Peer = mPeers.Access(peerid))
3410 {
3411 (*Peer)->disconnectFromHost();
3412 mPeers.Remove(peerid);
3413 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_kicked, peerid, 0));
3414 Platform::BroadcastNotify("kicked", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
3415 return true;
3416 }
3417 return false;
3418 }
3419
3420 bool GetPeerAddress(int peerid, ip4address* ip4, ip6address* ip6, uint16* port) override
3421 {
3422 if(QTcpSocket** Peer = mPeers.Access(peerid))
3423 {
3424 if(ip4)
3425 {
3426 auto IPv4Address = (*Peer)->peerAddress().toIPv4Address();
3427 ip4->ip[0] = (IPv4Address >> 24) & 0xFF;
3428 ip4->ip[1] = (IPv4Address >> 16) & 0xFF;
3429 ip4->ip[2] = (IPv4Address >> 8) & 0xFF;
3430 ip4->ip[3] = (IPv4Address >> 0) & 0xFF;
3431 }
3432 if(ip6)
3433 {
3434 auto IPv6Address = (*Peer)->peerAddress().toIPv6Address();
3435 *ip6 = *((ip6address*) &IPv6Address);
3436 }
3437 if(port) *port = (*Peer)->peerPort();
3438 return true;
3439 }
3440 return false;
3441 }
3442 };
3443
3444 class WSServerClass : public ServerClass
3445 {
3446 Q_OBJECT
3447
3448 private:
3449 QWebSocketServer* mServer;
3450 Map<QWebSocket*> mPeers;
3451
3452 public:
3453 WSServerClass(chars name = "noname")
3454 {
3455 mServer = new QWebSocketServer(name, QWebSocketServer::NonSecureMode, this);
3456 connect(mServer, &QWebSocketServer::newConnection, this, &WSServerClass::acceptPeer);
3457 }
3458
3459 ~WSServerClass() override
3460 {
3461 mServer->close();
3462 }
3463
3464 WSServerClass& operator=(const WSServerClass&)
3465 {
3466 BOSS_ASSERT("호출불가", false);
3467 return *this;
3468 }
3469
3470 private slots:
3471 void acceptPeer()
3472 {
3473 QWebSocket* Peer = mServer->nextPendingConnection();
3474 PeerData* NewData = new PeerData();
3475 mPeers[NewData->ID] = Peer;
3476 Peer->setUserData(PeerData::ClassID(), NewData);
3477 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_entrance, NewData->ID, 0));
3478
3479 connect(Peer, &QWebSocket::textFrameReceived, this, &WSServerClass::textReceived);
3480 connect(Peer, &QWebSocket::binaryFrameReceived, this, &WSServerClass::binaryReceived);
3481 connect(Peer, &QWebSocket::disconnected, this, &WSServerClass::disconnected);
3482 Platform::BroadcastNotify("entrance", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3483 }
3484
3485 void textReceived(const QString& frame, bool isLastFrame)
3486 {
3487 binaryReceived(frame.toUtf8(), isLastFrame);
3488 }
3489
3490 void binaryReceived(const QByteArray& frame, bool isLastFrame)
3491 {
3492 QWebSocket* Peer = (QWebSocket*) sender();
3493 PeerData* Data = (PeerData*) Peer->userData(PeerData::ClassID());
3494 const sint64 PacketSize = frame.size();
3495
3496 if(0 < PacketSize)
3497 {
3498 PeerPacket* NewPacket = new PeerPacket(packettype_message, Data->ID, PacketSize);
3499 Memory::Copy((void*) NewPacket->Buffer, frame.constData(), PacketSize);
3500 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(NewPacket);
3501 }
3502 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3503 }
3504
3505 void disconnected()
3506 {
3507 QWebSocket* Peer = (QWebSocket*) sender();
3508 PeerData* Data = (PeerData*) Peer->userData(PeerData::ClassID());
3509
3510 mPeers.Remove(Data->ID);
3511 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_leaved, Data->ID, 0));
3512 Platform::BroadcastNotify("leaved", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
3513 }
3514
3515 private:
3516 bool Listen(uint16 port) override
3517 {
3518 if(mServer->isListening()) return true;
3519 return mServer->listen(QHostAddress::Any, port);
3520 }
3521
3522 bool SendPacket(int peerid, const void* buffer, sint32 buffersize, bool utf8) override
3523 {
3524 if(QWebSocket** Peer = mPeers.Access(peerid))
3525 {
3526 if(utf8)
3527 {
3528 if((*Peer)->sendTextMessage(QString::fromUtf8((chars) buffer, buffersize)) == buffersize)
3529 return true;
3530 }
3531 else if((*Peer)->sendBinaryMessage(QByteArray((chars) buffer, buffersize)) == buffersize)
3532 return true;
3533
3534 mPeers.Remove(peerid);
3535 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_leaved, peerid, 0));
3536 Platform::BroadcastNotify("leaved", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
3537 }
3538 return false;
3539 }
3540
3541 bool KickPeer(int peerid) override
3542 {
3543 if(QWebSocket** Peer = mPeers.Access(peerid))
3544 {
3545 (*Peer)->disconnect();
3546 mPeers.Remove(peerid);
3547 mPacketQueue.Enqueue(new PeerPacket(packettype_kicked, peerid, 0));
3548 Platform::BroadcastNotify("kicked", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive);
3549 return true;
3550 }
3551 return false;
3552 }
3553
3554 bool GetPeerAddress(int peerid, ip4address* ip4, ip6address* ip6, uint16* port) override
3555 {
3556 if(QWebSocket** Peer = mPeers.Access(peerid))
3557 {
3558 if(ip4)
3559 {
3560 auto IPv4Address = (*Peer)->peerAddress().toIPv4Address();
3561 ip4->ip[0] = (IPv4Address >> 24) & 0xFF;
3562 ip4->ip[1] = (IPv4Address >> 16) & 0xFF;
3563 ip4->ip[2] = (IPv4Address >> 8) & 0xFF;
3564 ip4->ip[3] = (IPv4Address >> 0) & 0xFF;
3565 }
3566 if(ip6)
3567 {
3568 auto IPv6Address = (*Peer)->peerAddress().toIPv6Address();
3569 *ip6 = *((ip6address*) &IPv6Address);
3570 }
3571 if(port) *port = (*Peer)->peerPort();
3572 return true;
3573 }
3574 return false;
3575 }
3576 };
3577
3578 class SocketBox : public QObject
3579 {
3580 Q_OBJECT
3581
3582 public:
3583 SocketBox()
3584 {
3585 m_type = Type::NIL;
3586 m_socket = nullptr;
3587 m_wsocket = nullptr;
3588 m_udpip.clear();
3589 m_udpport = 0;
3590 }
3591 virtual ~SocketBox()
3592 {
3593 delete m_socket;
3594 delete m_wsocket;
3595 }
3596
3597 public:
3598 void Init(chars type)
3599 {
3600 if(!String::Compare(type, "TCP"))
3601 {
3602 m_type = Type::TCP;
3603 m_socket = (QAbstractSocket*) new QTcpSocket();
3604 }
3605 else if(!String::Compare(type, "UDP"))
3606 {
3607 m_type = Type::UDP;
3608 m_socket = (QAbstractSocket*) new QUdpSocket();
3609 }
3610 else if(!String::Compare(type, "WS"))
3611 {
3612 m_type = Type::WS;
3613 m_wsocket = new QWebSocket();
3614 }
3615
3616 if(m_socket)
3617 {
3618 connect(m_socket, &QAbstractSocket::connected, this, &SocketBox::OnConnected);
3619 connect(m_socket, &QAbstractSocket::disconnected, this, &SocketBox::OnDisconnected);
3620 connect(m_socket, &QAbstractSocket::readyRead, this, &SocketBox::OnReadyRead);
3621 }
3622 else if(m_wsocket)
3623 {
3624 connect(m_wsocket, &QWebSocket::connected, this, &SocketBox::OnWebConnected);
3625 connect(m_wsocket, &QWebSocket::disconnected, this, &SocketBox::OnWebDisconnected);
3626 connect(m_wsocket, &QWebSocket::textFrameReceived, this, &SocketBox::OnWebTextReceived);
3627 connect(m_wsocket, &QWebSocket::binaryFrameReceived, this, &SocketBox::OnWebBinaryReceived);
3628 }
3629 }
3630 bool CheckState(chars name)
3631 {
3632 switch(m_type)
3633 {
3634 case Type::TCP:
3635 if(!m_socket->isValid())
3636 return false;
3637 if(m_socket->state() == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
3638 return false;
3639 return true;
3640 case Type::UDP:
3641 return true;
3642 case Type::WS:
3643 if(!m_wsocket->isValid())
3644 return false;
3645 if(m_wsocket->state() == QAbstractSocket::UnconnectedState)
3646 return false;
3647 return true;
3648 }
3649 return false;
3650 }
3651
3652 private slots:
3653 void OnConnected()
3654 {
3655 Platform::BroadcastNotify("connected", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3656 }
3657 void OnDisconnected()
3658 {
3659 Platform::BroadcastNotify("disconnected", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3660 }
3661 void OnReadyRead()
3662 {
3663 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3664 }
3665 void OnWebConnected()
3666 {
3667 Platform::BroadcastNotify("connected", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3668 }
3669 void OnWebDisconnected()
3670 {
3671 Platform::BroadcastNotify("disconnected", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3672 }
3673 void OnWebTextReceived(const QString& frame, bool isLastFrame)
3674 {
3675 OnWebBinaryReceived(frame.toUtf8(), isLastFrame);
3676 }
3677 void OnWebBinaryReceived(const QByteArray& frame, bool isLastFrame)
3678 {
3679 m_wbytes += frame;
3680 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_SocketReceive, nullptr, true);
3681 }
3682
3683 public:
3684 enum class Type {NIL, TCP, UDP, WS} m_type;
3685 QAbstractSocket* m_socket;
3686 QWebSocket* m_wsocket;
3687 QByteArray m_wbytes;
3688 QHostAddress m_udpip;
3689 quint16 m_udpport;
3690
3691 private:
3692 class STClass
3693 {
3694 public:
3695 STClass()
3696 {
3697 static uint64 LastThreadID = 0;
3698 m_lastId = (++LastThreadID) << 20;
3699 }
3700 ~STClass() {}
3701 public:
3702 Map<SocketBox> m_map;
3703 ublock m_lastId;
3704 };
3705 static inline STClass& ST() {return *BOSS_STORAGE_SYS(STClass);}
3706
3707 public:
3708 static void Create(id_socket& result, chars type)
3709 {
3710 STClass& CurClass = ST();
3711 CurClass.m_map[++CurClass.m_lastId].Init(type);
3712 result = (id_socket) AnyTypeToPtr(CurClass.m_lastId);
3713 }
3714 static SocketBox* Access(id_socket id)
3715 {
3716 if(id == nullptr) return nullptr;
3717 BOSS_ASSERT("타 스레드에서 생성된 소켓입니다", (ST().m_lastId >> 20) == (((ublock) id) >> 20));
3718 return ST().m_map.Access(PtrToUint64(id));
3719 }
3720 static void Remove(id_socket id)
3721 {
3722 ST().m_map.Remove(PtrToUint64(id));
3723 }
3724 };
3725
3726 class Hostent
3727 {
3728 public:
3729 Hostent() :
3730 h_addrtype(2), // AF_INET
3731 h_length(4) // IPv4
3732 {
3733 h_name = nullptr;
3734 h_aliases = nullptr;
3735 h_addr_list = nullptr;
3736 }
3737
3738 ~Hostent()
3739 {
3740 Clear();
3741 }
3742
3743 public:
3744 void Clear()
3745 {
3746 delete[] h_name;
3747 if(h_aliases)
3748 for(chars* ptr_aliases = h_aliases; *ptr_aliases; ++ptr_aliases)
3749 delete[] *ptr_aliases;
3750 delete[] h_aliases;
3751 if(h_addr_list)
3752 for(bytes* ptr_addr_list = h_addr_list; *ptr_addr_list; ++ptr_addr_list)
3753 delete[] *ptr_addr_list;
3754 delete[] h_addr_list;
3755 h_name = nullptr;
3756 h_aliases = nullptr;
3757 h_addr_list = nullptr;
3758 }
3759
3760 public:
3761 chars h_name;
3762 chars* h_aliases;
3763 const sint16 h_addrtype;
3764 const sint16 h_length;
3765 bytes* h_addr_list;
3766 };
3767
3768 class Servent
3769 {
3770 public:
3771 Servent()
3772 {
3773 s_name = nullptr;
3774 s_aliases = nullptr;
3775 s_port = 0;
3776 s_proto = nullptr;
3777 }
3778
3779 ~Servent()
3780 {
3781 Clear();
3782 }
3783
3784 public:
3785 void Clear()
3786 {
3787 delete[] s_name;
3788 for(chars* ptr_aliases = s_aliases; ptr_aliases; ++ptr_aliases)
3789 delete[] *ptr_aliases;
3790 delete[] s_aliases;
3791 delete[] s_proto;
3792 s_name = nullptr;
3793 s_aliases = nullptr;
3794 s_port = 0;
3795 s_proto = nullptr;
3796 }
3797
3798 public:
3799 chars s_name;
3800 chars* s_aliases;
3801 sint16 s_port;
3802 chars s_proto;
3803 };
3804
3805 class PipeClass : public QObject
3806 {
3807 Q_OBJECT
3808
3809 public:
3810 PipeClass(QSharedMemory* semaphore)
3811 {
3812 mStatus = CS_Connecting;
3813 mTempContext = nullptr;
3814 mSemaphore = semaphore;
3815 }
3816 virtual ~PipeClass()
3817 {
3818 delete mTempContext;
3819 delete mSemaphore;
3820 }
3821
3822 public:
3823 inline ConnectStatus Status() const {return mStatus;}
3824 inline sint32 RecvAvailable() const {return mData.Count();}
3825 sint32 Recv(uint08* data, sint32 size)
3826 {
3827 const sint32 MinSize = Math::Min(size, mData.Count());
3828 Memory::Copy(data, &mData[0], MinSize);
3829 if(MinSize == mData.Count()) mData.SubtractionAll();
3830 else mData.SubtractionSection(0, MinSize);
3831 return MinSize;
3832 }
3833 bool Send(bytes data, sint32 size)
3834 {
3835 bool Result = SendCore(data, size);
3836 FlushCore();
3837 return Result;
3838 }
3839
3840 public:
3841 virtual bool IsServer() const = 0;
3842 virtual bool SendCore(bytes data, sint32 size) = 0;
3843 virtual void FlushCore() = 0;
3844
3845 public:
3846 const Context* RecvJson()
3847 {
3848 static const String JsonBegin("#json begin");
3849 static const String JsonEnd("#json end");
3850 delete mTempContext;
3851 mTempContext = nullptr;
3852
3853 if(JsonEnd.Length() < mData.Count())
3854 {
3855 String Message(mData);
3856 sint32 BeginPos = 0, EndPos = 0;
3857 if((EndPos = Message.Find(0, JsonEnd)) != -1)
3858 {
3859 if((BeginPos = Message.Find(0, JsonBegin)) != -1)
3860 {
3861 const sint32 JsonPos = BeginPos + JsonBegin.Length();
3862 const sint32 JsonSize = EndPos - JsonPos;
3863 mTempContext = new Context(ST_Json, SO_NeedCopy, &mData[JsonPos], JsonSize);
3864 }
3865 mData.SubtractionSection(0, EndPos + JsonEnd.Length());
3866 }
3867 }
3868 return mTempContext;
3869 }
3870 bool SendJson(const String& json)
3871 {
3872 bool Result = true;
3873 Result &= SendCore((bytes) "#json begin", 11);
3874 Result &= SendCore((bytes) (chars) json, json.Length());
3875 Result &= SendCore((bytes) "#json end", 9);
3876 FlushCore();
3877 return Result;
3878 }
3879
3880 protected:
3881 ConnectStatus mStatus;
3882 chararray mData;
3883 Context* mTempContext;
3884 QSharedMemory* mSemaphore;
3885 };
3886
3887 class PipeServerClass : public PipeClass
3888 {
3889 Q_OBJECT
3890
3891 public:
3892 PipeServerClass(QLocalServer* server, QSharedMemory* semaphore) : PipeClass(semaphore)
3893 {
3894 mServer = server;
3895 mLastClient = nullptr;
3896 connect(server, &QLocalServer::newConnection, this, &PipeServerClass::OnNewConnection);
3897 }
3898 ~PipeServerClass() override
3899 {
3900 delete mServer;
3901 }
3902
3903 private:
3904 bool IsServer() const override
3905 {
3906 return true;
3907 }
3908 bool SendCore(bytes data, sint32 size) override
3909 {
3910 if(mLastClient)
3911 return (mLastClient->write((chars) data, size) == size);
3912 return false;
3913 }
3914 void FlushCore() override
3915 {
3916 if(mLastClient)
3917 mLastClient->flush();
3918 }
3919
3920 private slots:
3921 void OnNewConnection()
3922 {
3923 QLocalSocket* NewClient = mServer->nextPendingConnection();
3924 if(mStatus == CS_Connecting)
3925 {
3926 mStatus = CS_Connected;
3927 mLastClient = NewClient;
3928 connect(mLastClient, &QLocalSocket::readyRead, this, &PipeServerClass::OnReadyRead);
3929 connect(mLastClient, &QLocalSocket::disconnected, this, &PipeServerClass::OnDisconnected);
3930 }
3931 else NewClient->disconnectFromServer();
3932 }
3933 void OnReadyRead()
3934 {
3935 mLastClient = (QLocalSocket*) sender();
3936 if(sint64 PacketSize = mLastClient->bytesAvailable())
3937 mLastClient->read((char*) mData.AtDumpingAdded(PacketSize), PacketSize);
3938 }
3939 void OnDisconnected()
3940 {
3941 mStatus = CS_Connecting;
3942 mLastClient = nullptr;
3943 }
3944
3945 private:
3946 QLocalServer* mServer;
3947 QLocalSocket* mLastClient;
3948 };
3949
3950 class PipeClientClass : public PipeClass
3951 {
3952 Q_OBJECT
3953
3954 public:
3955 PipeClientClass(chars name, QSharedMemory* semaphore) : PipeClass(semaphore)
3956 {
3957 mClient = new QLocalSocket();
3958 connect(mClient, &QLocalSocket::readyRead, this, &PipeClientClass::OnReadyRead);
3959 connect(mClient, &QLocalSocket::connected, this, &PipeClientClass::OnConnected);
3960 connect(mClient, &QLocalSocket::disconnected, this, &PipeClientClass::OnDisconnected);
3961
3962 mClient->abort();
3963 mClient->connectToServer(name);
3964 }
3965 ~PipeClientClass() override
3966 {
3967 delete mClient;
3968 }
3969
3970 private:
3971 bool IsServer() const override
3972 {
3973 return false;
3974 }
3975 bool SendCore(bytes data, sint32 size) override
3976 {
3977 return (mClient->write((chars) data, size) == size);
3978 }
3979 void FlushCore() override
3980 {
3981 mClient->flush();
3982 }
3983
3984 private slots:
3985 void OnReadyRead()
3986 {
3987 if(sint64 PacketSize = mClient->bytesAvailable())
3988 mClient->read((char*) mData.AtDumpingAdded(PacketSize), PacketSize);
3989 }
3990 void OnConnected()
3991 {
3992 mStatus = CS_Connected;
3993 }
3994 void OnDisconnected()
3995 {
3996 mStatus = CS_Disconnected;
3997 }
3998
3999 private:
4000 QLocalSocket* mClient;
4001 };
4002
4003 class WebEnginePageForExtraDesktop : public QObject
4004 {
4005 Q_OBJECT
4006
4007 public:
4008 enum RenderProcessTerminationStatus {
4009 NormalTerminationStatus = 0,
4010 AbnormalTerminationStatus,
4011 CrashedTerminationStatus,
4012 KilledTerminationStatus
4013 };
4014 enum PermissionPolicy {
4015 PermissionUnknown,
4016 PermissionGrantedByUser,
4017 PermissionDeniedByUser
4018 };
4019 enum Feature {
4020 Notifications = 0,
4021 Geolocation = 1,
4022 MediaAudioCapture = 2,
4023 MediaVideoCapture,
4024 MediaAudioVideoCapture,
4025 MouseLock,
4026 DesktopVideoCapture,
4027 DesktopAudioVideoCapture
4028 };
4029
4030 public:
4031 WebEnginePageForExtraDesktop(QObject* parent = nullptr) {}
4032 virtual ~WebEnginePageForExtraDesktop() {}
4033
4034 public:
4035 enum JavaScriptConsoleMessageLevel {InfoMessageLevel, WarningMessageLevel, ErrorMessageLevel};
4036 typedef std::function<void(const QVariant&)> WebEngineCallbackForExtraDesktop;
4037
4038 public:
4039 void setFeaturePermission(const QUrl &securityOrigin, Feature feature, PermissionPolicy policy) {}
4040 void runJavaScript(const QString& scriptSource, const WebEngineCallbackForExtraDesktop& resultCallback) {}
4041 virtual void javaScriptConsoleMessage(JavaScriptConsoleMessageLevel level, const QString& message, int lineNumber, const QString& sourceID) {}
4042 };
4043
4044 class WebEngineViewForExtraDesktop : public QObject
4045 {
4046 Q_OBJECT
4047
4048 public:
4049 WebEngineViewForExtraDesktop(QWidget* parent = nullptr)
4050 {
4051 mPage = new WebEnginePageForExtraDesktop(this);
4052 }
4053 virtual ~WebEngineViewForExtraDesktop()
4054 {

4056 }
4057
4058 public:

4060 {
4061 delete mPage;
4062 mPage = page;
4063 }
4064 WebEnginePageForExtraDesktop* page() const {return mPage;}
4065 void setMouseTracking(...) {}
4066 virtual void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) {}
4067
4068 public:
4069 WebEnginePageForExtraDesktop* mPage;
4070 };

4080 class WebPageClass : public WebEnginePageClass
4081 {
4082 Q_OBJECT
4083
4084 public:
4085 WebPageClass(QObject* parent = nullptr) : WebEnginePageClass(parent)
4086 {
4087 mCb = nullptr;
4088 mData = nullptr;
4089 }
4090 ~WebPageClass() override {}
4091
4092 public:
4093 void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
4094 {
4095 mCb = cb;
4096 mData = data;
4097 }
4098
4099 private:
4100 #if defined(QT_HAVE_WEBENGINEWIDGETS)
4101 bool certificateError(const QWebEngineCertificateError& error) override
4102 {
4103 return true;
4104 }
4105 #endif
4106
4107 void javaScriptConsoleMessage(JavaScriptConsoleMessageLevel level, const QString& message, int lineNumber, const QString& sourceID) override
4108 {
4109 if(mCb)
4110 mCb(mData, String::Format("JSConsole:%d", level), message.toUtf8().constData());
4111 }

4113 private:

4117
4118 class WebViewClass : public WebEngineViewClass
4119 {
4120 Q_OBJECT
4121
4122 public:
4123 WebViewClass(QWidget* parent = nullptr) : WebEngineViewClass(parent), mHandle(h_web::null())
4124 {
4125 mNowLoading = false;
4126 mLoadingProgress = 100;
4127 mLoadingRate = 1;
4128 mCb = nullptr;
4129 mData = nullptr;
4130
4131 setPage(new WebPageClass(this));
4132 setMouseTracking(true);
4133 connect(this, SIGNAL(titleChanged(QString)), SLOT(onTitleChanged(QString)));
4134 connect(this, SIGNAL(urlChanged(QUrl)), SLOT(onUrlChanged(QUrl)));
4135 connect(this, SIGNAL(loadStarted()), SLOT(onLoadStarted()));
4136 connect(this, SIGNAL(loadProgress(int)), SLOT(onLoadProgress(int)));
4137 connect(this, SIGNAL(loadFinished(bool)), SLOT(onLoadFinished(bool)));
4138 connect(this, SIGNAL(renderProcessTerminated(QWebEnginePage::RenderProcessTerminationStatus, int)),
4139 SLOT(onRenderProcessTerminated(QWebEnginePage::RenderProcessTerminationStatus, int)));
4140 connect(page(), SIGNAL(featurePermissionRequested(QUrl, QWebEnginePage::Feature)),
4141 SLOT(onFeaturePermissionRequested(QUrl, QWebEnginePage::Feature)));
4142 }
4143 virtual ~WebViewClass()
4144 {
4145 mHandle.set_buf(nullptr);
4146 }
4147
4148 public:
4149 WebViewClass(const WebViewClass&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
4150 WebViewClass& operator=(const WebViewClass&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
4151
4152 public:
4153 void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
4154 {
4155 mCb = cb;
4156 mData = data;
4157 ((WebPageClass*) page())->SetCallback(cb, data);
4158 }
4159 void CallJSFunction(chars script, sint32 matchid)
4160 {
4161 page()->runJavaScript(script,
4162 [this, matchid](const QVariant& v)->void
4163 {
4164 if(mCb)
4165 {
4166 const String Result = v.toString().toUtf8().constData();
4167 if(0 < Result.Length())
4168 mCb(mData, String::Format("JSFunction:%d", matchid), Result);
4169 }
4170 });
4171 }
4172
4173 protected:
4174 void closeEvent(QCloseEvent* event) Q_DECL_OVERRIDE
4175 {
4176 event->accept();
4177 mHandle.set_buf(nullptr);
4178 }
4179
4180 private slots:
4181 void onTitleChanged(const QString& title)
4182 {
4183 if(mCb)
4184 mCb(mData, "TitleChanged", title.toUtf8().constData());
4185 }
4186 void onUrlChanged(const QUrl& url)
4187 {
4188 if(mCb)
4189 mCb(mData, "UrlChanged", url.url().toUtf8().constData());
4190 }
4191 void onLoadStarted()
4192 {
4193 mNowLoading = true;
4194 mLoadingProgress = 0;
4195 mLoadingRate = 0;
4196 }
4197 void onLoadProgress(int progress)
4198 {
4199 mNowLoading = true;
4200 mLoadingProgress = progress;
4201 }
4202 void onLoadFinished(bool)
4203 {
4204 mNowLoading = false;
4205 mLoadingProgress = 100;
4206 mLoadingRate = 1;
4207 if(mCb)
4208 mCb(mData, "LoadFinished", "");
4209 }
4210 void renderProcessTerminated(WebEnginePageClass::RenderProcessTerminationStatus terminationStatus, int exitCode)
4211 {
4212 if(mCb)
4213 {
4214 switch(terminationStatus)
4215 {
4216 case WebEnginePageClass::NormalTerminationStatus: mCb(mData, "RenderTerminated", "Normal"); break;
4217 case WebEnginePageClass::AbnormalTerminationStatus: mCb(mData, "RenderTerminated", "Abnormal"); break;
4218 case WebEnginePageClass::CrashedTerminationStatus: mCb(mData, "RenderTerminated", "Crashed"); break;
4219 case WebEnginePageClass::KilledTerminationStatus: mCb(mData, "RenderTerminated", "Killed"); break;
4220 }
4221 }
4222 }
4223 void onFeaturePermissionRequested(QUrl q, WebEnginePageClass::Feature f)
4224 {
4225 page()->setFeaturePermission(q, f, WebEnginePageClass::PermissionGrantedByUser);
4226 }
4227
4228 public:
4229 h_web mHandle;
4230 bool mNowLoading;
4231 int mLoadingProgress;
4232 float mLoadingRate;
4233
4234 private:
4235 Platform::Web::EventCB mCb;
4236 payload mData;
4237 };
4238
4239 #if defined(QT_HAVE_WEBENGINEWIDGETS)
4240 class WebClassForDesktop
4241 {
4242 public:
4243 WebClassForDesktop()
4244 {
4245 mProxy = mScene.addWidget(&mView);
4246 mLastTextureGL = nullptr;
4247 }
4248 ~WebClassForDesktop()
4249 {
4250 mScene.removeItem(mProxy);
4251 mLastTexture.ClearDirectly();
4252 delete mLastTextureGL;
4253 }
4254
4255 public:
4256 WebClassForDesktop(const WebClassForDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
4257 WebClassForDesktop& operator=(const WebClassForDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
4258
4259 public:
4260 void AttachHandle(h_web web)
4261 {
4262 mView.mHandle = web;
4263 }
4264 void ClearCookies()
4265 {
4266 mView.page()->profile()->setPersistentCookiesPolicy(QWebEngineProfile::NoPersistentCookies);
4267 }
4268 void Reload(chars url)
4269 {
4270 mView.load(QUrl(QString(url)));
4271 }
4272 bool NowLoading(float* rate)
4273 {
4274 if(rate)
4275 {
4276 mView.mLoadingRate = mView.mLoadingRate * 0.9f + mView.mLoadingProgress / 100.0f * 0.1f;
4277 *rate = mView.mLoadingRate;
4278 }
4279 return mView.mNowLoading && (mView.mLoadingProgress < 100); // LoadingProgress만 100%가 되어도 로딩이 끝난것으로 간주
4280 }
4281 bool Resize(sint32 width, sint32 height)
4282 {
4283 if(width != mLastImage.width() || height != mLastImage.height())
4284 {
4285 mView.resize(width, height);
4286 mLastImage = QImage(width, height, QImage::Format_ARGB32);
4287 return true;
4288 }
4289 return false;
4290 }
4291 void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
4292 {
4293 mView.SetCallback(cb, data);
4294 }
4295 void SendTouchEvent(TouchType type, sint32 x, sint32 y)
4296 {
4297 QMouseEvent::Type CurType = QMouseEvent::None;
4298 sint32 ButtonType = 0;
4299 switch(type)
4300 {
4301 case TT_Moving: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseMove; break;
4302 case TT_Press: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseButtonPress; ButtonType = 1; break;
4303 case TT_Dragging: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseMove; ButtonType = 1; break;
4304 case TT_Release: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseButtonRelease; ButtonType = 1; break;
4305 case TT_ExtendPress: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseButtonPress; ButtonType = 2; break;
4306 case TT_ExtendDragging: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseMove; ButtonType = 2; break;
4307 case TT_ExtendRelease: CurType = QMouseEvent::MouseButtonRelease; ButtonType = 2; break;
4308 default: BOSS_ASSERT("해당 case가 준비되지 않았습니다", false);
4309 }
4310 QMouseEvent NewEvent(CurType, QPoint(x, y),
4311 (ButtonType == 0)? Qt::NoButton : ((ButtonType == 1)? Qt::LeftButton : Qt::RightButton),
4312 (ButtonType == 0)? Qt::NoButton : ((ButtonType == 1)? Qt::LeftButton : Qt::RightButton),
4313 Qt::NoModifier);
4314 Q_FOREACH(QObject* obj, mView.page()->view()->children())
4315 {
4316 if(qobject_cast<QWidget*>(obj))
4317 QApplication::sendEvent(obj, &NewEvent);
4318 }
4319 }
4320 void SendKeyEvent(sint32 code, chars text, bool pressed)
4321 {
4322 if(auto CurWidget = mView.focusProxy())
4323 {
4324 QKeyEvent NewEvent((pressed)? QKeyEvent::KeyPress : QKeyEvent::KeyRelease, code, Qt::NoModifier, text);
4325 QApplication::sendEvent(CurWidget, &NewEvent);
4326 }
4327 }
4328 void CallJSFunction(chars script, sint32 matchid)
4329 {
4330 mView.CallJSFunction(script, matchid);
4331 }
4332 id_texture_read GetTexture()
4333 {
4334 delete mLastTextureGL;
4335 mLastTextureGL = new QOpenGLTexture(GetImage());
4336 mLastTexture.ResetDirectly(mLastTextureGL->textureId(), mLastTextureGL->width(), mLastTextureGL->height());
4337 return (id_texture_read) &mLastTexture;
4338 }
4339 const QPixmap GetPixmap()
4340 {
4341 return QPixmap::fromImage(GetImage());
4342 }
4343 const QImage& GetImage()
4344 {
4345 CanvasClass CurCanvas(&mLastImage);
4346 mView.update();
4347 mView.render(&CurCanvas.painter());
4348 return mLastImage;
4349 }
4350
4351 private:
4352 WebViewClass mView;
4353 QGraphicsProxyWidget* mProxy;
4354 QGraphicsScene mScene;
4355 QImage mLastImage;
4356 TextureClass mLastTexture;
4357 QOpenGLTexture* mLastTextureGL;
4358 };
4359 typedef WebClassForDesktop WebClass;
4360 #else
4361 class WebClassForExtraDesktop
4362 {
4363 public:
4364 WebClassForExtraDesktop()
4365 {
4366 }
4367 ~WebClassForExtraDesktop()
4368 {
4369 }
4370
4371 public:
4372 WebClassForExtraDesktop(const WebClassForExtraDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
4373 WebClassForExtraDesktop& operator=(const WebClassForExtraDesktop&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
4374
4375 public:
4376 void AttachHandle(h_web web)
4377 {
4378 }
4379 void ClearCookies()
4380 {
4381 }
4382 void Reload(chars url)
4383 {
4384 }
4385 bool NowLoading(float* rate)
4386 {
4387 if(rate) *rate = 1;
4388 return false;
4389 }
4390 bool Resize(sint32 width, sint32 height)
4391 {
4392 if(width != mLastImage.width() || height != mLastImage.height())
4393 {
4394 mLastImage = QImage(width, height, QImage::Format_ARGB32);
4395 return true;
4396 }
4397 return false;
4398 }
4399 void SetCallback(Platform::Web::EventCB cb, payload data)
4400 {
4401 }
4402 void SendTouchEvent(TouchType type, sint32 x, sint32 y)
4403 {
4404 }
4405 void SendKeyEvent(sint32 code, chars text, bool pressed)
4406 {
4407 }
4408 void CallJSFunction(chars script, sint32 matchid)
4409 {
4410 }
4411 id_texture_read GetTexture()
4412 {
4413 return nullptr;
4414 }
4415 const QPixmap GetPixmap()
4416 {
4417 return QPixmap::fromImage(GetImage());
4418 }
4419 const QImage& GetImage()
4420 {
4421 CanvasClass CurCanvas(&mLastImage);
4422 const QRect CurRect(0, 0, mLastImage.width(), mLastImage.height());
4423 return mLastImage;
4424 }
4425
4426 private:
4427 QImage mLastImage;
4428 };
4429 typedef WebClassForExtraDesktop WebClass;
4430 #endif

4432 #ifdef QT_HAVE_PURCHASING
4433 class PurchaseClass : public QInAppStore
4434 {
4435 Q_OBJECT
4436
4437 public:
4438 PurchaseClass(QWidget* parent = nullptr) : QInAppStore(parent)
4439 {
4440 mProduct = nullptr;
4441 connect(this, SIGNAL(productRegistered(QInAppProduct*)), SLOT(onProductRegistered(QInAppProduct*)));
4442 connect(this, SIGNAL(productUnknown(QInAppProduct::ProductType, const QString&)), SLOT(onProductUnknown(QInAppProduct::ProductType, const QString&)));
4443 connect(this, SIGNAL(transactionReady(QInAppTransaction*)), SLOT(onTransactionReady(QInAppTransaction*)));
4444 }
4445 ~PurchaseClass()
4446 {
4447 }
4448
4449 public:
4450 PurchaseClass(const PurchaseClass&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false);}
4451 PurchaseClass& operator=(const PurchaseClass&) {BOSS_ASSERT("사용금지", false); return *this;}
4452
4453 public:
4454 bool Register(chars name, PurchaseType type)
4455 {
4456 mName = name;
4457 switch(type)
4458 {
4459 case PT_Consumable:
4460 registerProduct(QInAppProduct::Consumable, name);
4461 return true;
4462 case PT_Unlockable:
4463 registerProduct(QInAppProduct::Unlockable, name);
4464 return true;
4465 }
4466 return false;
4467 }
4468 bool Purchase(PurchaseCB cb)
4469 {
4470 if(!mProduct)
4471 mProduct = registeredProduct((chars) mName);
4472 if(mProduct)
4473 {
4474 mProduct->purchase();
4475 return true;
4476 }
4477 return false;
4478 }
4479
4480 private slots:
4481 void onProductRegistered(QInAppProduct* product)
4482 {
4483 }
4484 void onProductUnknown(QInAppProduct::ProductType productType, const QString& identifier)
4485 {
4486 }
4487 void onTransactionReady(QInAppTransaction* transaction)
4488 {
4489 }
4490
4491 public:
4492 String mName;
4493 QInAppProduct* mProduct;
4494 };
4495 #else
4496 class PurchaseClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
4497 #endif
4498
4499 class BluetoothSearchClass : public QObject
4500 {
4501 Q_OBJECT
4502
4503 public:
4504 static void DeviceBegin()
4505 {
4506 DeviceEnd();
4507
4508 auto& Self = ST();
4509 Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4510 {
4511 Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent = new QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent();
4512 Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent->setLowEnergyDiscoveryTimeout(5000);
4513 Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent->start();
4514 }
4515 Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4516
4517 connect(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent, &QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::deviceDiscovered,
4518 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::deviceDiscovered);
4519 connect(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent, &QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::finished,
4520 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanDeviceFinished);
4521 connect(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent, QOverload<QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::Error>::of(&QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::error),
4522 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanDeviceErrorOccurred);
4523
4524 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanDeviceStarted", nullptr, NT_BluetoothSearch);
4525 }
4526 static void DeviceEnd()
4527 {
4528 auto& Self = ST();
4529 Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4530 {
4531 Self.mDiscoveredDevices.empty();
4532
4533 if(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent)
4534 {
4535 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent, &QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::deviceDiscovered,
4536 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::deviceDiscovered);
4537 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent, &QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::finished,
4538 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanDeviceFinished);
4539 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent, QOverload<QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::Error>::of(&QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::error),
4540 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanDeviceErrorOccurred);
4541
4542 if(Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent->isActive())
4543 {
4544 Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent->stop();
4545 Self.scanDeviceFinished();
4546 }
4547 delete Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent;
4548 Self.mDiscoveryDeviceAgent = nullptr;
4549 }
4550 }
4551 Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4552 }
4553
4554 public:
4555 static void ServiceBegin(chars deviceaddress, Strings uuidfilters)
4556 {
4557 ServiceEnd();
4558
4559 auto& Self = ST();
4560 Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4561 {
4562 Self.mFocusedDeviceAddress = deviceaddress;
4563
4564 // 디바이스타겟 등록
4565 if(deviceaddress)
4566 {
4567 if(auto NewDevice = CloneOrCreateDevice(deviceaddress, false))
4568 {
4569 if(NewDevice->coreConfigurations() & QBluetoothDeviceInfo::LowEnergyCoreConfiguration)
4570 {
4571 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE = QLowEnergyController::createCentral(*NewDevice, &Self);
4572 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE->setRemoteAddressType(QLowEnergyController::PublicAddress);
4573 }
4574 else
4575 {
4576 QBluetoothLocalDevice LocalDevice;
4577 QBluetoothAddress LocalAdapter = LocalDevice.address();
4578 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT = new QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent(LocalAdapter);
4579 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT->setRemoteAddress(NewDevice->address());
4580 }
4581 delete NewDevice;
4582 }
4583 }
4584
4585 if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT)
4586 {
4587 // UUID필터 등록
4588 if(uuidfilters.Count() == 1)
4589 {
4590 const QBluetoothUuid NewUUID(QString::fromUtf8((chars) uuidfilters[0]));
4591 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT->setUuidFilter(NewUUID);
4592 }
4593 else if(1 < uuidfilters.Count())
4594 {
4595 QList<QBluetoothUuid> NewUUIDs;
4596 for(sint32 i = 0, iend = uuidfilters.Count(); i < iend; ++i)
4597 NewUUIDs += QBluetoothUuid(QString::fromUtf8((chars) uuidfilters[i]));
4598 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT->setUuidFilter(NewUUIDs);
4599 }
4600 }
4601 }
4602 Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4603
4604 if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT)
4605 {
4606 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT, &QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::serviceDiscovered,
4607 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::serviceDiscovered_BT);
4608 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT, &QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::finished,
4609 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceFinished_BT);
4610 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT, QOverload<QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::Error>::of(&QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::error),
4611 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceErrorOccurred_BT);
4612 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT->start(QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::FullDiscovery);
4613 }
4614 else if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE)
4615 {
4616 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::serviceDiscovered,
4617 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::serviceDiscovered_BLE);
4618 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::discoveryFinished,
4619 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceFinished_BLE);
4620 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, QOverload<QLowEnergyController::Error>::of(&QLowEnergyController::error),
4621 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceErrorOccurred_BLE);
4622 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::connected,
4623 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::deviceConnected_BLE);
4624 connect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::disconnected,
4625 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::deviceDisconnected_BLE);
4626 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE->connectToDevice();
4627 }
4628
4629 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanServiceStarted", nullptr, NT_BluetoothSearch);
4630 }
4631 static void ServiceEnd()
4632 {
4633 auto& Self = ST();
4634 Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4635 {
4636 Self.mFocusedDeviceAddress.clear();
4637 Self.mDiscoveredServices_BT.empty();
4638
4639 if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT)
4640 {
4641 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT, &QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::serviceDiscovered,
4642 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::serviceDiscovered_BT);
4643 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT, &QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::finished,
4644 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceFinished_BT);
4645 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT, QOverload<QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::Error>::of(&QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::error),
4646 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceErrorOccurred_BT);
4647
4648 if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT->isActive())
4649 {
4650 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT->stop();
4651 Self.scanServiceFinished_BT();
4652 }
4653 delete Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT;
4654 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT = nullptr;
4655 }
4656 else if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE)
4657 {
4658 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::serviceDiscovered,
4659 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::serviceDiscovered_BLE);
4660 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::discoveryFinished,
4661 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceFinished_BLE);
4662 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, QOverload<QLowEnergyController::Error>::of(&QLowEnergyController::error),
4663 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::scanServiceErrorOccurred_BLE);
4664 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::connected,
4665 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::deviceConnected_BLE);
4666 disconnect(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE, &QLowEnergyController::disconnected,
4667 &Self, &BluetoothSearchClass::deviceDisconnected_BLE);
4668
4669 if(Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE->state() != QLowEnergyController::UnconnectedState)
4670 {
4671 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE->disconnectFromDevice();
4672 Self.scanServiceFinished_BLE();
4673 }
4674 delete Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE;
4675 Self.mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE = nullptr;
4676 }
4677 }
4678 Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4679 }
4680
4681 public:
4682 static QBluetoothDeviceInfo* GetClonedSearchedDevice(chars address, bool locking)
4683 {
4684 auto& Self = ST();
4685 QBluetoothDeviceInfo* NewDeviceInfo = nullptr;
4686 if(locking) Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4687 {
4688 auto Result = Self.mDiscoveredDevices.find(QString::fromUtf8(address));
4689 if(Result != Self.mDiscoveredDevices.end())
4690 NewDeviceInfo = new QBluetoothDeviceInfo(Result.value());
4691 }
4692 if(locking) Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4693 return NewDeviceInfo;
4694 }
4695 static QBluetoothDeviceInfo* CreateDevice(chars devicename, chars address)
4696 {
4697 const QBluetoothAddress NewAddress(QString::fromUtf8(address));
4698 QBluetoothDeviceInfo* NewDeviceInfo = new QBluetoothDeviceInfo(NewAddress, QString::fromUtf8(devicename), 0);
4699 return NewDeviceInfo;
4700 }
4701 static QBluetoothDeviceInfo* CloneOrCreateDevice(chars devicename_and_address, bool locking)
4702 {
4703 // 주소로만 구성된 경우 저장된 장치정보에서 검색
4704 if(auto Result = BluetoothSearchClass::GetClonedSearchedDevice(devicename_and_address, locking))
4705 return Result;
4706
4707 // "장치명/주소"로 구성된 경우 장치정보 신규생성
4708 const String DeviceNameAndAddress = devicename_and_address;
4709 sint32 SlashPos = -1;
4710 sint32 NextSlashPos = 0;
4711 while(NextSlashPos != -1)
4712 {
4713 NextSlashPos = DeviceNameAndAddress.Find(SlashPos + 1, "/");
4714 if(NextSlashPos != -1)
4715 SlashPos = NextSlashPos;
4716 }
4717 if(SlashPos != -1)
4718 return BluetoothSearchClass::CreateDevice(
4719 DeviceNameAndAddress.Left(SlashPos), DeviceNameAndAddress.Offset(SlashPos + 1));
4720
4721 return nullptr;
4722 }
4723 static QBluetoothServiceInfo* GetClonedSearchedService_BT(chars uuid, bool locking)
4724 {
4725 auto& Self = ST();
4726 QBluetoothServiceInfo* NewServiceInfo = nullptr;
4727 if(locking) Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4728 {
4729 auto Result = Self.mDiscoveredServices_BT.find(QString::fromUtf8(uuid));
4730 if(Result != Self.mDiscoveredServices_BT.end())
4731 NewServiceInfo = new QBluetoothServiceInfo(Result.value());
4732 }
4733 if(locking) Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4734 return NewServiceInfo;
4735 }
4736 static QLowEnergyController* CreateController_BLE(QObject* parent, bool locking)
4737 {
4738 auto& Self = ST();
4739 QLowEnergyController* NewController = nullptr;
4740 if(locking) Mutex::Lock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4741 {
4742 if(auto NewDevice = CloneOrCreateDevice(Self.mFocusedDeviceAddress.toUtf8().constData(), false))
4743 {
4744 if(NewDevice->coreConfigurations() & QBluetoothDeviceInfo::LowEnergyCoreConfiguration)
4745 {
4746 NewController = QLowEnergyController::createCentral(*NewDevice, parent);
4747 NewController->setRemoteAddressType(QLowEnergyController::PublicAddress);
4748 }
4749 delete NewDevice;
4750 }
4751 }
4752 if(locking) Mutex::Unlock(Self.mDiscoverMutex);
4753 return NewController;
4754 }
4755
4756 private slots:
4757 void deviceDiscovered(const QBluetoothDeviceInfo& device)
4758 {
4759 const String NewAddress = device.address().toString().toUtf8().constData();
4760 Mutex::Lock(mDiscoverMutex);
4761 {
4762 mDiscoveredDevices.insert(device.address().toString(), device);
4763 }
4764 Mutex::Unlock(mDiscoverMutex);
4765
4766 String DeviceName = device.name().toUtf8().constData();
4767 if(DeviceName.Length() == 0)
4768 DeviceName += "Unknown Device";
4769 if(device.coreConfigurations() & QBluetoothDeviceInfo::LowEnergyCoreConfiguration)
4770 DeviceName += " (BLE)";
4771 Platform::BroadcastNotify(DeviceName, NewAddress, NT_BluetoothDevice);
4772 }
4773 void scanDeviceFinished()
4774 {
4775 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanDeviceFinished", nullptr, NT_BluetoothSearch);
4776 }
4777 void scanDeviceErrorOccurred(QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent::Error error)
4778 {
4779 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanDeviceError", String::Format("code:%d", (sint32) error), NT_BluetoothSearch);
4780 }
4781
4782 void serviceDiscovered_BT(const QBluetoothServiceInfo& service)
4783 {
4784 String ServiceName = service.serviceName().toUtf8().constData();
4785 if(ServiceName.Length() == 0) // 안드로이드에서는 윈도우와 달리 서비스명이 나오지 않는 경우도 있음
4786 ServiceName = "Unknown Service";
4787
4788 Strings UuidCollector;
4789 for(const auto& CurUuid : service.serviceClassUuids())
4790 UuidCollector.AtAdding() = CurUuid.toString().toUtf8().constData();
4791 if(UuidCollector.Count() == 0) // 안드로이드에서는 윈도우와 달리 UUID가 나오지 않는 경우도 있음
4792 {
4793 static sint32 BlankUUID = 0;
4794 UuidCollector.AtAdding() = String::Format("{63ce%04d-ebad-467d-b939-86d3229de522}", ++BlankUUID % 10000);
4795 }
4796
4797 Mutex::Lock(mDiscoverMutex);
4798 {
4799 for(sint32 i = 0, iend = UuidCollector.Count(); i < iend; ++i)
4800 mDiscoveredServices_BT.insert(QString((chars) UuidCollector[i]), service);
4801 }
4802 Mutex::Unlock(mDiscoverMutex);
4803
4804 Platform::BroadcastNotify(ServiceName, UuidCollector, NT_BluetoothService);
4805 }
4806 void scanServiceFinished_BT()
4807 {
4808 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanServiceFinished", nullptr, NT_BluetoothSearch);
4809 }
4810 void scanServiceErrorOccurred_BT(QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent::Error error)
4811 {
4812 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanServiceError", String::Format("code:%d", (sint32) error), NT_BluetoothSearch);
4813 }
4814
4815 void serviceDiscovered_BLE(const QBluetoothUuid& serviceUuid)
4816 {
4817 String ServiceName = "Unknown Service";
4818 if(QLowEnergyService* NewService = mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE->createServiceObject(serviceUuid))
4819 {
4820 const String NewServiceName = NewService->serviceName().toUtf8().constData();
4821 if(0 < NewServiceName.Length()) // 안드로이드에서는 윈도우와 달리 서비스명이 나오지 않는 경우도 있음
4822 ServiceName = NewServiceName;
4823 delete NewService;
4824 }
4825
4826 Strings UuidCollector;
4827 UuidCollector.AtAdding() = serviceUuid.toString().toUtf8().constData();
4828
4829 Platform::BroadcastNotify(ServiceName, UuidCollector, NT_BluetoothService);
4830 }
4831 void scanServiceFinished_BLE()
4832 {
4833 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanServiceFinished", nullptr, NT_BluetoothSearch);
4834 }
4835 void scanServiceErrorOccurred_BLE(QLowEnergyController::Error error)
4836 {
4837 Platform::BroadcastNotify("ScanServiceError", String::Format("code:%d", (sint32) error), NT_BluetoothSearch);
4838 }
4839 void deviceConnected_BLE()
4840 {
4841 mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE->discoverServices();
4842 }
4843 void deviceDisconnected_BLE()
4844 {
4845 }
4846
4847 private:
4848 BluetoothSearchClass()
4849 {
4850 mDiscoverMutex = Mutex::Open();
4851 mDiscoveryDeviceAgent = nullptr;
4852 mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT = nullptr;
4853 mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE = nullptr;
4854 }
4855 ~BluetoothSearchClass()
4856 {
4857 delete mDiscoveryDeviceAgent;
4858 delete mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT;
4859 delete mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE;
4860 Mutex::Close(mDiscoverMutex);
4861 }
4862
4863 private:
4864 static BluetoothSearchClass& ST()
4865 {static BluetoothSearchClass _; return _;}
4866
4867 private:
4868 id_mutex mDiscoverMutex;
4869 QBluetoothDeviceDiscoveryAgent* mDiscoveryDeviceAgent;
4870 QMap<QString, QBluetoothDeviceInfo> mDiscoveredDevices;
4871 QString mFocusedDeviceAddress;
4872 QBluetoothServiceDiscoveryAgent* mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BT;
4873 QMap<QString, QBluetoothServiceInfo> mDiscoveredServices_BT;
4874 QLowEnergyController* mDiscoveryServiceAgent_BLE;
4875 };
4876
4877 class BluetoothClass : public QObject
4878 {
4879 Q_OBJECT
4880
4881 public:
4882 virtual bool Connected() = 0;
4883 virtual sint32 ReadAvailable() = 0;
4884 virtual sint32 Read(uint08* data, const sint32 size) = 0;
4885 virtual bool Write(const uint08* data, const sint32 size) = 0;
4886
4887 public:
4888 BluetoothClass()
4889 {
4890 }
4891 virtual ~BluetoothClass()
4892 {
4893 }
4894 };
4895
4896 class BluetoothServerClass : public BluetoothClass
4897 {
4898 Q_OBJECT
4899
4900 public:
4901 bool Init(chars service, chars uuid, chars description = "-Description-", chars provider = "-Provider-")
4902 {
4903 mServer = new QBluetoothServer(QBluetoothServiceInfo::RfcommProtocol, this);
4904 const QBluetoothAddress LocalAdapter = QBluetoothAddress();
4905 connect(mServer, &QBluetoothServer::newConnection, this, &BluetoothServerClass::OnClientConnected);
4906 mServer->listen(LocalAdapter);
4907
4908 SetServiceInfo(service, uuid, description, provider);
4909 mServiceInfo.registerService(LocalAdapter);
4910 return true;
4911 }
4912
4913 public:
4914 bool Connected() override
4915 {
4916 return (mClient != nullptr);
4917 }
4918 sint32 ReadAvailable() override
4919 {
4920 return mRecvData.count();
4921 }
4922 sint32 Read(uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
4923 {
4924 if(mClient)
4925 {
4926 const sint32 MinSize = Math::Min(mRecvData.count(), size);
4927 Memory::Copy(data, mRecvData.constData(), MinSize);
4928 mRecvData.remove(0, MinSize);
4929 return MinSize;
4930 }
4931 return -1;
4932 }
4933 bool Write(const uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
4934 {
4935 if(mClient)
4936 {
4937 mClient->write((chars) data, size);
4938 mClient->waitForBytesWritten(3000);
4939 return (mClient->state() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState);
4940 }
4941 return false;
4942 }
4943
4944 private slots:
4945 void OnClientConnected()
4946 {
4947 if(mServer && !mClient)
4948 {
4949 mClient = mServer->nextPendingConnection();
4950 connect(mClient, &QBluetoothSocket::disconnected, this, &BluetoothServerClass::OnDisconnected);
4951 connect(mClient, &QBluetoothSocket::readyRead, this, &BluetoothServerClass::OnReadyRead);
4952 Platform::BroadcastNotify("connected", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
4953 }
4954 }
4955 void OnDisconnected()
4956 {
4957 mClient->deleteLater();
4958 mClient = nullptr;
4959 Platform::BroadcastNotify("disconnected", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
4960 }
4961 void OnReadyRead()
4962 {
4963 auto ReadSize = mClient->bytesAvailable();
4964 if(0 < ReadSize)
4965 {
4966 mRecvData += mClient->read(ReadSize);
4967 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
4968 }
4969 }
4970
4971 private:
4972 void SetServiceInfo(chars service, chars uuid, chars description, chars provider)
4973 {
4974 // Profile구성
4975 QBluetoothServiceInfo::Sequence ProfileSequence;
4976 QBluetoothServiceInfo::Sequence ClassID;
4977 ClassID << QVariant::fromValue(QBluetoothUuid(QBluetoothUuid::SerialPort));
4978 ClassID << QVariant::fromValue(quint16(0x100));
4979 ProfileSequence.append(QVariant::fromValue(ClassID));
4980 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::BluetoothProfileDescriptorList, ProfileSequence);
4981
4982 // Service구성
4983 ClassID.clear();
4984 ClassID << QVariant::fromValue(QBluetoothUuid(QString::fromUtf8(uuid)));
4985 ClassID << QVariant::fromValue(QBluetoothUuid(QBluetoothUuid::SerialPort));
4986 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceClassIds, ClassID);
4987 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceName, tr(service));
4988 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceDescription, tr(description));
4989 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ServiceProvider, tr(provider));
4990 mServiceInfo.setServiceUuid(QBluetoothUuid(QString::fromUtf8(uuid)));
4991
4992 // Browse구성
4993 QBluetoothServiceInfo::Sequence PublicBrowse;
4994 PublicBrowse << QVariant::fromValue(QBluetoothUuid(QBluetoothUuid::PublicBrowseGroup));
4995 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::BrowseGroupList, PublicBrowse);
4996
4997 // Protocol구성
4998 QBluetoothServiceInfo::Sequence ProtocolDescriptorList;
4999 QBluetoothServiceInfo::Sequence Protocol;
5000 Protocol << QVariant::fromValue(QBluetoothUuid(QBluetoothUuid::L2cap));
5001 ProtocolDescriptorList.append(QVariant::fromValue(Protocol));
5002 Protocol.clear();
5003 Protocol << QVariant::fromValue(QBluetoothUuid(QBluetoothUuid::Rfcomm));
5004 Protocol << QVariant::fromValue(quint8(mServer->serverPort()));
5005 ProtocolDescriptorList.append(QVariant::fromValue(Protocol));
5006 mServiceInfo.setAttribute(QBluetoothServiceInfo::ProtocolDescriptorList, ProtocolDescriptorList);
5007 }
5008
5009 public:
5010 BluetoothServerClass()
5011 {
5012 mServer = nullptr;
5013 mClient = nullptr;
5014 }
5015 ~BluetoothServerClass() override
5016 {
5017 delete mServer;
5018 }
5019
5020 private:
5021 QBluetoothServer* mServer;
5022 QBluetoothServiceInfo mServiceInfo;
5023 QBluetoothSocket* mClient;
5024 QByteArray mRecvData;
5025 };
5026
5027 // 미완성
5028 class BluetoothLEServerClass : public BluetoothClass
5029 {
5030 Q_OBJECT
5031
5032 public:
5033 bool Init(chars service, chars uuid)
5034 {
5035 mServiceName = QString(service);
5036 mServiceUuid = QBluetoothUuid(QString(uuid));
5037 if(mController = QLowEnergyController::createPeripheral())
5038 {
5039 mAdvertisingData.setDiscoverability(QLowEnergyAdvertisingData::DiscoverabilityGeneral);
5040 mAdvertisingData.setIncludePowerLevel(true);
5041 mAdvertisingData.setLocalName(mServiceName);
5042 mAdvertisingData.setServices(QList<QBluetoothUuid>() << mServiceUuid);
5043
5044 mWriteCharData.setUuid(QBluetoothUuid(QString("f377fa5e-dd91-4427-8606-5cdddce19977")));
5045 mWriteCharData.setProperties(QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Write);
5046
5047 mReadCharData.setUuid(QBluetoothUuid(QString("f377fa5e-dd91-4427-8606-5cdddce19988")));
5048 mReadCharData.setProperties(QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Read);
5049
5050 mServiceData.setType(QLowEnergyServiceData::ServiceTypePrimary);
5051 mServiceData.setUuid(mServiceUuid);
5052 mServiceData.addCharacteristic(mWriteCharData);
5053 mServiceData.addCharacteristic(mReadCharData);
5054
5055 connect(mController, &QLowEnergyController::connected, this, &BluetoothLEServerClass::OnConnected);
5056 connect(mController, &QLowEnergyController::disconnected, this, &BluetoothLEServerClass::OnDisconnected);
5057 mReadTimer = new QTimer(this);
5058 connect(mReadTimer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &BluetoothLEServerClass::OnRead);
5059 mReadTimer->start(100);
5060 SetServiceInfo();
5061 return true;
5062 }
5063 return false;
5064 }
5065
5066 public:
5067 bool Connected() override
5068 {
5069 if(mController)
5070 return (mController->state() == QLowEnergyController::ConnectedState);
5071 return false;
5072 }
5073 sint32 ReadAvailable() override
5074 {
5075 return mReadCount;
5076 }
5077 sint32 Read(uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
5078 {
5079 if(mService)
5080 {
5081 if(!mReadQueue.isEmpty())
5082 {
5083 QByteArray CurBytes = mReadQueue.dequeue();
5084 const sint32 CopySize = Math::Min(size, CurBytes.length());
5085 Memory::Copy(data, CurBytes.constData(), CopySize);
5086 mReadCount -= CurBytes.length();
5087 return CopySize;
5088 }
5089 return 0;
5090 }
5091 return -1;
5092 }
5093 bool Write(const uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
5094 {
5095 if(mService)
5096 {
5097 QLowEnergyCharacteristic WriteChar = mService->characteristic(QBluetoothUuid(QString("f377fa5e-dd91-4427-8606-5cdddce19977")));
5098 if(WriteChar.isValid())
5099 {
5100 mService->writeCharacteristic(WriteChar, QByteArray((chars) data, size));
5101 return true;
5102 }
5103 }
5104 return false;
5105 }
5106
5107 private slots:
5108 void OnConnected()
5109 {
5110 }
5111 void OnDisconnected()
5112 {
5113 SetServiceInfo();
5114 }
5115 void OnRead()
5116 {
5117 if(mService)
5118 {
5119 QLowEnergyCharacteristic ReadChar = mService->characteristic(QBluetoothUuid(QString("f377fa5e-dd91-4427-8606-5cdddce19988")));
5120 if(ReadChar.isValid())
5121 mService->readCharacteristic(ReadChar);
5122 }
5123 }
5124
5125 void OnCharacteristicChanged(const QLowEnergyCharacteristic& info, const QByteArray& value)
5126 {
5127 mReadCount += value.length();
5128 mReadQueue.enqueue(value);
5129 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5130 }
5131 void OnCharacteristicRead(const QLowEnergyCharacteristic& info, const QByteArray& value)
5132 {
5133 mReadCount += value.length();
5134 mReadQueue.enqueue(value);
5135 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5136 }
5137 void OnCharacteristicWritten(const QLowEnergyCharacteristic& info, const QByteArray& value)
5138 {
5139 }
5140
5141 private:
5142 void SetServiceInfo()
5143 {
5144 delete mService;
5145 mService = mController->addService(mServiceData);
5146 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::characteristicChanged, this, &BluetoothLEServerClass::OnCharacteristicChanged);
5147 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::characteristicRead, this, &BluetoothLEServerClass::OnCharacteristicRead);
5148 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::characteristicWritten, this, &BluetoothLEServerClass::OnCharacteristicWritten);
5149 mController->startAdvertising(QLowEnergyAdvertisingParameters(), mAdvertisingData, mAdvertisingData);
5150 }
5151
5152 public:
5153 BluetoothLEServerClass()
5154 {
5155 mController = nullptr;
5156 mService = nullptr;
5157 mReadTimer = nullptr;
5158 mReadCount = 0;
5159 }
5160 ~BluetoothLEServerClass() override
5161 {
5162 if(mReadTimer)
5163 {
5164 mReadTimer->deleteLater();
5165 delete mReadTimer;
5166 }
5167
5168 delete mService;
5169 delete mController;
5170 }
5171
5172 private:
5173 QString mServiceName;
5174 QBluetoothUuid mServiceUuid;
5175 QLowEnergyAdvertisingData mAdvertisingData;
5176 QLowEnergyCharacteristicData mWriteCharData;
5177 QLowEnergyCharacteristicData mReadCharData;
5178 QLowEnergyServiceData mServiceData;
5179 QLowEnergyController* mController;
5180 QLowEnergyService* mService;
5181 QTimer* mReadTimer;
5182 QQueue<QByteArray> mReadQueue;
5183 sint32 mReadCount;
5184 };
5185
5186 class BluetoothClientClass : public BluetoothClass
5187 {
5188 Q_OBJECT
5189
5190 public:
5191 bool Init(chars uuid)
5192 {
5193 if(auto NewService = BluetoothSearchClass::GetClonedSearchedService_BT(uuid, true))
5194 {
5195 mSocket = new QBluetoothSocket(QBluetoothServiceInfo::RfcommProtocol);
5196 connect(mSocket, &QBluetoothSocket::connected, this, &BluetoothClientClass::OnConnected);
5197 connect(mSocket, &QBluetoothSocket::disconnected, this, &BluetoothClientClass::OnDisconnected);
5198 connect(mSocket, &QBluetoothSocket::readyRead, this, &BluetoothClientClass::OnReadyRead);
5199 connect(mSocket, QOverload<QBluetoothSocket::SocketError>::of(&QBluetoothSocket::error),
5200 this, &BluetoothClientClass::OnErrorOccurred);
5201 mSocket->connectToService(*NewService);
5202 delete NewService;
5203 return true;
5204 }
5205 return false;
5206 }
5207
5208 public:
5209 bool Connected() override
5210 {
5211 return mConnected;
5212 }
5213 sint32 ReadAvailable() override
5214 {
5215 return mRecvData.count();
5216 }
5217 sint32 Read(uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
5218 {
5219 if(mSocket)
5220 {
5221 const sint32 MinSize = Math::Min(mRecvData.count(), size);
5222 Memory::Copy(data, mRecvData.constData(), MinSize);
5223 mRecvData.remove(0, MinSize);
5224 return MinSize;
5225 }
5226 return -1;
5227 }
5228 bool Write(const uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
5229 {
5230 if(mSocket)
5231 {
5232 mSocket->write((chars) data, size);
5233 mSocket->waitForBytesWritten(3000);
5234 return (mSocket->state() == QAbstractSocket::ConnectedState);
5235 }
5236 return false;
5237 }
5238
5239 private slots:
5240 void OnConnected()
5241 {
5242 if(mSocket)
5243 {
5244 mConnected = true;
5245 mPeerName = mSocket->peerName();
5246 Platform::BroadcastNotify("connected", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5247 }
5248 }
5249 void OnDisconnected()
5250 {
5251 mConnected = false;
5252 mPeerName.clear();
5253 Platform::BroadcastNotify("disconnected", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5254 }
5255 void OnReadyRead()
5256 {
5257 if(mSocket)
5258 {
5259 auto ReadSize = mSocket->bytesAvailable();
5260 if(0 < ReadSize)
5261 {
5262 mRecvData += mSocket->read(ReadSize);
5263 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5264 }
5265 }
5266 }
5267 void OnErrorOccurred(QBluetoothSocket::SocketError error)
5268 {
5269 mConnected = false;
5270 Platform::BroadcastNotify("error", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5271 }
5272
5273 public:
5274 BluetoothClientClass()
5275 {
5276 mSocket = nullptr;
5277 mConnected = false;
5278 }
5279 ~BluetoothClientClass() override
5280 {
5281 delete mSocket;
5282 }
5283
5284 private:
5285 QBluetoothSocket* mSocket;
5286 bool mConnected;
5287 QString mPeerName;
5288 QByteArray mRecvData;
5289 };
5290
5291 class BluetoothLEClientClass : public BluetoothClass
5292 {
5293 Q_OBJECT
5294
5295 public:
5296 bool Init(chars uuid)
5297 {
5298 mServiceUuid = QBluetoothUuid(QString(uuid));
5299 if(mController = BluetoothSearchClass::CreateController_BLE(this, true))
5300 {
5301 connect(mController, &QLowEnergyController::serviceDiscovered,
5302 this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnServiceDiscovered);
5303 connect(mController, &QLowEnergyController::discoveryFinished,
5304 this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnScanServiceFinished);
5305 connect(mController, QOverload<QLowEnergyController::Error>::of(&QLowEnergyController::error),
5306 this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnScanServiceErrorOccurred);
5307 connect(mController, &QLowEnergyController::connected,
5308 this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnDeviceConnected);
5309 connect(mController, &QLowEnergyController::disconnected,
5310 this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnDeviceDisconnected);
5311 mController->connectToDevice();
5312 return true;
5313 }
5314 return false;
5315 }
5316
5317 public:
5318 bool Connected() override
5319 {
5320 return mConnected;
5321 }
5322 sint32 ReadAvailable() override
5323 {
5324 return mReadCount;
5325 }
5326 sint32 Read(uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
5327 {
5328 if(mService)
5329 {
5330 if(!mReadQueue.isEmpty())
5331 {
5332 QByteArray CurBytes = mReadQueue.dequeue();
5333 const sint32 CopySize = Math::Min(size, CurBytes.length());
5334 Memory::Copy(data, CurBytes.constData(), CopySize);
5335 mReadCount -= CurBytes.length();
5336 return CopySize;
5337 }
5338 return 0;
5339 }
5340 return -1;
5341 }
5342 bool Write(const uint08* data, const sint32 size) override
5343 {
5344 if(mService)
5345 {
5346 mWriteQueue.enqueue(QByteArray((chars) data, size));
5347 if(mConnected)
5348 WriteFlush();
5349 return true;
5350 }
5351 return false;
5352 }
5353
5354 private slots:
5355 void OnServiceDiscovered(const QBluetoothUuid& serviceUuid)
5356 {
5357 }
5358 void OnScanServiceFinished()
5359 {
5360 if(mService = mController->createServiceObject(mServiceUuid, this))
5361 {
5362 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::stateChanged, this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnServiceStateChanged);
5363 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::characteristicChanged, this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnCharacteristicChanged);
5364 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::characteristicRead, this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnCharacteristicRead);
5365 connect(mService, &QLowEnergyService::characteristicWritten, this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnCharacteristicWritten);
