5366 connect(mService, QOverload<QLowEnergyService::ServiceError>::of(&QLowEnergyService::error),
5367 this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnErrorOccurred);
5368 mService->discoverDetails();
5369 }
5370 }
5371 void OnScanServiceErrorOccurred(QLowEnergyController::Error error)
5372 {
5373 }
5374 void OnDeviceConnected()
5375 {
5376 mController->discoverServices();
5377 }
5378 void OnDeviceDisconnected()
5379 {
5380 }
5381
5382 void OnServiceStateChanged(QLowEnergyService::ServiceState state)
5383 {
5384 if(state == QLowEnergyService::ServiceDiscovered)
5385 {
5386 if(InitCharacteristic())
5387 {
5388 mConnected = true;
5389 Platform::BroadcastNotify("connected", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5390 WriteFlush();
5391 }
5392 else
5393 {
5394 mConnected = false;
5395 Platform::BroadcastNotify("error", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5396 }
5397 }
5398 else if(state == QLowEnergyService::InvalidService)
5399 {
5400 mConnected = false;
5401 Platform::BroadcastNotify("error", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5402 }
5403 }
5404 void OnCharacteristicChanged(const QLowEnergyCharacteristic& info, const QByteArray& value)
5405 {
5406 mReadCount += value.length();
5407 mReadQueue.enqueue(value);
5408 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5409 }
5410 void OnCharacteristicRead(const QLowEnergyCharacteristic& info, const QByteArray& value)
5411 {
5412 mReadCount += value.length();
5413 mReadQueue.enqueue(value);
5414 Platform::BroadcastNotify("message", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5415 }
5416 void OnCharacteristicWritten(const QLowEnergyCharacteristic& info, const QByteArray& value)
5417 {
5418 }
5419 void OnErrorOccurred(QLowEnergyService::ServiceError error)
5420 {
5421 mConnected = false;
5422 Platform::BroadcastNotify("error", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5423 }
5424 void OnRead()
5425 {
5426 if(mReadChar.isValid())
5427 mService->readCharacteristic(mReadChar);
5428 }
5429
5430 private:
5431 bool InitCharacteristic()
5432 {
5433 bool Success = false;
5434 if(mService)
5435 foreach(QLowEnergyCharacteristic c, mService->characteristics())
5436 {
5437 if(c.isValid())
5438 {
5439 if((c.properties() & QLowEnergyCharacteristic::WriteNoResponse) ||
5440 (c.properties() & QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Write))
5441 {
5442 Success = true;
5443 mWriteChar = c;
5444 if(c.properties() & QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Write)
5445 mWriteMode = QLowEnergyService::WriteWithResponse;
5446 else mWriteMode = QLowEnergyService::WriteWithoutResponse;
5447 }
5448 if(c.properties() & QLowEnergyCharacteristic::Read)
5449 {
5450 Success = true;
5451 mReadChar = c;
5452 if(!mReadTimer)
5453 {
5454 mReadTimer = new QTimer(this);
5455 connect(mReadTimer, &QTimer::timeout, this, &BluetoothLEClientClass::OnRead);
5456 mReadTimer->start(100);
5457 }
5458 }
5459 mNotiDesc = c.descriptor(QBluetoothUuid::ClientCharacteristicConfiguration);
5460 if(mNotiDesc.isValid())
5461 mService->writeDescriptor(mNotiDesc, QByteArray::fromHex("0100"));
5462 }
5463 }
5464 return Success;
5465 }
5466 void WriteFlush()
5467 {
5468 if(mWriteChar.isValid())
5469 while(!mWriteQueue.isEmpty())
5470 {
5471 QByteArray CurBytes = mWriteQueue.dequeue();
5472 if(20 < CurBytes.length())
5473 {
5474 sint32 SentBytes = 0;
5475 while(SentBytes < CurBytes.length())
5476 {
5477 mService->writeCharacteristic(mWriteChar, CurBytes.mid(SentBytes, 20), mWriteMode);
5478 SentBytes += 20;
5479 if(mWriteMode == QLowEnergyService::WriteWithResponse)
5480 {
5481 WaitForWrite();
5482 if(mService->error() != QLowEnergyService::NoError)
5483 {
5484 mConnected = false;
5485 Platform::BroadcastNotify("error", nullptr, NT_BluetoothReceive);
5486 return;
5487 }
5488 }
5489 }
5490 }
5491 else mService->writeCharacteristic(mWriteChar, CurBytes, mWriteMode);
5492 }
5493 }
5494 void WaitForWrite()
5495 {
5496 QEventLoop Loop;
5497 connect(mService, SIGNAL(characteristicWritten(QLowEnergyCharacteristic, QByteArray)), &Loop, SLOT(quit()));
5498 Loop.exec();
5499 }
5500
5501 public:
5502 BluetoothLEClientClass()
5503 {
5504 mController = nullptr;
5505 mService = nullptr;
5506 mConnected = false;
5507 mReadTimer = nullptr;
5508 mReadCount = 0;
5509 }
5510 ~BluetoothLEClientClass() override
5511 {
5512 if(mReadTimer)
5513 {
5514 mReadTimer->deleteLater();
5515 delete mReadTimer;
5516 }
5517
5518 if(mService && mNotiDesc.isValid())
5519 mService->writeDescriptor(mNotiDesc, QByteArray::fromHex("0000"));
5520
5521 delete mService;
5522 delete mController;
5523 }
5524
5525 private:
5526 QBluetoothUuid mServiceUuid;
5527 QLowEnergyController* mController;
5528 QLowEnergyService* mService;
5529 bool mConnected;
5530 QLowEnergyCharacteristic mWriteChar;
5531 QLowEnergyService::WriteMode mWriteMode;
5532 QLowEnergyCharacteristic mReadChar;
5533 QTimer* mReadTimer;
5534 QLowEnergyDescriptor mNotiDesc;
5535 QQueue<QByteArray> mWriteQueue;
5536 QQueue<QByteArray> mReadQueue;
5537 sint32 mReadCount;
5538 };
5539
5540 #if BOSS_ANDROID
5541 class BluetoothContentForAndroid
5542 {
5543 public:
5544 static void MusicPlayWithSelector()
5545 {
5546 QAndroidJniObject Activity = QtAndroid::androidActivity();
5547 QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossBluetoothSco", "init",
5548 "(Landroid/app/Activity;)V", Activity.object<jobject>());
5549 QAndroidJniObject NewIntent = QAndroidJniObject::callStaticObjectMethod("com/boss2d/BossBluetoothSco", "open",
5550 "(Landroid/app/Activity;)Landroid/content/Intent;", Activity.object<jobject>());
5551
5552 QtAndroid::startActivity(NewIntent, 2345, [](int requestCode, int resultCode, const QAndroidJniObject& data)->void
5553 {
5554 const QAndroidJniObject Context = QtAndroid::androidContext();
5555 QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossBluetoothSco", "play",
5556 "(Landroid/content/Context;Landroid/content/Intent;)V", Context.object<jobject>(), data.object<jobject>());
5557 });
5558 }
5559 static void MusicStop()
5560 {
5561 QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossBluetoothSco", "stop", "()V");
5562 }
5563 static void SetVolume(float value)
5564 {
5565 const QAndroidJniObject Context = QtAndroid::androidContext();
5566 QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossBluetoothSco", "setVolume",
5567 "(Landroid/content/Context;F)V", Context.object<jobject>(), (jfloat) value);
5568 }
5569 };
5570 typedef BluetoothContentForAndroid BluetoothContentClass;
5571 #else
5572 class BluetoothContentForBlank
5573 {
5574 public:
5575 static void MusicPlayWithSelector()
5576 {
5577 }
5578 static void MusicStop()
5579 {
5580 }
5581 static void SetVolume(float value)
5582 {
5583 }
5584 };
5585 typedef BluetoothContentForBlank BluetoothContentClass;
5586 #endif
5587
5588 #if BOSS_ANDROID & defined(QT_HAVE_SERIALPORT)
5589 typedef QSerialPortInfo SerialPortInfoClass;
5590 class SerialPortForAndroid
5591 {
5592 public:
5593 enum BaudRate {
5594 Baud1200 = QSerialPort::Baud1200,
5595 Baud2400 = QSerialPort::Baud2400,
5596 Baud4800 = QSerialPort::Baud4800,
5597 Baud9600 = QSerialPort::Baud9600,
5598 Baud19200 = QSerialPort::Baud19200,
5599 Baud38400 = QSerialPort::Baud38400,
5600 Baud57600 = QSerialPort::Baud57600,
5601 Baud115200 = QSerialPort::Baud115200,
5602 UnknownBaud = QSerialPort::UnknownBaud};
5603 enum DataBits {
5604 Data5 = QSerialPort::Data5,
5605 Data6 = QSerialPort::Data6,
5606 Data7 = QSerialPort::Data7,
5607 Data8 = QSerialPort::Data8,
5608 UnknownDataBits = QSerialPort::UnknownDataBits};
5609 enum Parity {
5610 NoParity = QSerialPort::NoParity,
5611 EvenParity = QSerialPort::EvenParity,
5612 OddParity = QSerialPort::OddParity,
5613 SpaceParity = QSerialPort::SpaceParity,
5614 MarkParity = QSerialPort::MarkParity,
5615 UnknownParity = QSerialPort::UnknownParity};
5616 enum StopBits {
5617 OneStop = QSerialPort::OneStop,
5618 OneAndHalfStop = QSerialPort::OneAndHalfStop,
5619 TwoStop = QSerialPort::TwoStop,
5620 UnknownStopBits = QSerialPort::UnknownStopBits};
5621 enum FlowControl {
5622 NoFlowControl = QSerialPort::NoFlowControl,
5623 HardwareControl = QSerialPort::HardwareControl,
5624 SoftwareControl = QSerialPort::SoftwareControl,
5625 UnknownFlowControl = QSerialPort::UnknownFlowControl};
5626 enum SerialPortError {
5627 NoError = QSerialPort::NoError,
5628 DeviceNotFoundError = QSerialPort::DeviceNotFoundError,
5629 PermissionError = QSerialPort::PermissionError,
5630 OpenError = QSerialPort::OpenError,
5631 ParityError = QSerialPort::ParityError,
5632 FramingError = QSerialPort::FramingError,
5633 BreakConditionError = QSerialPort::BreakConditionError,
5634 WriteError = QSerialPort::WriteError,
5635 ReadError = QSerialPort::ReadError,
5636 ResourceError = QSerialPort::ResourceError,
5637 UnsupportedOperationError = QSerialPort::UnsupportedOperationError,
5638 UnknownError = QSerialPort::UnknownError,
5639 TimeoutError = QSerialPort::TimeoutError,
5640 NotOpenError = QSerialPort::NotOpenError};
5641 public:
5642 SerialPortForAndroid(const SerialPortInfoClass& info)
5643 {
5644 mPortName = info.portName().toUtf8().constData();
5645 mLocation = info.systemLocation().toUtf8().constData();
5646 mBaudRate = UnknownBaud;
5647 mDataBits = UnknownDataBits;
5648 mParity = UnknownParity;
5649 mStopBits = UnknownStopBits;
5650 mFlowControl = UnknownFlowControl;
5651 mFd = -1;
5652 }
5653 ~SerialPortForAndroid()
5654 {
5655 close();
5656 }
5657
5658 public:
5659 bool open(QIODevice::OpenModeFlag flag)
5660 {
5661 close();
5662 int mode = 0;
5663 switch(flag)
5664 {
5665 case QIODevice::ReadOnly: mode = O_RDONLY | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK; break;
5666 case QIODevice::WriteOnly: mode = O_WRONLY | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK; break;
5667 case QIODevice::ReadWrite: mode = O_RDWR | O_NOCTTY | O_NONBLOCK; break;
5668 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 flag값입니다", false); return false;
5669 }
5670 const int fd = ::open(mLocation, mode);
5671 BOSS_TRACE("SerialPortForAndroid::open(%s, %d) fd = %d", (chars) mLocation, mode, fd);
5672 if(fd == -1)
5673 {
5674 if(errno == EINTR) // Recurse because this is a recoverable error
5675 return open(flag);
5676 return false;
5677 }
5678 mFd = reconfigurePort(fd);
5679 return true;
5680 }
5681 void close()
5682 {
5683 if(mFd != -1)
5684 {
5685 ::close(mFd);
5686 mFd = -1;
5687 }
5688 }
5689 QByteArray readAll()
5690 {
5691 QByteArray Result;
5692 if(mFd != -1)
5693 {
5694 char buf[1024];
5695 ssize_t bytes_read = ::read(mFd, buf, sizeof(buf));
5696 if(0 < bytes_read)
5697 Result.append(buf, bytes_read);
5698 }
5699 return Result;
5700 }
5701 qint64 write(const char* data, qint64 len)
5702 {
5703 if(mFd == -1) return 0;
5704 size_t data_focus = 0;
5705 while(data_focus < len)
5706 {
5707 fd_set writefds;
5708 FD_ZERO(&writefds);
5709 FD_SET(mFd, &writefds);
5710 timespec timeout_ts(timespec_from_ms(10));
5711 int ret = pselect(mFd + 1, nullptr, &writefds, nullptr, &timeout_ts, nullptr);
5712 if(ret < 0)
5713 {
5714 if(errno == EINTR) continue;
5715 return false;
5716 }
5717 else if(0 < ret)
5718 {
5719 if(FD_ISSET(mFd, &writefds) != 0)
5720 {
5721 const ssize_t bytes_written_now = ::write(mFd, data + data_focus, len - data_focus);
5722 if(bytes_written_now < 1) break;
5723 data_focus += bytes_written_now;
5724 }
5725 }
5726 }
5727 return data_focus;
5728 }
5729 bool flush()
5730 {
5731 return (mFd != -1);
5732 }
5733
5734 public: // setter
5735 void setBaudRate(BaudRate baudrate) {mBaudRate = baudrate;}
5736 void setDataBits(DataBits databits) {mDataBits = databits;}
5737 void setParity(Parity parity) {mParity = parity;}
5738 void setStopBits(StopBits stopbits) {mStopBits = stopbits;}
5739 void setFlowControl(FlowControl flowcontrol) {mFlowControl = flowcontrol;}
5740
5741 public: // getter
5742 QString portName() {return (chars) mPortName;}
5743 QString errorString() {return "NoError";}
5744 SerialPortError error() {return NoError;}
5745
5746 private:
5747 String mPortName;
5748 String mLocation;
5749 BaudRate mBaudRate;
5750 DataBits mDataBits;
5751 Parity mParity;
5752 StopBits mStopBits;
5753 FlowControl mFlowControl;
5754 int mFd;
5755
5756 private:
5757 int reconfigurePort(const int fd)
5758 {
5759 struct termios options;
5760 if(tcgetattr(fd, &options) == -1)
5761 {
5762 ::close(fd);
5763 return -1;
5764 }
5765
5766 // set up raw mode / no echo / binary
5767 options.c_cflag |= (tcflag_t) (CLOCAL | CREAD);
5768 options.c_lflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(ICANON | ECHO | ECHOE | ECHOK | ECHONL | ISIG | IEXTEN);
5769 options.c_oflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(OPOST);
5770 options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(INLCR | IGNCR | ICRNL | IGNBRK);
5771 #ifdef IUCLC
5772 options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~IUCLC;
5773 #endif
5774 #ifdef PARMRK
5775 options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~PARMRK;
5776 #endif
5777
5778 // setup baud rate
5779 speed_t baud;
5780 switch(mBaudRate)
5781 {
5782 case Baud1200: baud = B1200; break;
5783 case Baud2400: baud = B2400; break;
5784 case Baud4800: baud = B4800; break;
5785 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mBaudRate값입니다", false);
5786 case Baud9600: baud = B9600; break;
5787 case Baud19200: baud = B19200; break;
5788 case Baud38400: baud = B38400; break;
5789 case Baud57600: baud = B57600; break;
5790 case Baud115200: baud = B115200; break;
5791 }
5792 #ifdef _BSD_SOURCE
5793 ::cfsetspeed(&options, baud);
5794 #else
5795 ::cfsetispeed(&options, baud);
5796 ::cfsetospeed(&options, baud);
5797 #endif
5798
5799 // setup char len
5800 options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~CSIZE;
5801 switch(mDataBits)
5802 {
5803 case Data5: options.c_cflag |= CS5; break;
5804 case Data6: options.c_cflag |= CS6; break;
5805 case Data7: options.c_cflag |= CS7; break;
5806 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mDataBits값입니다", false);
5807 case Data8: options.c_cflag |= CS8; break;
5808 }
5809
5810 // setup stopbits
5811 switch(mStopBits)
5812 {
5813 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mStopBits값입니다", false);
5814 case OneStop: options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(CSTOPB); break;
5815 case OneAndHalfStop: options.c_cflag |= (CSTOPB); break;
5816 case TwoStop: options.c_cflag |= (CSTOPB); break;
5817 }
5818
5819 // setup parity
5820 options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(INPCK | ISTRIP);
5821 switch(mParity)
5822 {
5823 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mParity값입니다", false);
5824 case NoParity: options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(PARENB | PARODD); break;
5825 case EvenParity: options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(PARODD); options.c_cflag |= (PARENB); break;
5826 case OddParity: options.c_cflag |= (PARENB | PARODD); break;
5827 case SpaceParity: options.c_cflag |= (PARENB | CMSPAR); options.c_cflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(PARODD); break;
5828 case MarkParity: options.c_cflag |= (PARENB | CMSPAR | PARODD); break;
5829 }
5830 #ifndef CMSPAR
5831 if(mParity == SpaceParity || mParity == MarkParity)
5832 BOSS_ASSERT("OS에서 지원하지 않는 mParity값입니다", false);
5833 #endif
5834
5835 // setup flow control
5836 bool xonxoff, rtscts;
5837 switch(mFlowControl)
5838 {
5839 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 mFlowControl값입니다", false);
5840 case NoFlowControl: xonxoff = false; rtscts = false; break;
5841 case HardwareControl: xonxoff = false; rtscts = true; break;
5842 case SoftwareControl: xonxoff = true; rtscts = false; break;
5843 }
5844 // xonxoff
5845 #ifdef IXANY
5846 if(xonxoff) options.c_iflag |= (IXON | IXOFF);
5847 else options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(IXON | IXOFF | IXANY);
5848 #else
5849 if(xonxoff) options.c_iflag |= (IXON | IXOFF);
5850 else options.c_iflag &= (tcflag_t) ~(IXON | IXOFF);
5851 #endif
5852 // rtscts
5853 #ifdef CRTSCTS
5854 if(rtscts) options.c_cflag |= (CRTSCTS);
5855 else options.c_cflag &= (unsigned long) ~(CRTSCTS);
5856 #elif defined CNEW_RTSCTS
5857 if(rtscts) options.c_cflag |= (CNEW_RTSCTS);
5858 else options.c_cflag &= (unsigned long) ~(CNEW_RTSCTS);
5859 #else
5860 BOSS_ASSERT("OS에서 지원하지 않는 rtscts값입니다", false);
5861 #endif
5862
5863 options.c_cc[VMIN] = 0;
5864 options.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
5865 if(tcsetattr(fd, TCSANOW, &options) == -1)
5866 {
5867 ::close(fd);
5868 return -1;
5869 }
5870 return fd;
5871 }
5872 timespec timespec_from_ms(const uint32_t millis)
5873 {
5874 timespec time;
5875 time.tv_sec = millis / 1e3;
5876 time.tv_nsec = (millis - (time.tv_sec * 1e3)) * 1e6;
5877 return time;
5878 }
5879 };
5880 typedef SerialPortForAndroid SerialPortClass;
5881 #elif BOSS_WINDOWS & defined(QT_HAVE_SERIALPORT)
5882 typedef QSerialPortInfo SerialPortInfoClass;
5883 class SerialPortForWindows
5884 {
5885 public:
5886 enum BaudRate {
5887 Baud1200 = QSerialPort::Baud1200,
5888 Baud2400 = QSerialPort::Baud2400,
5889 Baud4800 = QSerialPort::Baud4800,
5890 Baud9600 = QSerialPort::Baud9600,
5891 Baud19200 = QSerialPort::Baud19200,
5892 Baud38400 = QSerialPort::Baud38400,
5893 Baud57600 = QSerialPort::Baud57600,
5894 Baud115200 = QSerialPort::Baud115200,
5895 UnknownBaud = QSerialPort::UnknownBaud};
5896 enum DataBits {
5897 Data5 = QSerialPort::Data5,
5898 Data6 = QSerialPort::Data6,
5899 Data7 = QSerialPort::Data7,
5900 Data8 = QSerialPort::Data8,
5901 UnknownDataBits = QSerialPort::UnknownDataBits};
5902 enum Parity {
5903 NoParity = QSerialPort::NoParity,
5904 EvenParity = QSerialPort::EvenParity,
5905 OddParity = QSerialPort::OddParity,
5906 SpaceParity = QSerialPort::SpaceParity,
5907 MarkParity = QSerialPort::MarkParity,
5908 UnknownParity = QSerialPort::UnknownParity};
5909 enum StopBits {
5910 OneStop = QSerialPort::OneStop,
5911 OneAndHalfStop = QSerialPort::OneAndHalfStop,
5912 TwoStop = QSerialPort::TwoStop,
5913 UnknownStopBits = QSerialPort::UnknownStopBits};
5914 enum FlowControl {
5915 NoFlowControl = QSerialPort::NoFlowControl,
5916 HardwareControl = QSerialPort::HardwareControl,
5917 SoftwareControl = QSerialPort::SoftwareControl,
5918 UnknownFlowControl = QSerialPort::UnknownFlowControl};
5919 enum SerialPortError {
5920 NoError = QSerialPort::NoError,
5921 DeviceNotFoundError = QSerialPort::DeviceNotFoundError,
5922 PermissionError = QSerialPort::PermissionError,
5923 OpenError = QSerialPort::OpenError,
5924 ParityError = QSerialPort::ParityError,
5925 FramingError = QSerialPort::FramingError,
5926 BreakConditionError = QSerialPort::BreakConditionError,
5927 WriteError = QSerialPort::WriteError,
5928 ReadError = QSerialPort::ReadError,
5929 ResourceError = QSerialPort::ResourceError,
5930 UnsupportedOperationError = QSerialPort::UnsupportedOperationError,
5931 UnknownError = QSerialPort::UnknownError,
5932 TimeoutError = QSerialPort::TimeoutError,
5933 NotOpenError = QSerialPort::NotOpenError};
5934 public:
5935 SerialPortForWindows(const SerialPortInfoClass& info)
5936 {
5937 mPortName = info.portName().toUtf8().constData();
5938 mLocation = info.systemLocation().toUtf8().constData();
5939 mBaudRate = UnknownBaud;
5940 mDataBits = UnknownDataBits;
5941 mParity = UnknownParity;
5942 mStopBits = UnknownStopBits;
5943 mFlowControl = UnknownFlowControl;
5944 mFd = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
5945 }
5946 ~SerialPortForWindows()
5947 {
5948 close();
5949 }
5950
5951 public:
5952 bool open(QIODevice::OpenModeFlag flag)
5953 {
5954 close();
5955 DWORD mode = 0;
5956 switch(flag)
5957 {
5958 case QIODevice::ReadOnly: mode = GENERIC_READ; break;
5959 case QIODevice::WriteOnly: mode = GENERIC_WRITE; break;
5960 case QIODevice::ReadWrite: mode = GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE; break;
5961 default: BOSS_ASSERT("알 수 없는 flag값입니다", false); return false;
5962 }
5963 HANDLE NewFd = CreateFileA(mLocation, mode, 0, 0, OPEN_EXISTING, 0, 0);
5964 if(NewFd == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
5965 {
5966 BOSS_ASSERT(String::Format("SerialPortForWindows::open::CreateFileA(%s, %08X) error",
5967 (chars) mPortName, mode), false);
5968 return false;
5969 }
5970 mFd = reconfigurePort(NewFd);
5971 return (mFd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
5972 }
5973 void close()
5974 {
5975 if(mFd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
5976 {
5977 CloseHandle(mFd);
5978 mFd = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
5979 }
5980 }
5981 QByteArray readAll()
5982 {
5983 QByteArray Result;
5984 if(mFd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
5985 {
5986 DWORD ReadBytes = 1024;
5987 while(ReadBytes == 1024)
5988 {
5989 char TempBuf[1024];
5990 if(ReadFile(mFd, TempBuf, 1024, &ReadBytes, NULL))
5991 Result.append(TempBuf, ReadBytes);
5992 else
5993 {
5994 BOSS_TRACE("SerialPortForWindows::readAll() error");
5995 close();
5996 break;
5997 }
5998 }
5999 }
6000 return Result;
6001 }
6002 qint64 write(const char* data, qint64 len)
6003 {
6004 if(mFd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
6005 {
6006 DWORD RemainingBytes = len;
6007 while(0 < RemainingBytes)
6008 {
6009 DWORD WrittenBytes = 0;
6010 if(WriteFile(mFd, data, RemainingBytes, &WrittenBytes, NULL))
6011 {
6012 data += WrittenBytes;
6013 RemainingBytes -= WrittenBytes;
6014 }
6015 else
6016 {
6017 BOSS_TRACE("SerialPortForWindows::write() error");
6018 close();
6019 break;
6020 }
6021 }
6022 return len - RemainingBytes;
6023 }
6024 return 0;
6025 }
6026 bool flush()
6027 {
6028 return (mFd != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE);
6029 }
6030
6031 public: // setter
6032 void setBaudRate(BaudRate baudrate) {mBaudRate = baudrate;}
6033 void setDataBits(DataBits databits) {mDataBits = databits;}
6034 void setParity(Parity parity) {mParity = parity;}
6035 void setStopBits(StopBits stopbits) {mStopBits = stopbits;}
6036 void setFlowControl(FlowControl flowcontrol) {mFlowControl = flowcontrol;}
6037
6038 public: // getter
6039 QString portName() {return (chars) mPortName;}
6040 QString errorString() {return "NoError";}
6041 SerialPortError error() {return NoError;}
6042
6043 private:
6044 String mPortName;
6045 String mLocation;
6046 BaudRate mBaudRate;
6047 DataBits mDataBits;
6048 Parity mParity;
6049 StopBits mStopBits;
6050 FlowControl mFlowControl;
6051 HANDLE mFd;
6052
6053 private:
6054 HANDLE reconfigurePort(const HANDLE fd)
6055 {
6056 SetupComm(fd, 8192, 8192);
6057 PurgeComm(fd, PURGE_TXABORT | PURGE_RXABORT | PURGE_TXCLEAR | PURGE_RXCLEAR);
6058
6059 DCB Dcb;
6060 if(!GetCommState(fd, &Dcb))
6061 {
6062 BOSS_ASSERT("SerialPortForWindows::reconfigurePort::GetCommState() error", false);
6063 close();
6064 return INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
6065 }
6066
6067 Dcb.BaudRate = (DWORD) mBaudRate;
6068 Dcb.ByteSize = (BYTE) mDataBits;
6069 Dcb.Parity = (BYTE) mParity;
6070 Dcb.StopBits = mStopBits;
6071 Dcb.fParity = (mParity != NoParity);
6072
6073 Dcb.fOutxCtsFlow = false;
6074 Dcb.fOutxDsrFlow = false;
6075 Dcb.fDtrControl = DTR_CONTROL_ENABLE;
6076 Dcb.fRtsControl = RTS_CONTROL_ENABLE;
6077 Dcb.fOutX = false;
6078 Dcb.fInX = false;
6079
6080 Dcb.fDsrSensitivity = false;
6081 switch(mFlowControl)
6082 {
6083 case SoftwareControl:
6084 Dcb.fOutX = true;
6085 Dcb.fInX = true;
6086 Dcb.XonChar = 0x11;
6087 Dcb.XoffChar = 0x13;
6088 Dcb.XoffLim = 100;
6089 Dcb.XonLim = 100;
6090 break;
6091 case HardwareControl:
6092 Dcb.fOutxCtsFlow = true;
6093 Dcb.fOutxDsrFlow = true;
6094 Dcb.fDtrControl = DTR_CONTROL_HANDSHAKE;
6095 Dcb.fRtsControl = RTS_CONTROL_HANDSHAKE;
6096 break;
6097 }
6098
6099 Dcb.fBinary = true;
6100 Dcb.fNull = false;
6101 Dcb.fAbortOnError = false;
6102 Dcb.fDsrSensitivity = false;
6103 Dcb.fTXContinueOnXoff = true;
6104 Dcb.fErrorChar = false;
6105 Dcb.ErrorChar = 0;
6106 Dcb.EofChar = 0;
6107 Dcb.EvtChar = 0;
6108
6109 if(!SetCommState(fd, &Dcb))
6110 {
6111 BOSS_ASSERT("SerialPortForWindows::reconfigurePort::SetCommState() error", false);
6112 close();
6113 return INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;
6114 }
6115
6116 COMMTIMEOUTS commTimeout;
6117 GetCommTimeouts(fd, &commTimeout);
6118 commTimeout.ReadIntervalTimeout = 1;
6119 commTimeout.ReadTotalTimeoutMultiplier = 0;
6120 commTimeout.ReadTotalTimeoutConstant = 25;
6121 commTimeout.WriteTotalTimeoutMultiplier = 0;
6122 commTimeout.WriteTotalTimeoutConstant = 25;
6123 SetCommTimeouts(fd, &commTimeout);
6124 return fd;
6125 }
6126 };
6127 typedef SerialPortForWindows SerialPortClass;
6128 #elif defined(QT_HAVE_SERIALPORT)
6129 typedef QSerialPortInfo SerialPortInfoClass;
6130 typedef QSerialPort SerialPortClass;
6131 #else
6132 class SerialPortInfoForBlank
6133 {
6134 public:
6135 SerialPortInfoForBlank()
6136 {
6137 }
6138 ~SerialPortInfoForBlank()
6139 {
6140 }
6141 public:
6142 static const QList<SerialPortInfoForBlank>& availablePorts()
6143 {
6144 static QList<SerialPortInfoForBlank> Result;
6145 return Result;
6146 }
6147 public:
6148 QString portName() const {return QString();}
6149 QString description() const {return QString();}
6150 QString systemLocation() const {return QString();}
6151 QString manufacturer() const {return QString();}
6152 QString serialNumber() const {return QString();}
6153 };
6154 typedef SerialPortInfoForBlank SerialPortInfoClass;
6155 class SerialPortForBlank
6156 {
6157 public:
6158 enum BaudRate {Baud115200};
6159 enum DataBits {Data8};
6160 enum Parity {NoParity};
6161 enum StopBits {OneStop};
6162 enum FlowControl {NoFlowControl};
6163 enum SerialPortError {NoError};
6164 public:
6165 SerialPortForBlank(const SerialPortInfoClass& info)
6166 {
6167 }
6168 ~SerialPortForBlank()
6169 {
6170 }
6171 public:
6172 bool open(QIODevice::OpenModeFlag flag) {return false;}
6173 void close() {}
6174 QByteArray readAll() {return QByteArray();}
6175 qint64 write(const char* data, qint64 len) {return 0;}
6176 bool flush() {return false;}
6177 public: // setter
6178 void setBaudRate(BaudRate baudrate) {}
6179 void setDataBits(DataBits databits) {}
6180 void setParity(Parity parity) {}
6181 void setStopBits(StopBits stopbits) {}
6182 void setFlowControl(FlowControl flowcontrol) {}
6183 public: // getter
6184 QString portName() {return QString();}
6185 QString errorString() {return "NoError";}
6186 SerialPortError error() {return NoError;}
6187 };
6188 typedef SerialPortForBlank SerialPortClass;
6189 #endif
6190
6191 class SerialClass
6192 {
6193 private:
6194 SerialPortClass* mSerial;
6195 SerialDecodeCB mDec;
6196 SerialEncodeCB mEnc;
6197 uint08s mReadStream;
6198 uint08s mWriteStream;
6199 uint08s mLastDecodedData;
6200 sint32 mLastDecodedDataFocus;
6201
6202 private:
6203 class Chunk
6204 {
6205 public:
6206 uint08* mPtr;
6207 bytes mPtrConst;
6208 sint32 mLength;
6209 bool mBigEndian;
6210 public:
6211 Chunk() {mPtr = nullptr; mPtrConst = nullptr; mLength = 0; mBigEndian = false;}
6212 Chunk(uint08* ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian) {Init(ptr, length, bigendian);}
6213 Chunk(bytes ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian) {InitConst(ptr, length, bigendian);}
6214 ~Chunk() {}
6215 void Init(uint08* ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian)
6216 {
6217 mPtr = ptr;
6218 mPtrConst = nullptr;
6219 mLength = length;
6220 mBigEndian = bigendian;
6221 }
6222 void InitConst(bytes ptr, sint32 length, bool bigendian)
6223 {
6224 mPtr = nullptr;
6225 mPtrConst = ptr;
6226 mLength = length;
6227 mBigEndian = bigendian;
6228 }
6229 sint64 GetLength() const
6230 {
6231 sint64 Result;
6232 Load(&Result, sizeof(sint64));
6233 return Result;
6234 }
6235 void Load(void* outptr, sint32 length) const
6236 {
6237 Memory::Set(outptr, 0, length);
6238 const sint32 CopyLength = Math::Min(mLength, length);
6239 if(!mBigEndian) Memory::Copy(outptr, mPtrConst, CopyLength);
6240 else
6241 {
6242 uint08* Dest = ((uint08*) outptr) + CopyLength - 1;
6243 for(sint32 i = 0; i < CopyLength; ++i)
6244 Dest[-i] = mPtrConst[i];
6245 }
6246 }
6247 void Save(bytes ptr, sint32 length)
6248 {
6249 Memory::Set(mPtr, 0, mLength);
6250 const sint32 CopyLength = Math::Min(mLength, length);
6251 if(!mBigEndian) Memory::Copy(mPtr, ptr, CopyLength);
6252 else
6253 {
6254 uint08* Dest = ((uint08*) mPtr) + CopyLength - 1;
6255 for(sint32 i = 0; i < CopyLength; ++i)
6256 Dest[-i] = ptr[i];
6257 }
6258 }
6259 };
6260
6261 public:
6262 static Strings GetList(String* spec)
6263 {
6264 Strings Result;
6265 Context SpecCollector;
6266 const QList<SerialPortInfoClass>& AllPorts = SerialPortInfoClass::availablePorts();
6267 foreach(const auto& CurPort, AllPorts)
6268 {
6269 String CurName = CurPort.portName().toUtf8().constData();
6270 if(CurName.Length() == 0)
6271 CurName = CurPort.description().toUtf8().constData();
6272 Result.AtAdding() = CurName;
6273 if(spec)
6274 {
6275 Context& NewChild = SpecCollector.At(SpecCollector.LengthOfIndexable());
6276 NewChild.At("portname").Set(CurPort.portName().toUtf8().constData());
6277 NewChild.At("description").Set(CurPort.description().toUtf8().constData());
6278 NewChild.At("systemlocation").Set(CurPort.systemLocation().toUtf8().constData());
6279 NewChild.At("manufacturer").Set(CurPort.manufacturer().toUtf8().constData());
6280 NewChild.At("serialnumber").Set(CurPort.serialNumber().toUtf8().constData());
6281 }
6282 }
6283 if(spec)
6284 *spec = SpecCollector.SaveJson(*spec);
6285 return Result;
6286 }
6287
6288 public:
6289 SerialClass(chars name, sint32 baudrate, SerialDecodeCB dec, SerialEncodeCB enc)
6290 {
6291 mSerial = nullptr;
6292 mDec = (dec)? dec : DefaultSerialDecode;
6293 mEnc = (enc)? enc : DefaultSerialEncode;
6294 mLastDecodedDataFocus = 0;
6295 const QList<SerialPortInfoClass>& AllPorts = SerialPortInfoClass::availablePorts();
6296 foreach(const auto& CurPort, AllPorts)
6297 {
6298 if(*name == '\0' || CurPort.portName() == name || CurPort.description() == name)
6299 {
6300 mSerial = new SerialPortClass(CurPort);
6301 mSerial->setBaudRate((SerialPortClass::BaudRate) baudrate);
6302 mSerial->setDataBits(SerialPortClass::Data8);
6303 mSerial->setParity(SerialPortClass::NoParity);
6304 mSerial->setStopBits(SerialPortClass::OneStop);
6305 mSerial->setFlowControl(SerialPortClass::NoFlowControl);
6306 if(!mSerial->open(QIODevice::ReadWrite))
6307 {
6308 BOSS_ASSERT(String::Format("QSerialPort error: port=%s, error=%s(%d)",
6309 mSerial->portName().toUtf8().constData(),
6310 mSerial->errorString().toUtf8().constData(),
6311 (sint32) mSerial->error()), false);
6312 delete mSerial;
6313 mSerial = nullptr;
6314 if(*name == '\0')
6315 continue;
6316 }
6317 break;
6318 }
6319 }
6320 }
6321
6322 ~SerialClass()
6323 {
6324 delete mSerial;
6325 }
6326
6327 public:
6328 bool IsValid()
6329 {
6330 return (mSerial != nullptr);
6331 }
6332
6333 bool Connected()
6334 {
6335 auto ErrorCode = mSerial->error();
6336 return (ErrorCode == SerialPortClass::NoError);
6337 }
6338
6339 bool ReadReady(sint32* gettype)
6340 {
6341 // 데이터수신시 읽기스트림에 추가연결
6342 QByteArray NewArray = mSerial->readAll();
6343 if(0 < NewArray.length())
6344 Memory::Copy(mReadStream.AtDumpingAdded(NewArray.length()), NewArray.constData(), NewArray.length());
6345
6346 // 읽기스트림의 처리
6347 if(0 < mReadStream.Count())
6348 {
6349 // 디코딩과정
6350 const sint32 UsedLength = mDec(&mReadStream[0], mReadStream.Count(), mLastDecodedData, gettype);
6351 if(0 < UsedLength)
6352 {
6353 BOSS_ASSERT("SerialDecodeCB의 리턴값이 허용범위를 초과합니다", UsedLength <= mReadStream.Count());
6354 const sint32 CopyLength = mReadStream.Count() - UsedLength;
6355 if(0 < CopyLength)
6356 {
6357 uint08s NewReadStream;
6358 Memory::Copy(NewReadStream.AtDumpingAdded(CopyLength), &mReadStream[UsedLength], CopyLength);
6359 mReadStream = NewReadStream;
6360 }
6361 else mReadStream.SubtractionAll();
6362 return (0 < mLastDecodedData.Count());
6363 }
6364 }
6365 return false;
6366 }
6367
6368 sint32 ReadAvailable()
6369 {
6370 return mLastDecodedData.Count() - mLastDecodedDataFocus;
6371 }
6372
6373 sint32 Read(chars format, va_list args)
6374 {
6375 Map<Chunk> Cache;
6376 chars Pos = format;
6377 bool CurEndian = false;
6378 sint32 CurIndex = -1;
6379 while(*Pos)
6380 {
6381 if(*Pos == '#')
6382 {
6383 CurIndex++;
6384 // 인용길이
6385 sint64 LastLength = 0;
6386 if('1' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= '8') LastLength = Pos[1] - '0';
6387 else if('a' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'z') LastLength = Cache[Pos[1] - 'a'].GetLength();
6388 else if('A' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'Z') LastLength = Cache[Pos[1] - 'A'].GetLength();
6389 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6390 if(ReadAvailable() < LastLength) return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_SHORT_STREAM - CurIndex;
6391 Pos += 2;
6392
6393 bytes LastPtr = &mLastDecodedData[mLastDecodedDataFocus];
6394 // 캐시로 읽기
6395 if(*Pos == '=')
6396 {
6397 if('a' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'z') Cache[Pos[1] - 'a'].InitConst(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
6398 else if('A' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= 'Z') Cache[Pos[1] - 'A'].InitConst(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
6399 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6400 Pos += 2;
6401 }
6402 // 타입힌트식 읽기
6403 else if(*Pos == ':')
6404 {
6405 if(Pos[1] == 's' && Pos[2] == 'k' && Pos[3] == 'i' && Pos[4] == 'p') Pos += 5;
6406 else
6407 {
6408 const Chunk NewChunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
6409 if(Pos[1] == 's')
6410 {
6411 if(Pos[2] == '1') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint08*), sizeof(sint08));
6412 else if(Pos[2] == '2') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint16*), sizeof(sint16));
6413 else if(Pos[2] == '4') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint32*), sizeof(sint32));
6414 else if(Pos[2] == '8') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, sint64*), sizeof(sint64));
6415 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6416 }
6417 else if(Pos[1] == 'u')
6418 {
6419 if(Pos[2] == '1') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint08*), sizeof(uint08));
6420 else if(Pos[2] == '2') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint16*), sizeof(uint16));
6421 else if(Pos[2] == '4') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint32*), sizeof(uint32));
6422 else if(Pos[2] == '8') NewChunk.Load(va_arg(args, uint64*), sizeof(uint64));
6423 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6424 }
6425 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6426 Pos += 3;
6427 }
6428 }
6429 // 일반적인 읽기
6430 else Chunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian).Load(va_arg(args, void*), LastLength);
6431
6432 // 데이터처리
6433 mLastDecodedDataFocus += LastLength;
6434 if(mLastDecodedData.Count() == mLastDecodedDataFocus)
6435 {
6436 mLastDecodedData.SubtractionAll();
6437 mLastDecodedDataFocus = 0;
6438 }
6439 }
6440 else if(*Pos == '[')
6441 {
6442 if(Pos[1] == 'b' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = true;
6443 else if(Pos[1] == 'l' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = false;
6444 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6445 Pos += 4;
6446 }
6447 else Pos++;
6448 }
6449 return ReadAvailable();
6450 }
6451
6452 sint32 Write(chars format, va_list args)
6453 {
6454 #if BOSS_ANDROID
6455 #define va_sint08 sint32
6456 #define va_sint16 sint32
6457 #define va_sint32 sint32
6458 #define va_sint64 sint64
6459 #define va_uint08 uint32
6460 #define va_uint16 uint32
6461 #define va_uint32 uint32
6462 #define va_uint64 uint64
6463 #else
6464 #define va_sint08 sint08
6465 #define va_sint16 sint16
6466 #define va_sint32 sint32
6467 #define va_sint64 sint64
6468 #define va_uint08 uint08
6469 #define va_uint16 uint16
6470 #define va_uint32 uint32
6471 #define va_uint64 uint64
6472 #endif
6473
6474 chars Pos = format;
6475 bool CurEndian = false;
6476 while(*Pos)
6477 {
6478 if(*Pos == '#')
6479 {
6480 // 인용길이
6481 sint64 LastLength = 0;
6482 if('1' <= Pos[1] && Pos[1] <= '8') LastLength = Pos[1] - '0';
6483 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6484 Pos += 2;
6485
6486 uint08* LastPtr = mWriteStream.AtDumpingAdded(LastLength);
6487 // 상수로 쓰기
6488 if(*Pos == '=')
6489 {
6490 const sint32 SavedPos = &Pos[-1] - format;
6491 uint08s Value;
6492 if(Pos[1] == '0' && (Pos[2] == 'x' || Pos[2] == 'X'))
6493 {
6494 Pos += 2;
6495 bool AddingTurn = false;
6496 while(*(++Pos))
6497 {
6498 if(AddingTurn = !AddingTurn)
6499 {
6500 if('0' <= *Pos && *Pos <= '9') Value.AtAdding() = ((*Pos - '0') & 0xF) << 4;
6501 else if('a' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'f') Value.AtAdding() = ((*Pos - 'a' + 10) & 0xF) << 4;
6502 else if('A' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'F') Value.AtAdding() = ((*Pos - 'A' + 10) & 0xF) << 4;
6503 else break;
6504 }
6505 else
6506 {
6507 if('0' <= *Pos && *Pos <= '9') Value.At(-1) |= (*Pos - '0') & 0xF;
6508 else if('a' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'f') Value.At(-1) |= (*Pos - 'a' + 10) & 0xF;
6509 else if('A' <= *Pos && *Pos <= 'F') Value.At(-1) |= (*Pos - 'A' + 10) & 0xF;
6510 else break;
6511 }
6512 }
6513 }
6514 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6515 // 16진수는 큰수가 메모리의 앞쪽에 오므로 CurEndian을 반대로 적용
6516 Chunk(LastPtr, LastLength, !CurEndian).Save(&Value[0], Value.Count());
6517 }
6518 // 타입힌트식 쓰기
6519 else if(*Pos == ':')
6520 {
6521 Chunk NewChunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
6522 if(Pos[1] == 's')
6523 {
6524 if(Pos[2] == '1') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint08); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6525 else if(Pos[2] == '2') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint16); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6526 else if(Pos[2] == '4') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint32); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6527 else if(Pos[2] == '8') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_sint64); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6528 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6529 }
6530 else if(Pos[1] == 'u')
6531 {
6532 if(Pos[2] == '1') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint08); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6533 else if(Pos[2] == '2') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint16); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6534 else if(Pos[2] == '4') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint32); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6535 else if(Pos[2] == '8') {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint64); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6536 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6537 }
6538 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6539 Pos += 3;
6540 }
6541 // 일반적인 쓰기
6542 else
6543 {
6544 Chunk NewChunk(LastPtr, LastLength, CurEndian);
6545 if(LastLength == 1) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint08); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6546 else if(LastLength == 2) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint16); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6547 else if(LastLength == 4) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint32); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6548 else if(LastLength == 8) {auto v = va_arg(args, va_uint64); NewChunk.Save((bytes) &v, sizeof(v));}
6549 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[-1] - format);
6550 }
6551 }
6552 else if(*Pos == '[')
6553 {
6554 if(Pos[1] == 'b' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = true;
6555 else if(Pos[1] == 'l' && Pos[2] == 'e' && Pos[3] == ']') CurEndian = false;
6556 else return BOSS_SERIAL_ERROR_BROKEN_FORMAT - (&Pos[1] - format);
6557 Pos += 4;
6558 }
6559 else Pos++;
6560 }
6561 return mWriteStream.Count();
6562 }
6563
6564 void WriteFlush(sint32 type)
6565 {
6566 // 쓰기스트림의 처리
6567 if(0 < mWriteStream.Count())
6568 {
6569 static uint08s NewEncodedData;
6570 NewEncodedData.SubtractionAll();
6571 mEnc(&mWriteStream[0], mWriteStream.Count(), NewEncodedData, type);
6572 mWriteStream.SubtractionAll();
6573
6574 if(0 < NewEncodedData.Count())
6575 {
6576 mSerial->write((const char*) &NewEncodedData[0], NewEncodedData.Count());
6577 mSerial->flush();
6578 }
6579 }
6580 }
6581
6582 private:
6583 static sint32 DefaultSerialDecode(bytes data, sint32 length, uint08s& outdata, sint32* outtype)
6584 {
6585 Memory::Copy(outdata.AtDumpingAdded(length), data, length);
6586 return length;
6587 }
6588
6589 static void DefaultSerialEncode(bytes data, sint32 length, uint08s& outdata, sint32 type)
6590 {
6591 Memory::Copy(outdata.AtDumpingAdded(length), data, length);
6592 }
6593 };
6594
6595 #ifdef QT_HAVE_MULTIMEDIA
6596 class CameraSurface : public QAbstractVideoSurface
6597 {
6598 Q_OBJECT
6599
6600 private:
6601 QCamera mCamera;
6602 id_mutex mMutex;
6603 QVideoFrame::PixelFormat mPixelFormat;
6604 bool mNeedFlip;
6605 uint08s mLastImage;
6606 sint32 mLastImageWidth;
6607 sint32 mLastImageHeight;
6608
6609 public:
6610 CameraSurface(const QCameraInfo& info) : mCamera(info)
6611 {
6612 mMutex = Mutex::Open();
6613 mNeedFlip = false;
6614 mLastImageWidth = 0;
6615 mLastImageHeight = 0;
6616 }
6617 ~CameraSurface()
6618 {
6619 StopCamera();
6620 Mutex::Close(mMutex);
6621 }
6622
6623 public:
6624 void StartCamera() {mCamera.start();}
6625 void StopCamera() {mCamera.stop();}
6626 const QCameraViewfinderSettings GetSettings() {return mCamera.viewfinderSettings();}
6627 void SetSettings(const QCameraViewfinderSettings& settings) {mCamera.setViewfinderSettings(settings);}
6628 const QList<QCameraViewfinderSettings> GetSupportedAllSettings() {return mCamera.supportedViewfinderSettings();}
6629
6630 protected:
6631 void StartPreview(bool preview) {mCamera.setViewfinder(this);}
6632 void StopPreview() {mCamera.setViewfinder((QAbstractVideoSurface*) nullptr);}
6633 sint32 GetLastImageWidth() const {return mLastImageWidth;}
6634 sint32 GetLastImageHeight() const {return mLastImageHeight;}
6635 id_texture CreateLastTexture(bool bitmapcache)
6636 {
6637 if(0 < mLastImageWidth && 0 < mLastImageHeight && 0 < mLastImage.Count())
6638 return Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(false, bitmapcache, mLastImageWidth, mLastImageHeight, &mLastImage[0]);
6639 return nullptr;
6640 }
6641
6642 protected:
6643 virtual bool CaptureEnabled() {return false;}
6644 virtual void BufferFlush() {}
6645 virtual void AddPictureShotCount() {}
6646 virtual void AddPreviewShotCount() {}
6647
6648 protected:
6649 void DecodeImage(sint32& width, sint32& height, uint08s& bits)
6650 {
6651 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6652 if(0 < mLastImage.Count())
6653 {
6654 width = mLastImageWidth;
6655 height = mLastImageHeight;
6656 bits.SubtractionAll();
6657 if(mNeedFlip)
6658 {
6659 switch(mPixelFormat)
6660 {
6661 case QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32:
6662 ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32, true>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6663 bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6664 break;
6665 case QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32:
6666 ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32, true>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6667 bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6668 break;
6669 }
6670 }
6671 else switch(mPixelFormat)
6672 {
6673 case QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32:
6674 ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32, false>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6675 bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6676 break;
6677 case QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32:
6678 ToARGB32<QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32, false>((bytes) &mLastImage[0], width, height, 4 * width,
6679 bits.AtDumpingAdded(4 * width * height));
6680 break;
6681 }
6682 //단편화방지차원: mLastImage.Clear();
6683 }
6684 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6685 }
6686
6687 private:
6688 virtual QList<QVideoFrame::PixelFormat> supportedPixelFormats(QAbstractVideoBuffer::HandleType handleType) const
6689 {
6690 Q_UNUSED(handleType);
6691 return QList<QVideoFrame::PixelFormat>()
6692 << QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32
6693 << QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32;
6694 }
6695
6696 private slots:
6697 virtual bool present(const QVideoFrame& frame)
6698 {
6699 AddPictureShotCount();
6700 bool Result = false;
6701 if(frame.isValid() && CaptureEnabled())
6702 {
6703 auto FrameType = frame.handleType();
6704 if(FrameType != QAbstractVideoBuffer::GLTextureHandle)
6705 {
6706 QVideoFrame ClonedFrame(frame);
6707 if(ClonedFrame.map(QAbstractVideoBuffer::ReadOnly))
6708 {
6709 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6710 {
6711 mPixelFormat = ClonedFrame.pixelFormat();
6712 mNeedFlip = true;
6713 mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
6714 mLastImageWidth = ClonedFrame.width();
6715 mLastImageHeight = ClonedFrame.height();
6716 Memory::Copy(mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4 * mLastImageWidth * mLastImageHeight),
6717 ClonedFrame.bits(), 4 * mLastImageWidth * mLastImageHeight);
6718 }
6719 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6720 BufferFlush();
6721 ClonedFrame.unmap();
6722 Result = true;
6723 }
6724 }
6725 #ifndef BOSS_SILENT_NIGHT_IS_ENABLED
6726 // QVideoFrame::map함수의 버그에 따른 수동패치
6727 else if(QOpenGLContext* ctx = QOpenGLContext::currentContext())
6728 {
6729 QOpenGLFunctions* f = ctx->functions();
6730 GLuint textureId = frame.handle().toUInt();
6731 GLuint fbo = 0, prevFbo = 0;
6732 f->glGenFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
6733 f->glGetIntegerv(GL_FRAMEBUFFER_BINDING, (GLint*) &prevFbo);
6734 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, fbo);
6735 f->glFramebufferTexture2D(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, GL_COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureId, 0);
6736 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6737 {
6738 mPixelFormat = frame.pixelFormat();
6739 mNeedFlip = false;
6740 mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
6741 mLastImageWidth = frame.width();
6742 mLastImageHeight = frame.height();
6743 f->glReadPixels(0, 0, mLastImageWidth, mLastImageHeight, GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE,
6744 mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4 * mLastImageWidth * mLastImageHeight));
6745 }
6746 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6747 BufferFlush();
6748 f->glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, prevFbo);
6749 f->glDeleteFramebuffers(1, &fbo);
6750 Result = true;
6751 }
6752 #endif
6753 }
6754 return Result;
6755 }
6756
6757 private:
6758 template<sint32 FORMAT, bool FLIP>
6759 void ToARGB32(bytes srcbits, const sint32 width, const sint32 height, const sint32 rowbytes, uint08* dstbits)
6760 {
6761 for(sint32 y = 0, yend = height; y < yend; ++y)
6762 {
6763 Bmp::bitmappixel* CurDst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*) &dstbits[rowbytes * y];
6764 bytes CurSrc = (FLIP)? &srcbits[rowbytes * (yend - 1 - y)] : &srcbits[rowbytes * y];
6765 for(sint32 x = 0, xend = width; x < xend; ++x)
6766 {
6767 if(FORMAT == (sint32) QVideoFrame::Format_RGB32)
6768 {
6769 CurDst->a = 0xFF;
6770 CurDst->r = CurSrc[2];
6771 CurDst->g = CurSrc[1];
6772 CurDst->b = CurSrc[0];
6773 CurDst++; CurSrc += 4;
6774 }
6775 if(FORMAT == (sint32) QVideoFrame::Format_BGR32)
6776 {
6777 CurDst->a = 0xFF;
6778 CurDst->r = CurSrc[0];
6779 CurDst->g = CurSrc[1];
6780 CurDst->b = CurSrc[2];
6781 CurDst++; CurSrc += 4;
6782 }
6783 }
6784 }
6785 }
6786 };
6787
6788 #if BOSS_ANDROID
6789 class CameraSurfaceForAndroid
6790 {
6791 private:
6792 QCameraViewfinderSettings mSettings;
6793 QList<QCameraViewfinderSettings> mAllSettings;
6794 id_mutex mMutex;
6795 uint08s mLastImage;
6796 sint32 mLastImageWidth;
6797 sint32 mLastImageHeight;
6798 id_texture mCamTexture;
6799
6800 public:
6801 CameraSurfaceForAndroid(const QCameraInfo& info)
6802 {
6803 JNIEnv* env = GetAndroidJNIEnv();
6804 // 카메라 정보수집
6805 QAndroidJniObject Collector = QAndroidJniObject::callStaticObjectMethod("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "info", "()Ljava/lang/String;");
6806 String Result = Collector.toString().toUtf8().constData();
6807 chars ResultPtr = Result;
6808
6809 // 정보입력
6810 QList<QSize> SupportedResolutions;
6811 for(sint32 i = 0; (i = Result.Find(i, "Size_")) != -1;)
6812 {
6813 QSize NewResolution;
6814 i += 5; // Size_
6815 NewResolution.setWidth(Parser::GetInt(ResultPtr, -1, &i));
6816 i += 1; // x
6817 NewResolution.setHeight(Parser::GetInt(ResultPtr, -1, &i));
6818 i += 1; // ;
6819 SupportedResolutions.append(NewResolution);
6820 }
6821 foreach(const auto& CurResolution, SupportedResolutions)
6822 {
6823 QCameraViewfinderSettings NewSettings = mSettings;
6824 NewSettings.setResolution(CurResolution);
6825 mAllSettings.append(NewSettings);
6826 }
6827 // "Format_JPEG;" -> Format_Jpeg
6828 // "Format_NV21;" -> Format_NV21
6829 // "Format_RGB_565;" -> Format_RGB565
6830 // "Format_YUV_420_888;" -> Format_YUV420P
6831 // "Format_YUV_444_888;" -> Format_YUV444
6832 // "Format_YUY2;" -> Format_YUYV
6833 // "Format_YV12;" -> Format_YV12
6834
6835 mMutex = Mutex::Open();
6836 mLastImageWidth = 0;
6837 mLastImageHeight = 0;
6838 mCamTexture = nullptr;
6839 // 콜백함수 연결
6840 JNINativeMethod methods[] {
6841 {"OnPictureTaken", "([BIII)V", reinterpret_cast<void*>(OnPictureTaken)},
6842 {"OnPreviewTaken", "([BIII)V", reinterpret_cast<void*>(OnPreviewTaken)}};
6843 jclass BossCameraManagerClass = env->FindClass("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager");
6844 env->RegisterNatives(BossCameraManagerClass, methods, sizeof(methods) / sizeof(methods[0]));
6845 env->DeleteLocalRef(BossCameraManagerClass);
6846 SavedMe() = this;
6847 }
6848 ~CameraSurfaceForAndroid()
6849 {
6850 Platform::Graphics::RemoveTexture(mCamTexture);
6851 StopCamera();
6852 SavedMe() = nullptr;
6853 Mutex::Close(mMutex);
6854 }
6855
6856 public:
6857 void StartCamera()
6858 {
6859 mCamTexture = Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(false, false, mSettings.resolution().width(), mSettings.resolution().height());
6860 BOSS_TRACE("StartCamera: GenTexture - LastTexture: %d, width: %d, height: %d",
6861 Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(mCamTexture), mSettings.resolution().width(), mSettings.resolution().height());
6862 QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "init", "(III)V",
6863 Platform::Graphics::GetTextureID(mCamTexture), mSettings.resolution().width(), mSettings.resolution().height());
6864 }
6865 void StopCamera()
6866 {
6867 QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "quit", "()V");
6868 Platform::Graphics::RemoveTexture(mCamTexture);
6869 mCamTexture = nullptr;
6870 BOSS_TRACE("StopCamera: DeleteTexture done");
6871 }
6872 const QCameraViewfinderSettings GetSettings() {return mSettings;}
6873 void SetSettings(const QCameraViewfinderSettings& settings) {mSettings = settings;}
6874 const QList<QCameraViewfinderSettings> GetSupportedAllSettings() {return mAllSettings;}
6875
6876 protected:
6877 void StartPreview(bool preview) {QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "play", "(I)V", (preview)? 1 : 2);}
6878 void StopPreview() {QAndroidJniObject::callStaticMethod<void>("com/boss2d/BossCameraManager", "stop", "()V");}
6879 sint32 GetLastImageWidth() const {return mLastImageWidth;}
6880 sint32 GetLastImageHeight() const {return mLastImageHeight;}
6881 id_texture CreateLastTexture(bool bitmapcache)
6882 {
6883 if(0 < mLastImageWidth && 0 < mLastImageHeight)
6884 {
6885 switch(*((uint32*) &mLastImage[0]))
6886 {
6887 case codeid("NV21"):
6888 if(12 < mLastImage.Count())
6889 return Platform::Graphics::CreateTexture(true, bitmapcache, mLastImageWidth, mLastImageHeight, &mLastImage[12]);
6890 break;
6891 }
6892 }
6893 return nullptr;
6894 }
6895
6896 protected:
6897 virtual bool CaptureEnabled() {return false;}
6898 virtual void BufferFlush() {}
6899 virtual void AddPictureShotCount() {}
6900 virtual void AddPreviewShotCount() {}
6901
6902 protected:
6903 void DecodeImage(sint32& width, sint32& height, uint08s& bits)
6904 {
6905 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage - Begin(%d)", mLastImage.Count());
6906 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
6907 if(0 < mLastImage.Count())
6908 {
6909 switch(*((uint32*) &mLastImage[0]))
6910 {
6911 case codeid("NV21"):
6912 {
6913 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(RAW8) - Mid-A (%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6914 width = *((sint32*) &mLastImage[4]);
6915 height = *((sint32*) &mLastImage[8]);
6916 bits.SubtractionAll();
6917 Bmp::bitmappixel* Dst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*)
6918 bits.AtDumpingAdded(sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width * height);
6919 auto SrcY = (const uint08*) &mLastImage[12];
6920 auto SrcUVBegin = (const uint08*) &mLastImage[12 + width * height];
6921 const uint08* SrcUVPair[2] = {SrcUVBegin, SrcUVBegin};
6922 for(sint32 y = 0; y < height; ++y)
6923 {
6924 const uint08*& SrcUV = SrcUVPair[y & 1];
6925 for(sint32 x = 0; x < width; x += 2)
6926 {
6927 const sint32 Y1 = *(SrcY++) & 0xFF;
6928 const sint32 Y2 = *(SrcY++) & 0xFF;
6929 const sint32 V = (*(SrcUV++) & 0xFF) - 128;
6930 const sint32 U = (*(SrcUV++) & 0xFF) - 128;
6931 const sint32 Y1Value = (sint32)(1.164f * (Y1 - 16));
6932 const sint32 Y2Value = (sint32)(1.164f * (Y2 - 16));
6933 const sint32 RValue = (sint32)(1.596f * V);
6934 const sint32 GValue = (sint32)(0.391f * U + 0.813f * V);
6935 const sint32 BValue = (sint32)(2.018f * U);
6936 Dst->a = 0xFF;
6937 Dst->r = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y1Value + RValue, 255));
6938 Dst->g = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y1Value - GValue, 255));
6939 Dst->b = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y1Value + BValue, 255));
6940 Dst++;
6941 Dst->a = 0xFF;
6942 Dst->r = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y2Value + RValue, 255));
6943 Dst->g = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y2Value - GValue, 255));
6944 Dst->b = (uint08) Math::Max(0, Math::Min(Y2Value + BValue, 255));
6945 Dst++;
6946 }
6947 }
6948 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(RAW8) - Mid-B (%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6949 }
6950 break;
6951 case codeid("JPEG"):
6952 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(JPEG)");
6953 if(id_bitmap NewBitmap = AddOn::Jpg::ToBmp(&mLastImage[4], mLastImage.Count() - 4))
6954 {
6955 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(JPEG) - Mid-A");
6956 width = Bmp::GetWidth(NewBitmap);
6957 height = Bmp::GetHeight(NewBitmap);
6958 bits.SubtractionAll();
6959 Bmp::bitmappixel* Dst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*)
6960 bits.AtDumpingAdded(sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width * height);
6961 auto Src = (const Bmp::bitmappixel*) Bmp::GetBits(NewBitmap);
6962 for(sint32 y = 0; y < height; ++y)
6963 Memory::Copy(&Dst[width * y], &Src[width * (height - 1 - y)],
6964 sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width);
6965 Bmp::Remove(NewBitmap);
6966 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage(JPEG) - Mid-B");
6967 }
6968 break;
6969 }
6970 //단편화방지차원: mLastImage.Clear();
6971 }
6972 else
6973 {
6974 width = 1;
6975 height = 1;
6976 bits.SubtractionAll();
6977 Bmp::bitmappixel* Dst = (Bmp::bitmappixel*)
6978 bits.AtDumpingAdded(sizeof(Bmp::bitmappixel) * width * height);
6979 Dst->a = 0xFF;
6980 Dst->r = 0xFF;
6981 Dst->g = 0x00;
6982 Dst->b = 0x00;
6983 }
6984 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
6985 BOSS_TRACE("DecodeImage - End(%d)", bits.Count());
6986 }
6987
6988 private:
6989 static CameraSurfaceForAndroid*& SavedMe()
6990 {
6991 static CameraSurfaceForAndroid* _ = nullptr;
6992 return _;
6993 }
6994 static void OnPictureTaken(JNIEnv* env, jobject thiz, jbyteArray data, jint length, jint width, jint height)
6995 {
6996 BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken Begin(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
6997 bytes paramData = (bytes) env->GetByteArrayElements(data, nullptr);
6998 CameraSurfaceForAndroid* Me = SavedMe();
6999 BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken - width: %d, height: %d, paramData: %08X, length: %d, Me: %08X",
7000 width, height, paramData, length, Me);
7001 if(Me)
7002 {
7003 Me->AddPictureShotCount();
7004 if(Me->CaptureEnabled())
7005 if(paramData && 0 < length)
7006 {
7007 if(16 <= length)
7008 BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken - %08X %08X %08X %08X... (%d)",
7009 ((sint32*) paramData)[0], ((sint32*) paramData)[1],
7010 ((sint32*) paramData)[2], ((sint32*) paramData)[3], length);
7011 Mutex::Lock(Me->mMutex);
7012 {
7013 Me->mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
7014 Me->mLastImageWidth = width;
7015 Me->mLastImageHeight = height;
7016 const uint32 TypeCode = codeid("JPEG");
7017 Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &TypeCode, 4);
7018 Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(length), paramData, length);
7019 }
7020 Mutex::Unlock(Me->mMutex);
7021 Me->BufferFlush();
7022 }
7023 }
7024 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(data, (jbyte*) paramData, JNI_ABORT);
7025 BOSS_TRACE("OnPictureTaken End(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
7026 }
7027 static void OnPreviewTaken(JNIEnv* env, jobject thiz, jbyteArray data, jint length, jint width, jint height)
7028 {
7029 BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken Begin(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
7030 bytes paramData = (bytes) env->GetByteArrayElements(data, nullptr);
7031 CameraSurfaceForAndroid* Me = SavedMe();
7032 BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken - width: %d, height: %d, paramData: %08X, length: %d, Me: %08X",
7033 width, height, paramData, length, Me);
7034 if(Me)
7035 {
7036 Me->AddPreviewShotCount();
7037 if(Me->CaptureEnabled())
7038 if(paramData && 0 < length)
7039 {
7040 if(16 <= length)
7041 BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken - %08X %08X %08X %08X... (%d)",
7042 ((sint32*) paramData)[0], ((sint32*) paramData)[1],
7043 ((sint32*) paramData)[2], ((sint32*) paramData)[3], length);
7044 Mutex::Lock(Me->mMutex);
7045 {
7046 Me->mLastImage.SubtractionAll();
7047 Me->mLastImageWidth = width;
7048 Me->mLastImageHeight = height;
7049 const uint32 TypeCode = codeid("NV21");
7050 Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &TypeCode, 4);
7051 Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &width, 4);
7052 Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(4), &height, 4);
7053 Memory::Copy(Me->mLastImage.AtDumpingAdded(length), paramData, length);
7054 }
7055 Mutex::Unlock(Me->mMutex);
7056 Me->BufferFlush();
7057 }
7058 }
7059 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(data, (jbyte*) paramData, JNI_ABORT);
7060 BOSS_TRACE("OnPreviewTaken End(%llu)", Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec());
7061 }
7062 };
7063 typedef CameraSurfaceForAndroid CameraSurfaceClass;
7064 #else
7065 typedef CameraSurface CameraSurfaceClass;
7066 #endif
7067
7068 class CameraService : public CameraSurfaceClass
7069 {
7070 private:
7071 enum CaptureOrder {CaptureOrder_None, CaptureOrder_ShotOnly, CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop, CaptureOrder_NeedStop};
7072 id_mutex mMutex;
7073 bool mStartPreview;
7074 CaptureOrder mCaptureOrder;
7075 sint32 mDecodedWidth;
7076 sint32 mDecodedHeight;
7077 uint08s mDecodedBits;
7078 bool mUpdateForImage;
7079 bool mUpdateForBitmap;
7080 uint64 mUpdateTimeMsec;
7081 float mUpdateAvgMsec;
7082 sint32 mPictureShotCount;
7083 sint32 mPreviewShotCount;
7084
7085 public:
7086 CameraService(const QCameraInfo& info) : CameraSurfaceClass(info)
7087 {
7088 mMutex = Mutex::Open();
7089 mStartPreview = false;
7090 mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
7091 mDecodedWidth = 0;
7092 mDecodedHeight = 0;
7093 mUpdateForImage = false;
7094 mUpdateForBitmap = false;
7095 mUpdateTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
7096 mUpdateAvgMsec = 0;
7097 mPictureShotCount = 0;
7098 mPreviewShotCount = 0;
7099 }
7100 ~CameraService()
7101 {
7102 Mutex::Close(mMutex);
7103 }
7104
7105 private:
7106 virtual bool CaptureEnabled() override
7107 {
7108 bool Result = false;
7109 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7110 {
7111 Result = (mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotOnly
7112 || mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop);
7113 }
7114 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7115 return Result;
7116 }
7117 virtual void BufferFlush() override
7118 {
7119 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7120 {
7121 if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotOnly)
7122 mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
7123 else if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop)
7124 mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_NeedStop;
7125 mUpdateForImage = true;
7126 mUpdateForBitmap = true;
7127 }
7128 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7129 }
7130 virtual void AddPictureShotCount() override
7131 {
7132 mPictureShotCount++;
7133 const uint64 NewTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
7134 mUpdateAvgMsec = (mUpdateAvgMsec * 19 + Math::Max(1, NewTimeMsec - mUpdateTimeMsec)) / 20;
7135 mUpdateTimeMsec = NewTimeMsec;
7136 }
7137 virtual void AddPreviewShotCount() override
7138 {
7139 mPreviewShotCount++;
7140 const uint64 NewTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
7141 mUpdateAvgMsec = (mUpdateAvgMsec * 19 + Math::Max(1, NewTimeMsec - mUpdateTimeMsec)) / 20;
7142 mUpdateTimeMsec = NewTimeMsec;
7143 }
7144
7145 public:
7146 void Capture(bool preview, bool needstop)
7147 {
7148 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7149 {
7150 mCaptureOrder = (needstop)? CaptureOrder_ShotAndStop : CaptureOrder_ShotOnly;
7151 mStartPreview = true;
7152 StartPreview(preview);
7153 }
7154 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7155 }
7156 id_texture CloneCapturedTexture(bool bitmapcache)
7157 {
7158 id_texture Result = nullptr;
7159 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7160 {
7161 Result = CreateLastTexture(bitmapcache);
7162 }
7163 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7164 return Result;
7165 }
7166 void GetCapturedImage(QPixmap& pixmap, sint32 maxwidth, sint32 maxheight, sint32 rotate)
7167 {
7168 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7169 {
7170 if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_NeedStop)
7171 {
7172 mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
7173 if(mStartPreview)
7174 {
7175 mStartPreview = false;
7176 StopPreview();
7177 }
7178 }
7179 if(mUpdateForImage)
7180 {
7181 mUpdateForImage = false;
7182 if(mUpdateForBitmap) DecodeImage(mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, mDecodedBits);
7183 QImage NewImage(&mDecodedBits[0], mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, QImage::Format_ARGB32);
7184
7185 if(maxwidth == -1 && maxheight == -1)
7186 {maxwidth = mDecodedWidth; maxheight = mDecodedHeight;}
7187 else if(maxwidth == -1) maxwidth = mDecodedWidth * maxheight / mDecodedHeight;
7188 else if(maxheight == -1) maxheight = mDecodedHeight * maxwidth / mDecodedWidth;
7189
7190 // 스케일링
7191 if(maxwidth < mDecodedWidth || maxheight < mDecodedHeight)
7192 NewImage = NewImage.scaled(Math::Min(maxwidth, mDecodedWidth), Math::Min(maxheight, mDecodedHeight));
7193
7194 // 회전
7195 if(0 < rotate)
7196 {
7197 QMatrix NewMatrix;
7198 NewMatrix.translate(mDecodedWidth / 2, mDecodedHeight / 2);
7199 NewMatrix.rotate(rotate);
7200 NewImage = NewImage.transformed(NewMatrix);
7201 }
7202 pixmap.convertFromImage(NewImage);
7203 //단편화방지차원: if(!mUpdateForBitmap) mDecodedBits.Clear();
7204 }
7205 }
7206 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7207 }
7208 void GetCapturedBitmap(id_bitmap& bitmap, orientationtype ori)
7209 {
7210 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7211 {
7212 if(mCaptureOrder == CaptureOrder_NeedStop)
7213 {
7214 mCaptureOrder = CaptureOrder_None;
7215 if(mStartPreview)
7216 {
7217 mStartPreview = false;
7218 StopPreview();
7219 }
7220 }
7221 if(mUpdateForBitmap)
7222 {
7223 mUpdateForBitmap = false;
7224 if(mUpdateForImage) DecodeImage(mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, mDecodedBits);
7225 bitmap = Bmp::CloneFromBits(&mDecodedBits[0], mDecodedWidth, mDecodedHeight, 32, ori, bitmap);
7226 //단편화방지차원: if(!mUpdateForImage) mDecodedBits.Clear();
7227 }
7228 }
7229 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7230 }
7231 size64 GetCapturedSize() const
7232 {
7233 size64 Result = {0, 0};
7234 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7235 {
7236 Result.w = GetLastImageWidth();
7237 Result.h = GetLastImageHeight();
7238 }
7239 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7240 return Result;
7241 }
7242 uint64 GetCapturedTimeMsec(sint32* avgmsec) const
7243 {
7244 uint64 Result = 0;
7245 Mutex::Lock(mMutex);
7246 {
7247 Result = mUpdateTimeMsec;
7248 if(avgmsec) *avgmsec = Math::Max(1, (sint32) mUpdateAvgMsec);
7249 }
7250 Mutex::Unlock(mMutex);
7251 return Result;
7252 }
7253 sint32 GetPictureShotCount() const
7254 {
7255 return mPictureShotCount;
7256 }
7257 sint32 GetPreviewShotCount() const
7258 {
7259 return mPreviewShotCount;
7260 }
7261 };
7262
7263 class CameraClass
7264 {
7265 private:
7266 sint32 mRefCount;
7267 QCameraInfo mCameraInfo;
7268 CameraService* mCameraService;
7269 QPixmap mLastPixmap;
7270 id_bitmap mLastBitmap;
7271
7272 public:
7273 static Strings GetList(String* spec)
7274 {
7275 Strings Result;
7276 Context SpecCollector;
7277 const QList<QCameraInfo>& AllCameras = QCameraInfo::availableCameras();
7278 foreach(const auto& CurCamera, AllCameras)
7279 {
7280 String CurName = CurCamera.description().toUtf8().constData();
7281 if(CurName.Length() == 0)
7282 CurName = CurCamera.deviceName().toUtf8().constData();
7283 Result.AtAdding() = CurName;
7284 if(spec)
7285 {
7286 Context& NewChild = SpecCollector.At(SpecCollector.LengthOfIndexable());
7287 NewChild.At("description").Set(CurCamera.description().toUtf8().constData());
7288 NewChild.At("devicename").Set(CurCamera.deviceName().toUtf8().constData());
7289 NewChild.At("position").Set(String::FromInteger(CurCamera.position()));
7290 NewChild.At("orientation").Set(String::FromInteger(CurCamera.orientation()));
7291 }
7292 }
7293 if(spec)
7294 *spec = SpecCollector.SaveJson(*spec);
7295 return Result;
7296 }
7297
7298 public:
7299 CameraClass(chars name, sint32 width, sint32 height)
7300 {
7301 mRefCount = 1;
7302 mCameraService = nullptr;
7303 mLastBitmap = nullptr;
7304 const QList<QCameraInfo>& AllCameraInfos = QCameraInfo::availableCameras();
7305 foreach(const auto& CurCameraInfo, AllCameraInfos)
7306 {
7307 if(*name == '\0' || CurCameraInfo.description() == name || CurCameraInfo.deviceName() == name)
7308 {
7309 mCameraInfo = CurCameraInfo;
7310 mCameraService = new CameraService(mCameraInfo);
7311
7312 sint32 BestValue = 0, SavedWidth = -1, SavedHeight = -1;
7313 double SavedMinFR = -1, SavedMaxFR = -1;
7314 auto AllSettings = mCameraService->GetSupportedAllSettings();
7315 BOSS_TRACE("Created Camera: %s(%s) [Included %d settings]",
7316 CurCameraInfo.deviceName().toUtf8().constData(),
7317 CurCameraInfo.description().toUtf8().constData(), AllSettings.size());
7318 BOSS_TRACE(" - Setting Count: %d", AllSettings.size());
7319 foreach(const auto& CurSetting, AllSettings)
7320 {
7321 const sint32 CurWidth = CurSetting.resolution().width();
7322 const sint32 CurHeight = CurSetting.resolution().height();
7323 const double CurMinFR = CurSetting.minimumFrameRate();
7324 const double CurMaxFR = CurSetting.maximumFrameRate();
7325 BOSS_TRACE(" - 1.Supported Resolution: %dx%d", CurWidth, CurHeight);
7326 BOSS_TRACE(" - 2.Supported PixelFormat: %d", (sint32) CurSetting.pixelFormat());
7327 BOSS_TRACE(" - 3.Supported FrameRate: %f~%f", (float) CurMinFR, (float) CurMaxFR);
7328 bool IsFinded = false;
7329 if(width == -1 && height == -1)
7330 {
7331 if(BestValue <= CurWidth * CurHeight)
7332 {
7333 BestValue = CurWidth * CurHeight;
7334 IsFinded = true;
7335 }
7336 }
7337 else if(width == -1)
7338 {
7339 if(height == CurHeight && BestValue <= CurWidth)
7340 {
7341 BestValue = CurWidth;
7342 IsFinded = true;
7343 }
7344 }
7345 else if(height == -1)
7346 {
7347 if(width == CurWidth && BestValue <= CurHeight)
7348 {
7349 BestValue = CurHeight;
7350 IsFinded = true;
7351 }
7352 }
7353 else if(width == CurWidth && height == CurHeight)
7354 IsFinded = true;
7355 if(IsFinded)
7356 {
7357 SavedWidth = CurWidth;
7358 SavedHeight = CurHeight;
7359 SavedMinFR = CurMinFR;
7360 SavedMaxFR = CurMaxFR;
7361 }
7362 }
7363
7364 QCameraViewfinderSettings NewSettings = mCameraService->GetSettings();
7365 if(SavedWidth != -1 && SavedHeight != -1)
7366 NewSettings.setResolution(SavedWidth, SavedHeight);
7367 else NewSettings.setResolution(640, 480);
7368 if(SavedMinFR != -1) NewSettings.setMinimumFrameRate(SavedMinFR);
7369 if(SavedMaxFR != -1) NewSettings.setMaximumFrameRate(SavedMaxFR);
7370 mCameraService->SetSettings(NewSettings);
7371 mCameraService->StartCamera();
7372 break;
7373 }
7374 }
7375 }
7376 ~CameraClass()
7377 {
7378 delete mCameraService;
7379 Bmp::Remove(mLastBitmap);
7380 }
7381
7382 public:
7383 CameraClass* AddRef()
7384 {
7385 mRefCount++;
7386 return this;
7387 }
7388 bool SubRef()
7389 {
7390 return (--mRefCount == 0);
7391 }
7392 bool IsValid() const
7393 {
7394 return (mCameraService != nullptr);
7395 }
7396 void Capture(bool preview, bool needstop)
7397 {
7398 if(mCameraService)
7399 mCameraService->Capture(preview, needstop);
7400 }
7401 id_texture CloneCapturedTexture(bool bitmapcache)
7402 {
7403 if(mCameraService)
7404 return mCameraService->CloneCapturedTexture(bitmapcache);
7405 return nullptr;
7406 }
7407 id_image_read LastCapturedImage(sint32 maxwidth, sint32 maxheight, sint32 rotate)
7408 {
7409 if(mCameraService)
7410 {
7411 mCameraService->GetCapturedImage(mLastPixmap, maxwidth, maxheight, rotate);
7412 return (id_image_read) &mLastPixmap;
7413 }
7414 return nullptr;
7415 }
7416 id_bitmap_read LastCapturedBitmap(orientationtype ori)
7417 {
7418 if(mCameraService)
7419 {
7420 mCameraService->GetCapturedBitmap(mLastBitmap, ori);
7421 return mLastBitmap;
7422 }
7423 return nullptr;
7424 }
7425 size64 LastCapturedSize() const
7426 {
7427 if(mCameraService)
7428 return mCameraService->GetCapturedSize();
7429 return {0, 0};
7430 }
7431 uint64 LastCapturedTimeMsec(sint32* avgmsec) const
7432 {
7433 if(mCameraService)
7434 return mCameraService->GetCapturedTimeMsec(avgmsec);
7435 return 0;
7436 }
7437 sint32 TotalPictureShotCount() const
7438 {
7439 if(mCameraService)
7440 return mCameraService->GetPictureShotCount();
7441 return 0;
7442 }
7443 sint32 TotalPreviewShotCount() const
7444 {
7445 if(mCameraService)
7446 return mCameraService->GetPreviewShotCount();
7447 return 0;
7448 }
7449 };
7450 #else
7451 class CameraSurface : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7452 #endif
7453
7454 #ifdef QT_HAVE_MULTIMEDIA
7455 class MicrophoneClass : public QAudioProbe
7456 {
7457 Q_OBJECT
7458
7459 private:
7460 class Data
7461 {
7462 public:
7463 Data() {}
7464 ~Data() {}
7465 public:
7466 Data(const Data& rhs) {operator=(rhs);}
7467 Data& operator=(const Data& rhs)
7468 {
7469 mPcm = rhs.mPcm;
7470 mTimeMsec = rhs.mTimeMsec;
7471 return *this;
7472 }
7473 operator void*() const {return nullptr;}
7474 bool operator!() const {return (mPcm.Count() == 0);}
7475 public:
7476 uint08s mPcm;
7477 uint64 mTimeMsec;
7478 };
7479
7480 private:
7481 QAudioRecorder* mRecorder;
7482 QAudioEncoderSettings mAudioSettings;
7483 const sint32 mMaxQueueCount;
7484 Queue<Data> mDataQueue;
7485 Data mLastData;
7486
7487 public:
7488 static Strings GetList(String* spec)
7489 {
7490 Strings Result;
7491 Context SpecCollector;
7492 const QList<QAudioDeviceInfo>& AllMicrophones = QAudioDeviceInfo::availableDevices(QAudio::AudioInput);
7493 foreach(const auto& CurMicrophone, AllMicrophones)
7494 {
7495 String CurName = CurMicrophone.deviceName().toUtf8().constData();
7496 Result.AtAdding() = CurName;
7497 if(spec)
7498 {
7499 Context& NewChild = SpecCollector.At(SpecCollector.LengthOfIndexable());
7500 NewChild.At("devicename").Set(CurName);
7501 const auto& AllByteOrders = CurMicrophone.supportedByteOrders();
7502 foreach(const auto& CurByteOrder, AllByteOrders)
7503 {
7504 Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("byteorders").At(NewChild.At("byteorders").LengthOfIndexable());
7505 if(CurByteOrder == QAudioFormat::BigEndian) NewChild2.Set("BigEndian");
7506 else if(CurByteOrder == QAudioFormat::LittleEndian) NewChild2.Set("LittleEndian");
7507 }
7508 const auto& AllChannelCounts = CurMicrophone.supportedChannelCounts();
7509 foreach(const auto& CurChannelCount, AllChannelCounts)
7510 {
7511 Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("channelcounts").At(NewChild.At("channelcounts").LengthOfIndexable());
7512 NewChild2.Set(String::FromInteger(CurChannelCount));
7513 }
7514 const auto& AllCodecs = CurMicrophone.supportedCodecs();
7515 foreach(const auto& CurCodec, AllCodecs)
7516 {
7517 Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("codecs").At(NewChild.At("codecs").LengthOfIndexable());
7518 NewChild2.Set(CurCodec.toUtf8().constData());
7519 }
7520 const auto& AllSampleRates = CurMicrophone.supportedSampleRates();
7521 foreach(const auto& CurSampleRate, AllSampleRates)
7522 {
7523 Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("samplerates").At(NewChild.At("samplerates").LengthOfIndexable());
7524 NewChild2.Set(String::FromInteger(CurSampleRate));
7525 }
7526 const auto& AllSampleSizes = CurMicrophone.supportedSampleSizes();
7527 foreach(const auto& CurSampleSize, AllSampleSizes)
7528 {
7529 Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("samplesizes").At(NewChild.At("samplesizes").LengthOfIndexable());
7530 NewChild2.Set(String::FromInteger(CurSampleSize));
7531 }
7532 const auto& AllSampleTypes = CurMicrophone.supportedSampleTypes();
7533 foreach(const auto& CurSampleType, AllSampleTypes)
7534 {
7535 Context& NewChild2 = NewChild.At("sampletypes").At(NewChild.At("sampletypes").LengthOfIndexable());
7536 if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::Unknown) NewChild2.Set("Unknown");
7537 else if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::SignedInt) NewChild2.Set("SignedInt");
7538 else if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::UnSignedInt) NewChild2.Set("UnSignedInt");
7539 else if(CurSampleType == QAudioFormat::Float) NewChild2.Set("Float");
7540 }
7541 }
7542 }
7543 if(spec)
7544 *spec = SpecCollector.SaveJson(*spec);
7545 return Result;
7546 }
7547
7548 public:
7549 MicrophoneClass(chars name, sint32 maxcount) : mMaxQueueCount(maxcount)
7550 {
7551 mRecorder = new QAudioRecorder();
7552 QString SelectedInput = "";
7553 if(*name != '\0')
7554 {
7555 QStringList Inputs = mRecorder->audioInputs();
7556 foreach(QString Input, Inputs)
7557 if(!String::Compare(name, Input.toUtf8().constData()))
7558 SelectedInput = Input;
7559 }
7560 else SelectedInput = mRecorder->defaultAudioInput();
7561 if(SelectedInput.length() == 0)
7562 {
7563 delete mRecorder;
7564 mRecorder = nullptr;
7565 return;
7566 }
7567 mRecorder->setAudioInput(SelectedInput);
7568
7569 mAudioSettings = mRecorder->audioSettings();
7570 mAudioSettings.setCodec("audio/pcm");
7571 mAudioSettings.setBitRate(128000);
7572 mAudioSettings.setChannelCount(2);
7573 mAudioSettings.setSampleRate(44100);
7574 mAudioSettings.setQuality(QMultimedia::HighQuality);
7575 mAudioSettings.setEncodingMode(QMultimedia::ConstantBitRateEncoding);
7576 mRecorder->setAudioSettings(mAudioSettings);
7577
7578 connect(this, SIGNAL(audioBufferProbed(QAudioBuffer)), this, SLOT(processBuffer(QAudioBuffer)));
7579 setSource(mRecorder);
7580 mRecorder->record();
7581 }
7582 ~MicrophoneClass()
7583 {
7584 setSource((QMediaRecorder*) nullptr);
7585 delete mRecorder;
7586 while(0 < mDataQueue.Count())
7587 mDataQueue.Dequeue();
7588 }
7589
7590 public:
7591 bool IsValid()
7592 {
7593 return (mRecorder != nullptr);
7594 }
7595 bool TryLastData()
7596 {
7597 if(0 < mDataQueue.Count())
7598 {
7599 mLastData = mDataQueue.Dequeue();
7600 return true;
7601 }
7602 return false;
7603 }
7604 const uint08s& GetLastData(uint64* timems) const
7605 {
7606 if(timems) *timems = mLastData.mTimeMsec;
7607 return mLastData.mPcm;
7608 }
7609 const QAudioEncoderSettings& GetAudioSettings() const
7610 {return mAudioSettings;}
7611
7612 private slots:
7613 virtual void processBuffer(const QAudioBuffer& buffer)
7614 {
7615 // 한계처리
7616 while(mMaxQueueCount < mDataQueue.Count())
7617 mDataQueue.Dequeue();
7618 // 데이터적재
7619 if(buffer.isValid())
7620 {
7621 Data NewData;
7622 Memory::Copy(NewData.mPcm.AtDumpingAdded(buffer.byteCount()), buffer.constData(), buffer.byteCount());
7623 NewData.mTimeMsec = Platform::Utility::CurrentTimeMsec();
7624 mDataQueue.Enqueue(NewData);
7625 }
7626 }
7627 };
7628 #else
7629 class MicrophoneClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7630 #endif
7631
7632#elif defined(_MSC_VER) && defined(QT_DLL)
7633
7634 // 플랫폼매크로를 변경하였을때 아래 코드가 없으면
7635 // Qt는 moc를 다시 빌드하지 않아 링크에러를 유발.
7636 #include <QtWidgets>
7637 #include <QMainWindow>
7638 #include <QSystemTrayIcon>
7639 #include <QHostInfo>
7640 #include <QTcpSocket>
7641 #include <QUdpSocket>
7642 #include <QTcpServer>
7643 #include <QGLWidget>
7644 #include <QGLFunctions>
7645 #include <QGLShaderProgram>
7646 #include <QAbstractVideoSurface>
7647 #include <QAudioProbe>
7648 #include <QWebEngineView>
7649
7650 class ViewAPI : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7651 class GenericView : public QFrame {Q_OBJECT};
7652 class GenericViewGL : public QGLWidget {Q_OBJECT};
7653 class MainViewGL : public QGLWidget {Q_OBJECT};
7654 class MainViewMDI : public QMdiArea {Q_OBJECT};
7655 class TrayIcon : public QSystemTrayIcon {Q_OBJECT};
7656 class MainWindow : public QMainWindow {Q_OBJECT};
7657 class EditTracker : public QLineEdit {Q_OBJECT};
7658 class ListTracker : public QListWidget {Q_OBJECT};
7659 class ThreadClass : public QThread {Q_OBJECT};
7660 class ServerClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7661 class TCPServerClass : public ServerClass {Q_OBJECT};
7662 class WSServerClass : public ServerClass {Q_OBJECT};
7663 class PipeClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7664 class PipeServerClass : public PipeClass {Q_OBJECT};
7665 class PipeClientClass : public PipeClass {Q_OBJECT};
7666 class WebEngineViewForExtraDesktop : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7667 class WebViewClass : public WebEngineViewClass {Q_OBJECT};
7668 class PurchaseClass : public QInAppStore {Q_OBJECT};
7669 class BluetoothSearchClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};
7670 class BluetoothClass : public QObject {Q_OBJECT};

7672 class BluetoothLEServerClass : public BluetoothClass {Q_OBJECT};
7673 class BluetoothClientClass : public BluetoothClass {Q_OBJECT};
7674 class BluetoothLEClientClass : public BluetoothClass {Q_OBJECT};
7675 class CameraSurface : public QAbstractVideoSurface {Q_OBJECT};
7676 class MicrophoneClass : public QAudioProbe {Q_OBJECT};

7678#endif

BOSS::String::Find

BOSS::String::Length

BOSS::String::Left
String Left(sint32 length) const
